       <li class="" data-reactid="489"><a class="" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="490"><!-- react-text: 491 -->Rules for Rulesets<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 492 --> <!-- /react-text --></a><!-- react-text: 493 --><!-- /react-text --></li>
       <li class="" data-reactid="494"><a class="" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="495"><!-- react-text: 496 -->Account rulesets<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 497 --> <!-- /react-text --></a><!-- react-text: 498 --><!-- /react-text --></li>

    <header id="header" class="header" style="left:;" data-reactid="744">
     <div class="header-main" data-reactid="745">
      <div class="wrapper fluid" data-reactid="746">
       <a id="mobile-left-menu-trigger" class="icon icon-menu activate-flyout-menu mobile-only" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="747"></a>
       <nav id="main-menu" class="header-navigation navigation" role="navigation" data-reactid="748">

         <li data-reactid="750"><a class="active" href="/" data-reactid="751"> Docs</a></li>
         <li data-reactid="752"><a class="" href="/deprecations" data-reactid="753">Deprecations</a></li>
        </ul><span data-reactid="754"><a href="/" class="logo logo-header icon-only" data-reactid="755">Cloudflare</a></span>
        <ul class="menu menu-header" data-reactid="756">
         <li data-reactid="757"><a href="https://blog.cloudflare.com" data-reactid="758">Blog</a></li>
         <li data-reactid="759"><a href="https://support.cloudflare.com" data-reactid="760">Support</a></li>

     </div>
    </header>
    <div class="site-wrapper body-container" style="padding:;" data-reactid="763">
     <div class="page-header" data-reactid="764">
      <div class="wrapper" data-reactid="765">
       <h1 class="text-light text-center" data-reactid="766">Cloudflare API v4 Documentation</h1>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="main-content wrapper" data-reactid="767">
      <div data-reactid="768">
       <div data-reactid="769">
        <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="770">
         <p data-reactid="771"><small data-reactid="772"><!-- react-text: 773 -->Last modified: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 774 -->June 3rd, 2021<!-- /react-text --></small></p>
         <h2 data-reactid="775">Getting started</h2>
         <p data-reactid="776">Cloudflare's API exposes the entire Cloudflare infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Cloudflare's API, you can do just about anything you can do on cloudflare.com via the customer dashboard.</p>
         <p data-reactid="777"><!-- react-text: 778 -->The Cloudflare API is a RESTful API based on HTTPS requests and JSON responses. If you are registered with Cloudflare, you can obtain your API key from the bottom of the "API Tokens" page, found here: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 779 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens" data-reactid="780">Go to My account.</a></p>
        </article>
        <article class="section guidelines-section" data-reactid="781">
         <h2 data-reactid="782">What is Cloudflare?</h2>
         <p data-reactid="783">Cloudflare makes sites lightning fast, protects them from attacks, ensures they are always online, and makes it simple to add web apps with a single click. Every month, more than 1.8 billion people experience a faster, safer, better Internet thanks to Cloudflare.</p>
         <h2 data-reactid="784">Audience for APIs</h2>
         <p data-reactid="785">Cloudflare offers public APIs with three audiences in mind.</p>
         <ol data-reactid="786">
          <li data-reactid="787">Cloudflare customers</li>
          <li data-reactid="788">Cloudflare partners</li>
          <li data-reactid="789">Developers</li>
         </ol>
         <p data-reactid="790"><em data-reactid="791">Customers</em><!-- react-text: 792 -->: Individuals and organizations all over the world choose Cloudflare to protect and accelerate their web applications. Most customers manage their settings in the web dashboard, built using these APIs. Virtually anything you can do in the customer dashboard may be done via API. Example: purging the Cloudflare edge cache for a <!-- /react-text --><a href="#zone-purge-files-by-url" data-reactid="793">single file</a><!-- react-text: 794 --> when it's updated on the origin server.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="795"><em data-reactid="796">Partners</em><!-- react-text: 797 -->: Many organizations make using Cloudflare a seamless option for improving their customers' performance and security. These APIs make that easier to do at scale. Example: a Cloudflare Certified Hosting Partner may use APIs to <!-- /react-text --><a href="#zone-settings-for-a-zone-change-security-level-setting" data-reactid="798">toggle basic security mode</a><!-- react-text: 799 --> inside a hosting control panel.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="800"><em data-reactid="801">Developers</em><!-- react-text: 802 -->: Developers all over the world create useful applications which tie into Cloudflare services. These applications may include plugins and extensions to <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/cloudflare/" data-reactid="803">popular content management systems</a><!-- react-text: 804 -->, apps that are offered in the Cloudflare Apps marketplace, runbooks for specific deployment systems, and many others.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <h2 data-reactid="805">Do's and Don'ts</h2>
         <h4 data-reactid="806">What can you build with Cloudflare APIs?</h4>
         <p data-reactid="807">Anything that's useful and follows the guidelines presented here.</p>
         <h4 data-reactid="808">What should you avoid doing with Cloudflare APIs?</h4>
         <p data-reactid="809">Do not do any of the following:</p>
         <ul data-reactid="810">
          <li data-reactid="811">Abuse Cloudflare systems or customers</li>
          <li data-reactid="812">Misuse Cloudflare trademarks</li>
          <li data-reactid="813">Misrepresent Cloudflare services as your own</li>
         </ul>
         <p data-reactid="814"><em data-reactid="815">Abuse</em><!-- react-text: 816 -->: Follow all guidelines, including the rate limits defined <!-- /react-text --><a href="#requests" data-reactid="817">below</a><!-- react-text: 818 -->. Your ability to use the Cloudflare APIs may be terminated, temporarily or permanently, if our systems are abused. Similarly, anything in an application which goes against the goal of making Cloudflare more useful to Cloudflare customers or attempts to mistreat customers or their data will be grounds for termination.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="819"><em data-reactid="820">Trademarks</em><!-- react-text: 821 -->: Cloudflare has several registered trademarks. Details on how and when you may use Cloudflare trademarks are found at https://www.cloudflare.com/trademark, with links to specifics on <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 822 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://www.cloudflare.com/logo" data-reactid="823">logo use</a><!-- react-text: 824 --> and <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://www.cloudflare.com/spelling" data-reactid="825">spelling</a><!-- react-text: 826 -->. Please review carefully.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="827"><em data-reactid="828">Misrepresentation</em><!-- react-text: 829 -->: Draw a clear line between the benefits you provide in your application and those benefits of the Cloudflare service that you enable via API. The APIs are not intended for "white labeling" or reselling Cloudflare services as your own. Nothing in your service or application should create a false sense of endorsement, sponsorship, or association with Cloudflare. You may sell your own application or service which utilizes the Cloudflare APIs, but may not sell Cloudflare services to customers without a commercial agreement with Cloudflare.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="830"><!-- react-text: 831 -->The full Cloudflare Terms of Use are found at <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://www.cloudflare.com/terms" data-reactid="832">https://www.cloudflare.com/terms</a><!-- react-text: 833 -->.<!-- /react-text --></p>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="834">
         <a class="anchor2" id="getting-started-endpoints" data-reactid="835">getting-started-endpoints</a>
         <h2 data-reactid="836">Endpoints</h2>
         <p data-reactid="837">The API is accessed by making HTTPS requests to a specific version endpoint URL, in which GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE methods dictate how your interact with the information available. Every endpoint is accessed only via the SSL-enabled HTTPS (port 443) protocol.</p>
         <p data-reactid="838">Everything (methods, parameters, etc.) is fixed to a version number, and every call must contain one. The latest version is Version 4.</p>
         <p data-reactid="839">The stable base URL for all Version 4 HTTPS endpoints is:</p>
         <p class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="840">https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/</p>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="841">
         <a class="anchor2" id="getting-started-requests" data-reactid="842">getting-started-requests</a>
         <h2 data-reactid="843">Requests</h2>
         <p data-reactid="844">Requests must be sent over HTTPS with any payload formatted in JSON. Depending on if a request is authenticated with the new API Tokens or the old API Keys, required headers differ and are detailed below.</p>
         <h4 data-reactid="845">API Tokens</h4>
         <p data-reactid="846"><!-- react-text: 847 -->API Tokens provide a new way to authenticate with the Cloudflare API. They allow for scoped and permissioned access to resources and use the RFC compliant <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750#section-2.1" data-reactid="848">Authorization Bearer Token Header</a><!-- react-text: 849 -->.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="850">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="851"><em data-reactid="852">Required</em><!-- react-text: 853 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <table class="table table-striped input-parameters" data-reactid="854">
           <thead data-reactid="855">
            <tr data-reactid="856">
             <th data-reactid="857">Name</th>
             <th data-reactid="858">Format</th>
             <th data-reactid="859">Description</th>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="860">
            <tr data-reactid="861">
             <td data-reactid="862"><strong data-reactid="863">API Token</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="864"><em data-reactid="865">Authorization: Bearer &lt;token&gt;</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="866"><!-- react-text: 867 -->API Token generated from the <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens" data-reactid="868">User Profile 'API Tokens' page</a></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
          <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="869">
           <h4 data-reactid="870">Example request</h4>
           <p data-reactid="871">Requests are generally formatted as follows:</p>
           <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="872">GET object/:object_id</pre>
          </div>
          <div class="mod-content" data-reactid="873">
           <h5 data-reactid="874"><!-- react-text: 875 -->API Token cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="876">(example)</small></h5>
          </div>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="877">
           <pre data-reactid="878">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/cd7d0123e3012345da9420df9514dad0" \
     -H "Content-Type:application/json" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer YQSn-xWAQiiEh9qM58wZNnyQS7FUdoqGIUAbrh7T"</pre>
          </div>
         </section>
         <h4 data-reactid="879">API Keys</h4>
         <p data-reactid="880"><!-- react-text: 881 -->All requests must include both <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="882">X-Auth-Key</span><!-- react-text: 883 --> and <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="884">X-Auth-Email</span><!-- react-text: 885 --> headers to authenticate. Requests that use <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="886">X-Auth-User-Service-Key</span><!-- react-text: 887 --> can use that instead of the Auth-Key and Auth-Email headers.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="888">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="889"><em data-reactid="890">Required</em><!-- react-text: 891 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <table class="table table-striped input-parameters" data-reactid="892">
           <thead data-reactid="893">
            <tr data-reactid="894">
             <th data-reactid="895">Name</th>
             <th data-reactid="896">Format</th>
             <th data-reactid="897">Description</th>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="898">
            <tr data-reactid="899">
             <td data-reactid="900"><strong data-reactid="901">API Key</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="902"><em data-reactid="903">X-Auth-Key</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="904">API key generated on the "My Account" page</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="905">
             <td data-reactid="906"><strong data-reactid="907">Email</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="908"><em data-reactid="909">X-Auth-Email</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="910">Email address associated with your account</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="911">
             <td data-reactid="912"><strong data-reactid="913">User Service Key</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="914"><em data-reactid="915">X-Auth-User-Service-Key</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="916">A special Cloudflare API key good for a restricted set of endpoints. Always begins with "v1.0-", may vary in length.</td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
          <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="917">
           <h4 data-reactid="918">Example request</h4>
           <p data-reactid="919">Requests are generally formatted as follows:</p>
           <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="920">GET object/:object_id</pre>
          </div>
          <div class="mod-content" data-reactid="921">
           <h5 data-reactid="922"><!-- react-text: 923 -->Auth-Email cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="924">(example)</small></h5>
          </div>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="925">
           <pre data-reactid="926">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/cd7d0123e3012345da9420df9514dad0" \
     -H "Content-Type:application/json" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key:1234567893feefc5f0q5000bfo0c38d90bbeb" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email:example@example.com"</pre>
          </div>
          <div class="mod-content" data-reactid="927">
           <h5 data-reactid="928"><!-- react-text: 929 -->User-Service cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="930">(example)</small></h5>
          </div>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="931">
           <pre data-reactid="932"><!-- react-text: 933 -->curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/cd7d0123e3012345da9420df9514dad0" \
     -H "Content-Type:application/json" \
     -H "X-Auth-User-Service-Key:v1.0-e24fd090c02efcfecb4de8f4ff246fd5c75b48946fdf0ce26c59f91d0d90797b-cfa33fe60e8e34073c149323454383fc9005d25c9b4c502c2f063457ef65322eade065975001a0b4b4c591c5e1bd36a6e8f7e2d4fa8a9ec01c64c041e99530c2-07b9efe0acd78c82c8d9c690aacb8656d81c369246d7f996a205fe3c18e9254a"<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 934 -->`<!-- /react-text --></pre>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="935">
          <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="936">
           <h4 data-reactid="937">Rate limiting</h4>
           <p data-reactid="938">The Cloudflare API sets a maximum of 1,200 requests in a five minute period.</p>
          </header>
         </section>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="939">
          <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="940">
           <h4 data-reactid="941">Pagination</h4>
           <p data-reactid="942">Depending on your request, the results returned may be limited. You can page through the returned results with the following query parameters.</p>
          </div>
          <table class="table table-striped input-parameters" data-reactid="943">
           <thead data-reactid="944">
            <tr data-reactid="945">
             <th data-reactid="946">Name</th>
             <th data-reactid="947">Type</th>
             <th data-reactid="948">Description</th>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="949">
            <tr data-reactid="950">
             <td data-reactid="951"><strong data-reactid="952">page</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="953"><em data-reactid="954">integer</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="955">Which page of results to return</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="956">
             <td data-reactid="957"><strong data-reactid="958">per_page</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="959"><em data-reactid="960">integer</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="961">How many results to return per page</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="962">
             <td data-reactid="963"><strong data-reactid="964">order</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="965"><em data-reactid="966">string</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="967">Attribute name to order the responses by</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="968">
             <td data-reactid="969"><strong data-reactid="970">direction</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="971"><em data-reactid="972">string</em></td>
             <td data-reactid="973"><!-- react-text: 974 -->Either <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="975">asc</span><!-- react-text: 976 --> or <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="977">desc</span></td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
          <div class="mod-content" data-reactid="978">
           <h5 data-reactid="979"><!-- react-text: 980 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="981">(example)</small></h5>
           <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="982">GET zones/:zone_identifier/dns_records</pre>
          </div>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="983">
           <pre data-reactid="984">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/cd7d068de3012345da9420df9514dad0/dns_records?page=3&amp;per_page=20&amp;order=type&amp;direction=asc" \
     -H "Content-Type:application/json" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key:1234567893feefc5f0q5000bfo0c38d90bbeb" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email:example@example.com"</pre>
          </div>
         </section>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="985">
         <a class="anchor2" id="getting-started-responses" data-reactid="986">getting-started-responses</a>
         <h2 data-reactid="987">Responses</h2>
         <div data-reactid="988">
          <h4 data-reactid="989">Format</h4>
          <p data-reactid="990"><!-- react-text: 991 -->Each response is a JSON object. The data requested is wrapped in the <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="992">result</span><!-- react-text: 993 --> tag. If you have a response, it will always be within the <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="994">result</span><!-- react-text: 995 --> field. We also include a <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="996">success</span><!-- react-text: 997 --> flag, an array of potential <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="998">errors</span><!-- react-text: 999 -->, and <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="1000">messages</span><!-- react-text: 1001 --> in the response. Some responses can have additional pagination info wrapped in the <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="1002">result_info</span></p>
          <p data-reactid="1003"><!-- react-text: 1004 -->An error object will contain an integer <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="1005">code</span><!-- react-text: 1006 --> field and a <!-- /react-text --><span class="label code" data-reactid="1007">message</span></p>
          <p data-reactid="1008">Date fields will always be in UTC ISO-8601 format, including microseconds.</p>
         </div>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1009">
          <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1010"><!-- react-text: 1011 -->Success Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1012">(example)</small></h5>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1013">
           <pre data-reactid="1014">{
  "result": {
    "id":"2d4d028de3015345da9420df5514dad0",
    "type":"A",
    "name":"blog.example.com",
    "content":"2.6.4.5",
    "proxiable":true,
    "proxied":false,
    "ttl":1,
    "priority":0,
    "locked":false,
    "zone_id":"cd7d068de3012345da9420df9514dad0",
    "zone_name":"example.com",
    "modified_on":"2014-05-28T18:46:18.764425Z",
    "created_on":"2014-05-28T18:46:18.764425Z"
  },
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result_info": {
    "page": 1,
    "per_page": 20,
    "count": 1,
    "total_count": 200
  }
}</pre>
          </div>
         </section>
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1015">
          <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1016"><!-- react-text: 1017 -->Error Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1018">(example)</small></h5>
          <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1019">
           <pre data-reactid="1020">{
  "result": null,
  "success": false,
  "errors": [{"code":1003,"message":"Invalid or missing zone id."}],
  "messages": []
}</pre>
          </div>
         </section>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" id="content-types" data-reactid="1021">
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1022">
          <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="1023">
           <h4 data-reactid="1024">HTTP Content-Type</h4>
           <p data-reactid="1025">The response format can be determined from the HTTP Content-Type header. Most API responses are JSON (Content-Type: application/json).</p>
          </div>
          <table class="table table-striped input-parameters" data-reactid="1026">
           <thead data-reactid="1027">
            <tr data-reactid="1028">
             <th data-reactid="1029">Content-Type</th>
             <th data-reactid="1030">Description</th>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="1031">
            <tr data-reactid="1032">
             <td data-reactid="1033">application/json</td>
             <td data-reactid="1034">response is a JSON object</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1035">
             <td data-reactid="1036">text/plain</td>
             <td data-reactid="1037">response is a textual item</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1038">
             <td data-reactid="1039">application/x-yaml</td>
             <td data-reactid="1040">response is a YAML object</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1041">
             <td data-reactid="1042">application/octet-stream</td>
             <td data-reactid="1043">response is a raw data (reserved for later use)</td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </section>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" id="response-codes" data-reactid="1044">
         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1045">
          <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="1046">
           <h4 data-reactid="1047">HTTP response codes</h4>
           <p data-reactid="1048">The status of a response can be determined from the HTTP status code.</p>
          </div>
          <table class="table table-striped input-parameters" data-reactid="1049">
           <thead data-reactid="1050">
            <tr data-reactid="1051">
             <th data-reactid="1052">Code</th>
             <th data-reactid="1053">Status</th>
             <th data-reactid="1054">Description</th>
            </tr>
           </thead>
           <tbody data-reactid="1055">
            <tr data-reactid="1056">
             <td data-reactid="1057"><strong data-reactid="1058">200</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1059">OK</td>
             <td data-reactid="1060">request successful</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1061">
             <td data-reactid="1062"><strong data-reactid="1063">304</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1064">Not Modified</td>
             <td data-reactid="1065"></td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1066">
             <td data-reactid="1067"><strong data-reactid="1068">400</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1069">Bad Request</td>
             <td data-reactid="1070">request was invalid</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1071">
             <td data-reactid="1072"><strong data-reactid="1073">401</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1074">Unauthorized</td>
             <td data-reactid="1075">user does not have permission</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1076">
             <td data-reactid="1077"><strong data-reactid="1078">403</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1079">Forbidden</td>
             <td data-reactid="1080">request not authenticated</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1081">
             <td data-reactid="1082"><strong data-reactid="1083">429</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1084">Too many requests</td>
             <td data-reactid="1085">client is rate limited</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1086">
             <td data-reactid="1087"><strong data-reactid="1088">405</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1089">Method Not Allowed</td>
             <td data-reactid="1090">incorrect HTTP method provided</td>
            </tr>
            <tr data-reactid="1091">
             <td data-reactid="1092"><strong data-reactid="1093">415</strong></td>
             <td data-reactid="1094">Unsupported Media Type</td>
             <td data-reactid="1095">response is not valid JSON</td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
         </section>
        </article>
        <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="1096">
         <a class="anchor2" id="getting-started-resource-ids" data-reactid="1097">getting-started-resource-ids</a>
         <h2 data-reactid="1098">How to get a Zone ID, User ID, or Organization ID</h2>
         <p data-reactid="1099"><!-- react-text: 1100 -->Nearly every resource in the v4 API (Users, Zones, Settings, Organizations, etc.) may be uniquely identified by a 32-byte string of hex characters (<!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1101">[a-f0-9]</code><!-- react-text: 1102 -->). These identifiers may be referred to in the documentation as <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1103">zone_identifier</code><!-- react-text: 1104 -->, <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1105">user_id</code><!-- react-text: 1106 -->, or even just <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1107">id</code><!-- react-text: 1108 -->. Identifier values are usually captured during resource creation (POST requests) or when fetching entire collections (GET requests) of resources. Typically they appear as an <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1109">id</code><!-- react-text: 1110 --> field in the JSON resource.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <pre data-reactid="1111">{
  "result": {
    "id":"2d4d028de3015345da9420df5514dad0",
    "type":"example"
  }
}</pre>
         <p data-reactid="1112"><!-- react-text: 1113 -->You can always find the IDs for API resources by making a GET request to its corresponding collection endpoint. For example, to list all Zone objects, a GET request may be sent to https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones. All objects listed in the result array will contain an <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1114">id</code><!-- react-text: 1115 --> field; this is also known as <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="1116">zone_identifier</code><!-- react-text: 1117 -->.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <h3 data-reactid="1118">How to Get a Zone ID</h3>
         <pre data-reactid="1119">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones" \
    -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
    -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
        </article>
       </div>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="1120">
        <header data-reactid="1121">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="user" data-reactid="1122"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="1123">User</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="1124">The currently logged in/authenticated User</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1125">
         <a class="anchor" id="user-properties" data-reactid="1126">user</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="1127">
          <h4 data-reactid="1128"><!-- react-text: 1129 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="1130">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="1131"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="1132"><span class="verb" data-reactid="1133">Show</span><!-- react-text: 1134 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1135 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1136">
         <a class="anchor2" id="user-user-details" data-reactid="1137">user-user-details</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="1138">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="1139"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="1140">GET</span><!-- react-text: 1141 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1142 -->User Details<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1143 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="1144"><!-- react-text: 1145 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1146 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1147 -->com.cloudflare.api.user.read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="1148">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1149"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1150">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1151"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1152"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1153">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1154"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1155"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1156">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1157"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1158"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1159">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1160"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="1161"><!-- react-text: 1162 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1163 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1164 -->user<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1165"><!-- react-text: 1166 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1167">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1168">
          <pre data-reactid="1169">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1170"><!-- react-text: 1171 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1172">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1173">
          <pre data-reactid="1174">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "7c5dae5552338874e5053f2534d2767a",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Appleseed",
    "username": "cfuser12345",
    "telephone": "+1 123-123-1234",
    "country": "US",
    "zipcode": "12345",
    "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "two_factor_authentication_enabled": false,
    "suspended": false
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="1175">
         <a class="anchor2" id="user-edit-user" data-reactid="1176">user-edit-user</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="1177">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="1178"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="1179">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 1180 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1181 -->Edit User<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1182 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="1183"><!-- react-text: 1184 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1185 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1186 -->com.cloudflare.api.user.update<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="1187">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1188"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1189">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1190"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1191"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1192">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1193"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1194"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1195">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1196"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="1197"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="1198">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="1199"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="1200">
           <p>Edit part of your user details</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="1201"><!-- react-text: 1202 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1203 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 1204 -->user<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="1205">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1206"><em data-reactid="1207">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 1208 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="1209">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="1210">
            <thead data-reactid="1211">
             <tr data-reactid="1212">
              <td data-reactid="1213"><!-- react-text: 1214 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="1215">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="1216"><!-- react-text: 1217 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="1218">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="1219">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="1220">
             <tr data-reactid="1221">

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1314">
          <pre data-reactid="1315">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"first_name":"John","last_name":"Appleseed","telephone":"+1 123-123-1234","country":"US","zipcode":"12345"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1316"><!-- react-text: 1317 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1318">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="1320">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "7c5dae5552338874e5053f2534d2767a",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Appleseed",
    "username": "cfuser12345",
    "telephone": "+1 123-123-1234",
    "country": "US",
    "zipcode": "12345",
    "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
    "two_factor_authentication_enabled": false,
    "suspended": false
  }
}</pre>
         </div>

               </div>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="1581"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="1582">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="1583"><strong data-reactid="1584">condition</strong><br data-reactid="1585"><small data-reactid="1586"><em data-reactid="1587"><!-- react-text: 1588 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="1589">
               <div data-reactid="1590">
                <p>Defines the extra limitation on how and/or where the token can be used</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="1591">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="1592"><code data-reactid="1593">{ "request.ip": { "in": [ "199.27.128.0/21", "2400:cb00::/32" ], "not_in": [ "199.27.128.0/21", "2400:cb00::/32" ] } }</code></small><span data-reactid="1594"><br data-reactid="1595"><!-- react-text: 1596 -->An object with the following properties:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="1597">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="1598"><span class="verb" data-reactid="1599">Show</span><!-- react-text: 1600 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="1601">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="1602"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="1603"><!-- react-text: 1604 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="1605">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="1606">
          <pre data-reactid="1607">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/tokens" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer 8M7wS6hCpXVc-DoRnPPY_UCWPgy8aea4Wy6kCe5T" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"readonly token","not_before":"2018-07-01T05:20:00Z","expires_on":"2020-01-01T00:00:00Z","policies":[{"id":"f267e341f3dd4697bd3b9f71dd96247f","effect":"allow","resources":{"com.cloudflare.api.account.zone.eb78d65290b24279ba6f44721b3ea3c4":"*","com.cloudflare.api.account.zone.22b1de5f1c0e4b3ea97bb1e963b06a43":"*"},"permission_groups":[{"id":"c8fed203ed3043cba015a93ad1616f1f","name":"Zone Read"},{"id":"82e64a83756745bbbb1c9c2701bf816b","name":"DNS Read"}]}],"condition":{"request.ip":{"in":["199.27.128.0/21","2400:cb00::/32"],"not_in":["199.27.128.0/21","2400:cb00::/32"]}}}'</pre>
         </div>

          "com.cloudflare.api.account.zone.22b1de5f1c0e4b3ea97bb1e963b06a43": "*"
        },
        "permission_groups": [
          {
            "id": "c8fed203ed3043cba015a93ad1616f1f",
            "name": "Zone Read"
          },
          {
            "id": "82e64a83756745bbbb1c9c2701bf816b",
            "name": "DNS Read"
          }
        ]
      }
    ],
    "condition": {
      "request.ip": {
        "in": [
          "199.27.128.0/21",
          "2400:cb00::/32"
        ],
        "not_in": [
          "199.27.128.0/21",
          "2400:cb00::/32"
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \

          <div data-reactid="2233">
           <p>Accept or reject this account invitation</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="2234"><!-- react-text: 2235 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 2236 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 2237 -->memberships/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="2238">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="2239"><em data-reactid="2240">Required</em><!-- react-text: 2241 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="2242">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="2243">
            <thead data-reactid="2244">
             <tr data-reactid="2245">
              <td data-reactid="2246"><!-- react-text: 2247 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="2248">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="2249"><!-- react-text: 2250 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="2251">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="2252">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="2253">
             <tr data-reactid="2254">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="2255"><strong data-reactid="2256">status</strong><br data-reactid="2257"><small data-reactid="2258"><em data-reactid="2259"><!-- react-text: 2260 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="2261">
               <div data-reactid="2262">
                <p>Whether to accept or reject this account invitation</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="2263">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="2264"><code data-reactid="2265">"accepted"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="2266">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="2267">
                <li data-reactid="2268"><!-- react-text: 2269 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 2270 -->accepted, rejected<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="2271"><!-- react-text: 2272 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="2273">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="2275">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/memberships/4536bcfad5faccb111b47003c79917fa" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"status":"accepted"}'</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="2458">

     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \

         </div>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="2798"></div></li>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="2804"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="2805">
           <p>Add a user to the list of members for this account</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="2806"><!-- react-text: 2807 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 2808 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 2809 -->accounts/:account_identifier/members<!-- /react-text --></pre>

     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"email":"user@example.com","status":"accepted","roles":["3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb"]}'</pre>
         </div>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="3340">
               <div data-reactid="3341">
                <p>The end of the current period, and also when the next billing is due</p> 
               </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="3343"><code data-reactid="3344">"2014-03-31T12:20:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="3345">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="3346">
                <li data-reactid="3347">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>

         </div>

         <a class="anchor2" id="account-subscriptions-update-subscription" data-reactid="3521">account-subscriptions-update-subscription</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="3522">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="3523"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="3524">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 3525 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3526 -->Update Subscription<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3527 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="3528"><!-- react-text: 3529 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3530 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3531 -->#billing:read<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3532 -->#billing:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="3533">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="3534"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3535">free</h6>

                <li data-reactid="3725"><!-- react-text: 3726 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3727 -->Trial, Provisioned, Paid, AwaitingPayment, Cancelled, Failed, Expired<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="3728">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="3729">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="3730"><strong data-reactid="3731">id</strong><br data-reactid="3732"><small data-reactid="3733"><em data-reactid="3734"><!-- react-text: 3735 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="3736">
               <div data-reactid="3737">
                <p>Subscription identifier tag</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="3738">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="3739"><code data-reactid="3740">"506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="3741">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="3742">
                <li data-reactid="3743"><!-- react-text: 3744 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3745 -->32<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="3746">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="3747">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="3748"><strong data-reactid="3749">frequency</strong><br data-reactid="3750"><small data-reactid="3751"><em data-reactid="3752"><!-- react-text: 3753 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="3754">
               <div data-reactid="3755">
                <p>How often the subscription is renewed automatically</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="3756">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="3757"><code data-reactid="3758">"monthly"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="3759">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="3760">
                <li data-reactid="3761"><!-- react-text: 3762 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3763 -->weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3764"><!-- react-text: 3765 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3766">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="3767">
          <pre data-reactid="3768">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/subscriptions/506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"app":{"install_id":null},"id":"506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2","state":"Paid","price":20,"currency":"USD","component_values":[{"name":"page_rules","value":20,"default":5,"price":5}],"zone":{"id":"023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353","name":"example.com"},"frequency":"monthly","rate_plan":{"id":"free","public_name":"Business Plan","currency":"USD","scope":"zone","sets":[{}],"is_contract":false,"externally_managed":false},"current_period_end":"2014-03-31T12:20:00Z","current_period_start":"2014-05-11T12:20:00Z"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3769"><!-- react-text: 3770 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3771">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="3772">
          <pre data-reactid="3773">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "app": {
      "install_id": null
    },
    "id": "506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2",
    "state": "Paid",
    "price": 20,
    "currency": "USD",
    "component_values": [
      {
        "name": "page_rules",
        "value": 20,
        "default": 5,
        "price": 5
      }
    ],
    "zone": {
      "id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
      "name": "example.com"
    },
    "frequency": "monthly",
    "rate_plan": {
      "id": "free",
      "public_name": "Business Plan",
      "currency": "USD",
      "scope": "zone",
      "sets": [
        {}
      ],
      "is_contract": false,
      "externally_managed": false
    },
    "current_period_end": "2014-03-31T12:20:00Z",
    "current_period_start": "2014-05-11T12:20:00Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="3774">
         <a class="anchor2" id="account-subscriptions-delete-subscription" data-reactid="3775">account-subscriptions-delete-subscription</a>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="3777"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="3778">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 3779 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3780 -->Delete Subscription<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3781 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="3782"><!-- react-text: 3783 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3784 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3785 -->#billing:edit<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="3786">
           <p>Deletes an account's subscription</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="3787"><!-- react-text: 3788 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3789 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3790 -->accounts/:account_identifier/subscriptions/:subscription_identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3791"><!-- react-text: 3792 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3793">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="3795">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/subscriptions/506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

  }

         </div>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="3801">
        <header data-reactid="3802">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="organizations" data-reactid="3803"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="3804">Organizations</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="3805">An Organization is an entity which holds a set of zones for multiple users to interact with.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="3806">
          <p>Please use equivalent <code>/accounts</code> API endpoints. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to organization APIs.</p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="3807">
         <a class="anchor" id="organizations-properties" data-reactid="3808">organizations</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="3809">
          <h4 data-reactid="3810"><!-- react-text: 3811 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="3812">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="3813"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="3814"><span class="verb" data-reactid="3815">Show</span><!-- react-text: 3816 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3817 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="3818">
         <div class="deprecation-warning-block" data-reactid="3819">
          <h3 class="text-warning" data-reactid="3820">Deprecation Warning</h3>
          <p class="deprecation-date" data-reactid="3821">End of life Date: February 4, 2020</p>
          <p data-reactid="3822">This endpoint and its related APIs are deprecated in favor of the `/accounts` equivalent APIs, which have a broader range of features and are backwards compatible with these API.</p>
         </div><a class="anchor2" id="organizations-organization-details" data-reactid="3823">organizations-organization-details</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="3824">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="3825"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="3826">GET</span><!-- react-text: 3827 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3828 -->Organization Details<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3829 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="3830"><!-- react-text: 3831 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3832 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3833 -->#organization:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="3834">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3835"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3836">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3837"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3838"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3839">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3840"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3841"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3842">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3843"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="3844"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3845">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="3846"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="3847">
           <p>Get information about a specific organization that you are a member of</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="3848"><!-- react-text: 3849 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3850 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3851 -->organizations/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3852"><!-- react-text: 3853 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3854">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="3855">
          <pre data-reactid="3856">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/organizations/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="3939">
        <header data-reactid="3940">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="organization-invites" data-reactid="3941"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="3942">Organization Invites</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="3943">Invitations to potential members that this organization has created</h4>
         <div data-reactid="3944">
          <p>Please use equivalent <code>/accounts</code> API endpoints. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to organization APIs.</p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="3945">
         <a class="anchor" id="organization-invites-properties" data-reactid="3946">organization-invites</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="3947">

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="3956">
         <div class="deprecation-warning-block" data-reactid="3957">

          <p class="deprecation-date" data-reactid="3959">End of life Date: February 4, 2020</p>
          <p data-reactid="3960">This endpoint and its related APIs are deprecated in favor of the `/accounts` equivalent APIs, which have a broader range of features and are backwards compatible with these API.</p>
         </div><a class="anchor2" id="organization-invites-list-invitations" data-reactid="3961">organization-invites-list-invitations</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="3962">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="3963"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="3964">GET</span><!-- react-text: 3965 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3966 -->List Invitations<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3967 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="3968"><!-- react-text: 3969 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3970 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3971 -->#organization:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="3972">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3973"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3974">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3975"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3976"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3977">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3978"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="3979"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3980">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="3981"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="3982"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="3983">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="3984"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="3985">
           <p>List all invitations associated with an organization</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="3986"><!-- react-text: 3987 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3988 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 3989 -->organizations/:organization_identifier/invites<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3990"><!-- react-text: 3991 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3992">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="3993">
          <pre data-reactid="3994">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/organizations/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/invites" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="3995"><!-- react-text: 3996 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="3997">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="3999">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "4f5f0c14a2a41d5063dd301b2f829f04",
      "invited_member_id": "5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
      "invited_member_email": "user@example.com",
      "organization_id": "5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
      "organization_name": "Cloudflare, Inc.",
      "roles": [
        {
          "id": "3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb",

            "#zones:read"
          ]
        }

         </div><a class="anchor2" id="organization-invites-cancel-invitation" data-reactid="4260">organization-invites-cancel-invitation</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="4261">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="4262"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="4263">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 4264 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4265 -->Cancel Invitation<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4266 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4267"><!-- react-text: 4268 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4269 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4270 -->#organization:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="4271">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4272"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4273">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4274"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4275"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4276">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4277"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4278"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4279">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4280"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="4281"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4282">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="4283"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="4284">
           <p>Cancel an existing invitation</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="4285"><!-- react-text: 4286 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4287 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4288 -->organizations/:organization_identifier/invites/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4289"><!-- react-text: 4290 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4291">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4292">
          <pre data-reactid="4293">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/organizations/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/invites/4f5f0c14a2a41d5063dd301b2f829f04" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4294"><!-- react-text: 4295 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4296">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4297">
          <pre data-reactid="4298">{
  "id": "4f5f0c14a2a41d5063dd301b2f829f04"
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="4299">
        <header data-reactid="4300">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="organization-members" data-reactid="4301"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="4302">Organization Members</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="4303">A member is the association of a Cloudflare user with an Organization.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="4304">
          <p>Please use equivalent <code>/accounts</code> API endpoints. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to organization APIs.</p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4305">
         <a class="anchor" id="organization-members-properties" data-reactid="4306">organization-members</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="4307">
          <h4 data-reactid="4308"><!-- react-text: 4309 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="4310">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="4311"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="4312"><span class="verb" data-reactid="4313">Show</span><!-- react-text: 4314 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4315 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4316">
         <div class="deprecation-warning-block" data-reactid="4317">

          <p data-reactid="4320">This endpoint and its related APIs are deprecated in favor of the `/accounts` equivalent APIs, which have a broader range of features and are backwards compatible with these API.</p>
         </div><a class="anchor2" id="organization-members-list-members" data-reactid="4321">organization-members-list-members</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="4322">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="4323"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="4324">GET</span><!-- react-text: 4325 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4326 -->List Members<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4327 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4328"><!-- react-text: 4329 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4330 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4331 -->#organization:read<!-- /react-text --></small>

            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4333"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4334">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4335"></div></li>

  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],

          ]
        }

    }

         </div>
         <div data-reactid="4438">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4439"><em data-reactid="4440">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 4441 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="4442">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="4443">
            <thead data-reactid="4444">
             <tr data-reactid="4445">
              <td data-reactid="4446"><!-- react-text: 4447 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4448">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4449"><!-- react-text: 4450 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4451">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4452">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="4453">
             <tr data-reactid="4454">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4455"><strong data-reactid="4456">roles</strong><br data-reactid="4457"><small data-reactid="4458"><em data-reactid="4459"><!-- react-text: 4460 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="4461">
               <div data-reactid="4462">
                <p>Array of Roles associated with this Member</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="4463">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="4464"><code data-reactid="4465">[ "3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="4466"><br data-reactid="4467"><!-- react-text: 4468 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="4469">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="4470"><span class="verb" data-reactid="4471">Show</span><!-- react-text: 4472 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="4473">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="4474"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4478">
          <pre data-reactid="4479">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/organizations/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/members/7c5dae5552338874e5053f2534d2767a" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"roles":["3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb"]}'</pre>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="4529">
        <header data-reactid="4530">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="organization-roles" data-reactid="4531"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="4532">Organization Roles</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="4533">A role defines what permissions a Member of an Organization has.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="4534">
          <p>Please use equivalent <code>/accounts</code> API endpoints. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to organization APIs.</p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4535">
         <a class="anchor" id="organization-roles-properties" data-reactid="4536">organization-roles</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="4537">
          <h4 data-reactid="4538"><!-- react-text: 4539 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="4540">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="4541"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="4542"><span class="verb" data-reactid="4543">Show</span><!-- react-text: 4544 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4545 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4546">
         <div class="deprecation-warning-block" data-reactid="4547">
          <h3 class="text-warning" data-reactid="4548">Deprecation Warning</h3>
          <p class="deprecation-date" data-reactid="4549">End of life Date: February 4, 2020</p>
          <p data-reactid="4550">This endpoint and its related APIs are deprecated in favor of the `/accounts` equivalent APIs, which have a broader range of features and are backwards compatible with these API.</p>
         </div><a class="anchor2" id="organization-roles-list-roles" data-reactid="4551">organization-roles-list-roles</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="4552">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="4553"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="4554">GET</span><!-- react-text: 4555 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4556 -->List Roles<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4557 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4558"><!-- react-text: 4559 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4560 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4561 -->#organization:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="4562">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4563"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4564">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4565"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4566"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4567">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4568"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4569"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4570">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4571"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="4572"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4573">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="4574"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="4575">
           <p>Get all available roles for an organization</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="4576"><!-- react-text: 4577 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4578 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4579 -->organizations/:organization_identifier/roles<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4580"><!-- react-text: 4581 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4582">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4583">
          <pre data-reactid="4584">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/organizations/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/roles" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4585"><!-- react-text: 4586 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4587">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="4589">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb",
      "name": "Organization Admin",
      "description": "Administrative access to the entire Organization",
      "permissions": [
        "#zones:read"
      ]
    }
  ]

         </div>
        </section>

          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="4744"><!-- react-text: 4745 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4746 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4747 -->user/invites/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="4748">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4749"><em data-reactid="4750">Required</em><!-- react-text: 4751 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="4752">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="4753">
            <thead data-reactid="4754">
             <tr data-reactid="4755">
              <td data-reactid="4756"><!-- react-text: 4757 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4758">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4759"><!-- react-text: 4760 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4761">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4762">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="4763">
             <tr data-reactid="4764">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4765"><strong data-reactid="4766">status</strong><br data-reactid="4767"><small data-reactid="4768"><em data-reactid="4769"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="4770">
               <div data-reactid="4771">
                <p>Status of your response to the invitation (rejected or accepted)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="4772">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="4773"><code data-reactid="4774">"accepted"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="4775">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="4776">
                <li data-reactid="4777"><!-- react-text: 4778 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4779 -->accepted, rejected<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4780"><!-- react-text: 4781 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4782">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4783">
          <pre data-reactid="4784">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/invites/4f5f0c14a2a41d5063dd301b2f829f04" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"status":"accepted"}'</pre>
         </div>

        <header data-reactid="4791">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="user-s-organizations" data-reactid="4792"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="4793">User's Organizations</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="4794">A list of organizations this user is a member of</h4>
         <div data-reactid="4795">
          <p>Please use equivalent <code>/accounts</code> API endpoints. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to organization APIs.</p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4796">
         <a class="anchor" id="user-s-organizations-properties" data-reactid="4797">user-s-organizations</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="4798">
