          <p data-reactid="4801">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="4802"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="4803"><span class="verb" data-reactid="4804">Show</span><!-- react-text: 4805 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4806 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="4807">
         <a class="anchor2" id="user-s-organizations-list-organizations" data-reactid="4808">user-s-organizations-list-organizations</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="4809">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="4810"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="4811">GET</span><!-- react-text: 4812 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4813 -->List Organizations<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4814 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="4815">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4816"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4817">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4818"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4819"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4820">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4821"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="4822"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4823">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="4824"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="4825"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="4826">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="4827"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="4828">
           <p>List organizations the user is associated with</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="4829"><!-- react-text: 4830 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4831 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4832 -->user/organizations<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="4833">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4834"><em data-reactid="4835">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 4836 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="4837">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="4838">
            <thead data-reactid="4839">
             <tr data-reactid="4840">
              <td data-reactid="4841"><!-- react-text: 4842 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4843">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4844"><!-- react-text: 4845 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="4846">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="4847">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="4848">
             <tr data-reactid="4849">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4850"><strong data-reactid="4851">status</strong><br data-reactid="4852"><small data-reactid="4853"><em data-reactid="4854"><!-- react-text: 4855 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="4856">
               <div data-reactid="4857">
                <p>Whether or not the user is a member of the organization or has an inivitation pending</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="4858">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="4859"><code data-reactid="4860">"member"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="4861">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="4862">
                <li data-reactid="4863"><!-- react-text: 4864 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 4865 -->member, invited<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="4866">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4867"><strong data-reactid="4868">name</strong><br data-reactid="4869"><small data-reactid="4870"><em data-reactid="4871"><!-- react-text: 4872 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="4873">
               <div data-reactid="4874">
                <p>Organization Name</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="4875">

              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="4878">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="4879">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="4883">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4884"><strong data-reactid="4885">page</strong><br data-reactid="4886"><small data-reactid="4887"><em data-reactid="4888"><!-- react-text: 4889 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>

               </div></td>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="4896">

             <tr data-reactid="4902">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4903"><strong data-reactid="4904">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="4905"><small data-reactid="4906"><em data-reactid="4907"><!-- react-text: 4908 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>

             <tr data-reactid="4925">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="4959">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="4960"><strong data-reactid="4961">match</strong><br data-reactid="4962"><small data-reactid="4963"><em data-reactid="4964"><!-- react-text: 4965 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="4966">

                <p>Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)</p> 
               </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="4969"><code data-reactid="4970">"all"</code></small>
               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="4977"><!-- react-text: 4978 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="4979">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="4980">
          <pre data-reactid="4981">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/organizations?status=member&amp;name=Cloudflare, Inc.&amp;page=1&amp;per_page=20&amp;order=status&amp;direction=desc&amp;match=all" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="5206"><code data-reactid="5207">20</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="5208">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="5209">
                <li data-reactid="5210">default value: 20</li>
                <li data-reactid="5211"><!-- react-text: 5212 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5213 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5214 -->5<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="5215"><!-- react-text: 5216 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5217 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5218 -->50<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="5219">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="5220"><strong data-reactid="5221">order</strong><br data-reactid="5222"><small data-reactid="5223"><em data-reactid="5224"><!-- react-text: 5225 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="5226">
               <div data-reactid="5227">
                <p>Field to order billing history by</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="5228">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="5229"><code data-reactid="5230">"occured_at"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="5231">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="5232">
                <li data-reactid="5233"><!-- react-text: 5234 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5235 -->type, occured_at, action<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="5236">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="5237"><strong data-reactid="5238">type</strong><br data-reactid="5239"><small data-reactid="5240"><em data-reactid="5241"><!-- react-text: 5242 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="5243">
               <div data-reactid="5244">
                <p>The billing item type</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="5245">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="5246"><code data-reactid="5247">"charge"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="5248">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="5249">

                <li data-reactid="5253">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="5254">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="5255"><strong data-reactid="5256">occured_at</strong><br data-reactid="5257"><small data-reactid="5258"><em data-reactid="5259"><!-- react-text: 5260 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5261 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="5262">
               <div data-reactid="5263">
                <p>When the billing item was created</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="5264">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="5265"><code data-reactid="5266">"2014-03-01T12:21:59.3456Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="5267">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="5270">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="5271"><strong data-reactid="5272">action</strong><br data-reactid="5273"><small data-reactid="5274"><em data-reactid="5275"><!-- react-text: 5276 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="5277">
               <div data-reactid="5278">

               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="5288"><!-- react-text: 5289 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="5290">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="5291">
          <pre data-reactid="5292">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/billing/history?page=1&amp;per_page=20&amp;order=occured_at&amp;type=charge&amp;occured_at=2014-03-01T12:21:59.3456Z&amp;action=subscription" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="5293"><!-- react-text: 5294 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="5295">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="5296">
          <pre data-reactid="5297">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "b69a9f3492637782896352daae219e7d",
      "type": "charge",
      "action": "subscription",
      "description": "The billing item description",
      "occurred_at": "2014-03-01T12:21:59.3456Z",
      "amount": 20.99,
      "currency": "USD",
      "zone": {
        "name": "example.com"
      }
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="5314">
         <a class="anchor2" id="user-subscription-get-user-subscriptions" data-reactid="5315">user-subscription-get-user-subscriptions</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="5316">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="5317"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="5318">GET</span><!-- react-text: 5319 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5320 -->Get User Subscriptions<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5321 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="5322"><!-- react-text: 5323 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5324 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5325 -->#billing:read<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="5326">
           <p>Lists all a user's subscriptions</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="5327"><!-- react-text: 5328 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5329 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5330 -->user/subscriptions<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="5331"><!-- react-text: 5332 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="5333">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="5335">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/subscriptions" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

          "name": "page_rules",

               <div data-reactid="5576">
                <p>How often the subscription is renewed automatically</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="5577">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="5578"><code data-reactid="5579">"monthly"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="5580">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="5581">
                <li data-reactid="5582"><!-- react-text: 5583 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5584 -->weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="5585"><!-- react-text: 5586 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="5587">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="5588">
          <pre data-reactid="5589">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/subscriptions/506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"app":{"install_id":null},"id":"506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2","state":"Paid","price":20,"currency":"USD","component_values":[{"name":"page_rules","value":20,"default":5,"price":5}],"zone":{"id":"023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353","name":"example.com"},"frequency":"monthly","rate_plan":{"id":"free","public_name":"Business Plan","currency":"USD","scope":"zone","sets":[{}],"is_contract":false,"externally_managed":false},"current_period_end":"2014-03-31T12:20:00Z","current_period_start":"2014-05-11T12:20:00Z"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="5590"><!-- react-text: 5591 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="5592">(example)</small></h5>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="5854"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="5855">
           <p>Zone subscription details</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="5856"><!-- react-text: 5857 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5858 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 5859 -->zones/:identifier/subscription<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="6127"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="6128">POST</span><!-- react-text: 6129 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6130 -->Create Zone Subscription<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6131 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="6132"><!-- react-text: 6133 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6134 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6135 -->#billing:read<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6136 -->#billing:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>

          <pre data-reactid="6372">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2/subscription" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"app":{"install_id":null},"id":"506e3185e9c882d175a2d0cb0093d9f2","state":"Paid","price":20,"currency":"USD","component_values":[{"name":"page_rules","value":20,"default":5,"price":5}],"zone":{"id":"023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353","name":"example.com"},"frequency":"monthly","rate_plan":{"id":"free","public_name":"Business Plan","currency":"USD","scope":"zone","sets":[{}],"is_contract":false,"externally_managed":false},"current_period_end":"2014-03-31T12:20:00Z","current_period_start":"2014-05-11T12:20:00Z"}'</pre>
         </div>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="6397"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="6398">GET</span><!-- react-text: 6399 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6400 -->List User Audit Logs<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6401 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="6402">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="6403"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="6404">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="6405"></div></li>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="6414"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="6415">
           <p>Get audit logs for a user account, filter by who made the change, which zone was the change was made on, and the timeframe of the change</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="6416"><!-- react-text: 6417 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6418 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6419 -->user/audit_logs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

               </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6561"><code data-reactid="6562">"2019-04-30T01:12:20Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6564"></ul></td>
             </tr>

               <div data-reactid="6573">
                <p>Find a specific log by its ID.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6574">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6575"><code data-reactid="6576">"f174be97-19b1-40d6-954d-70cd5fbd52db"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6577">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6578"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6579">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6580"><strong data-reactid="6581">direction</strong><br data-reactid="6582"><small data-reactid="6583"><em data-reactid="6584"><!-- react-text: 6585 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6586">
               <div data-reactid="6587">
                <p>Change the direction of the chronological sorting.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6588">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6589"><code data-reactid="6590">"desc"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6591">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6592">
                <li data-reactid="6593">default value: desc</li>
                <li data-reactid="6594"><!-- react-text: 6595 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6596 -->desc, asc<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6597">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6598"><strong data-reactid="6599">before</strong><br data-reactid="6600"><small data-reactid="6601"><em data-reactid="6602"><!-- react-text: 6603 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6604 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6605">
               <div data-reactid="6606">
                <p>Limit the returned results to logs older than the specified date. This can be a date string <code>2019-04-30</code> or an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC3339</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6607">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6608"><code data-reactid="6609">"2019-04-30T01:12:20Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6610">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6611"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="6612"><!-- react-text: 6613 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="6614">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="6615">
          <pre data-reactid="6616">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/user/audit_logs?id=f174be97-19b1-40d6-954d-70cd5fbd52db&amp;export=true&amp;action.type=add&amp;actor.ip=17.168.228.63&amp;actor.email=alice@example.com&amp;since=2019-04-30T01:12:20Z&amp;before=2019-04-30T01:12:20Z&amp;zone.name=example.com&amp;direction=desc&amp;per_page=25&amp;page=50" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

  "errors": null,

        "type": "change_setting",
        "result": true
      },
      "actor": {
        "id": "f6b5de0326bb5182b8a4840ee01ec774",

      },

             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6910">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6911"><strong data-reactid="6912">actor.email</strong><br data-reactid="6913"><small data-reactid="6914"><em data-reactid="6915"><!-- react-text: 6916 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6917 --> (email)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6918">
               <div data-reactid="6919">
                <p>Filter by the email address of the actor that made the change</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6920">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6921"><code data-reactid="6922">"alice@example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6923">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6924"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6925">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6926"><strong data-reactid="6927">zone.name</strong><br data-reactid="6928"><small data-reactid="6929"><em data-reactid="6930"><!-- react-text: 6931 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6932">
               <div data-reactid="6933">
                <p>Filter by the name of the zone associated to the change.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6934">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6935"><code data-reactid="6936">"example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6937">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6938"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6939">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6940"><strong data-reactid="6941">page</strong><br data-reactid="6942"><small data-reactid="6943"><em data-reactid="6944"><!-- react-text: 6945 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6946">
               <div data-reactid="6947">
                <p>Which page of results to return.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6948">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6949"><code data-reactid="6950">50</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6951">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6952">
                <li data-reactid="6953">default value: 1</li>
                <li data-reactid="6954"><!-- react-text: 6955 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6956 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6957 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6958">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6959"><strong data-reactid="6960">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="6961"><small data-reactid="6962"><em data-reactid="6963"><!-- react-text: 6964 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6965">
               <div data-reactid="6966">
                <p>How many results to return per page.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6967">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6968"><code data-reactid="6969">25</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6970">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6971">
                <li data-reactid="6972">default value: 100</li>
                <li data-reactid="6973"><!-- react-text: 6974 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6975 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6976 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="6977"><!-- react-text: 6978 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6979 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 6980 -->1000<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6981">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6982"><strong data-reactid="6983">action.type</strong><br data-reactid="6984"><small data-reactid="6985"><em data-reactid="6986"><!-- react-text: 6987 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="6988">
               <div data-reactid="6989">
                <p>Filter by the action type.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="6990">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="6991"><code data-reactid="6992">"add"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="6993">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="6994"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="6995">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="6996"><strong data-reactid="6997">export</strong><br data-reactid="6998"><small data-reactid="6999"><em data-reactid="7000"><!-- react-text: 7001 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7002">
               <div data-reactid="7003">
                <p>Indicates that this request is an export of logs in CSV format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7004">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7005"><code data-reactid="7006">"true"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="7007">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="7008">
                <li data-reactid="7009">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="7010">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="7011"><strong data-reactid="7012">since</strong><br data-reactid="7013"><small data-reactid="7014"><em data-reactid="7015"><!-- react-text: 7016 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7017 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7018">
               <div data-reactid="7019">
                <p>Limit the returned results to logs newer than the specified date. This can be a date string <code>2019-04-30</code> or an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC3339</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7020">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7021"><code data-reactid="7022">"2019-04-30T01:12:20Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="7023">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="7024"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="7025">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="7026"><strong data-reactid="7027">id</strong><br data-reactid="7028"><small data-reactid="7029"><em data-reactid="7030"><!-- react-text: 7031 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7032">
               <div data-reactid="7033">
                <p>Find a specific log by its ID.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7034">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7035"><code data-reactid="7036">"f174be97-19b1-40d6-954d-70cd5fbd52db"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="7037">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="7038"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="7039">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7046">

               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7048">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7049"><code data-reactid="7050">"desc"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="7051">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="7052">
                <li data-reactid="7053">default value: desc</li>
                <li data-reactid="7054"><!-- react-text: 7055 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7056 -->desc, asc<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="7057">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="7058"><strong data-reactid="7059">before</strong><br data-reactid="7060"><small data-reactid="7061"><em data-reactid="7062"><!-- react-text: 7063 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7064 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7065">
               <div data-reactid="7066">
                <p>Limit the returned results to logs older than the specified date. This can be a date string <code>2019-04-30</code> or an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC3339</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7067">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7068"><code data-reactid="7069">"2019-04-30T01:12:20Z"</code></small>

         <div data-reactid="7255">

             <tr data-reactid="7262">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7278">

        "id": "e592fd9519420ba7405e1307bff33214",
        "name": "Pro Plan",
        "price": 20,
        "currency": "USD",
        "frequency": "monthly",
        "legacy_id": "pro",

               </div></td>

             </tr>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7721">
               <div data-reactid="7722">
                <p>A full zone implies that DNS is hosted with Cloudflare. A partial zone is typically a partner-hosted zone or a CNAME setup.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7723">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7724"><code data-reactid="7725">"full"</code></small>
               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>

           </table>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="7731"><!-- react-text: 7732 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="7733">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="7734">
          <pre data-reactid="7735">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"example.com","account":{"id":"01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823"},"jump_start":true,"type":"full"}'</pre>
         </div>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="7782">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="7783"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="7784">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 7785 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7786 -->Edit Zone<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7787 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="7788">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="7789"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="7790">free</h6>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="7800"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="7801">
           <p>Only one zone property can be changed at a time</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="7802"><!-- react-text: 7803 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7804 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 7805 -->zones/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="7806">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="7807"><em data-reactid="7808">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 7809 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>

            <thead data-reactid="7812">
             <tr data-reactid="7813">
              <td data-reactid="7814"><!-- react-text: 7815 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="7816">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="7817"><!-- react-text: 7818 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="7819">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="7820">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="7821">
             <tr data-reactid="7822">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="7823"><strong data-reactid="7824">paused</strong><br data-reactid="7825"><small data-reactid="7826"><em data-reactid="7827"><!-- react-text: 7828 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7829">
               <div data-reactid="7830">
                <p>Indicates if the zone is only using Cloudflare DNS services. A true value means the zone will not receive security or performance benefits.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7831">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7832"><code data-reactid="7833">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="7834">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="7835">
                <li data-reactid="7836">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="7837">valid values: (true,false)</li>
                <li data-reactid="7838">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="7839">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="7840"><strong data-reactid="7841">vanity_name_servers</strong><br data-reactid="7842"><small data-reactid="7843"><em data-reactid="7844"><!-- react-text: 7845 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7846">

                <p>An array of domains used for custom name servers. This is only available for Business and Enterprise plans.</p> 
               </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="7849"><code data-reactid="7850">[ "ns1.example.com", "ns2.example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="7851"><br data-reactid="7852"><!-- react-text: 7853 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7854">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="7855"><span class="verb" data-reactid="7856">Show</span><!-- react-text: 7857 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="7867">
               <div data-reactid="7868">
                <p>The desired plan for the zone. Changing this value will create/cancel associated subscriptions. To view available plans for this zone, see Zone Plans</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="7869">

          <pre data-reactid="7885">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \

         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="7886"><!-- react-text: 7887 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="7888">(example)</small></h5>

    "permissions": [
      "#zone:read",
      "#zone:edit"
    ],
    "plan": {
      "id": "e592fd9519420ba7405e1307bff33214",
      "name": "Pro Plan",
      "price": 20,
      "currency": "USD",
      "frequency": "monthly",
      "legacy_id": "pro",
      "is_subscribed": true,
      "can_subscribe": true
    },
    "plan_pending": {
      "id": "e592fd9519420ba7405e1307bff33214",

      "legacy_id": "pro",

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8043">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-purge-files-by-url" data-reactid="8044">zone-purge-files-by-url</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8045">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8046"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8047">POST</span><!-- react-text: 8048 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8049 -->Purge Files by URL<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8050 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8051"><!-- react-text: 8052 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8053 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8054 -->#cache_purge:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8055">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8056"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8057">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8058"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8059"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8060">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8061"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8062"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8063">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8064"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8065"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8066">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8067"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="8068">
           <p>Granularly remove one or more files from Cloudflare's cache either by specifying URLs. All tiers can purge by URL.</p> 
           <p>To purge files with custom cache keys, include the headers used to compute the cache key as in the example. To purge files with ${geo} or ${devicetype} in their cache keys, include the CF-Device-Type or CF-IPCountry headers.</p> 
           <p><strong>NB:</strong> When including the Origin header, be sure to include the <strong>scheme</strong> and <strong>hostname</strong>. The port number can be omitted if it is the default port (80 for http, 443 for https), but must be included otherwise.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="8069"><!-- react-text: 8070 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8071 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8072 -->zones/:identifier/purge_cache<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="8073">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8074"><em data-reactid="8075">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 8076 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="8077">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="8078">
            <thead data-reactid="8079">
             <tr data-reactid="8080">
              <td data-reactid="8081"><!-- react-text: 8082 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8083">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="8084"><!-- react-text: 8085 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8086">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="8087">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="8088">
             <tr data-reactid="8089">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8090"><strong data-reactid="8091">files</strong><br data-reactid="8092"><small data-reactid="8093"><em data-reactid="8094"><!-- react-text: 8095 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8096">
               <div data-reactid="8097">
                <p>An array of URLs that should be removed from cache</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8098">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8099"><code data-reactid="8100">[ "http://www.example.com/css/styles.css", { "url": "http://www.example.com/cat_picture.jpg", "headers": { "Origin": "https://www.cloudflare.com", "CF-IPCountry": "US", "CF-Device-Type": "desktop" } } ]</code></small><span data-reactid="8101"><br data-reactid="8102"><!-- react-text: 8103 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8104">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="8105"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8106">Show</span><!-- react-text: 8107 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8108">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8109">
                <li data-reactid="8110"><!-- react-text: 8111 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8112 -->30<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8113"><!-- react-text: 8114 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8115">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8116">
          <pre data-reactid="8117">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/purge_cache" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"files":["http://www.example.com/css/styles.css",{"url":"http://www.example.com/cat_picture.jpg","headers":{"Origin":"https://www.cloudflare.com","CF-IPCountry":"US","CF-Device-Type":"desktop"}}]}'</pre>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8123">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-purge-files-by-cache-tags,-host-or-prefix" data-reactid="8124">zone-purge-files-by-cache-tags,-host-or-prefix</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8125">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8126"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8127">POST</span><!-- react-text: 8128 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8129 -->Purge Files by Cache-Tags, Host or Prefix<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8130 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8131"><!-- react-text: 8132 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8133 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8134 -->#cache_purge:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8135">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="8136"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8137">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="8138"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="8139"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8140">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="8141"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="8142"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8143">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="8144"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8145"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8146">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8147"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="8148">
           <p>Granularly remove one or more files from Cloudflare's cache either by specifying the host, the associated Cache-Tag, or a Prefix.</p> 
           <p><strong>NB:</strong> Cache-Tag, host and prefix purging each have a rate limit of 30,000 purge API calls in every 24 hour period. You may purge up to 30 tags, hosts, or prefixes in one API call. This rate limit can be raised for customers who need to purge at higher volume.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="8149"><!-- react-text: 8150 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8151 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8152 -->zones/:identifier/purge_cache<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="8153">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8154"><em data-reactid="8155">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 8156 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="8157">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="8158">
            <thead data-reactid="8159">
             <tr data-reactid="8160">
              <td data-reactid="8161"><!-- react-text: 8162 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8163">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="8164"><!-- react-text: 8165 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8166">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="8167">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="8168">
             <tr data-reactid="8169">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8170"><strong data-reactid="8171">tags</strong><br data-reactid="8172"><small data-reactid="8173"><em data-reactid="8174"><!-- react-text: 8175 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8176">
               <div data-reactid="8177">
                <p>Any assets served with a Cache-Tag header that matches one of the provided values will be purged from the Cloudflare cache</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8178">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8179"><code data-reactid="8180">[ "some-tag", "another-tag" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="8181"><br data-reactid="8182"><!-- react-text: 8183 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8184">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="8185"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8186">Show</span><!-- react-text: 8187 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8188">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8189">
                <li data-reactid="8190"><!-- react-text: 8191 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8192 -->30<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="8193">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8194"><strong data-reactid="8195">hosts</strong><br data-reactid="8196"><small data-reactid="8197"><em data-reactid="8198"><!-- react-text: 8199 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8200">
               <div data-reactid="8201">
                <p>Any assets at URLs with a host that matches one of the provided values will be purged from the Cloudflare cache</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8202">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8203"><code data-reactid="8204">[ "www.example.com", "images.example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="8205"><br data-reactid="8206"><!-- react-text: 8207 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8208">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="8209"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8210">Show</span><!-- react-text: 8211 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8212">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8213">
                <li data-reactid="8214"><!-- react-text: 8215 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8216 -->30<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="8217">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="8218"><strong data-reactid="8219">prefixes</strong><br data-reactid="8220"><small data-reactid="8221"><em data-reactid="8222"><!-- react-text: 8223 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="8224">
               <div data-reactid="8225">
                <p>Any assets at URLs that match the prefix will be purged from the Cloudflare cache. For instance, a.com/b will purge a.com/b/c/d.png but not a.com/bc.png. The prefixes a.com/b and a.com/b/c are redundant.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8226">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="8227"><code data-reactid="8228">[ "www.example.com/foo", "images.example.com/bar/baz" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="8229"><br data-reactid="8230"><!-- react-text: 8231 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="8232">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="8233"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8234">Show</span><!-- react-text: 8235 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="8236">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="8237">
                <li data-reactid="8238"><!-- react-text: 8239 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8240 -->30<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8241"><!-- react-text: 8242 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8243">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8244">
          <pre data-reactid="8245">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/purge_cache" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"tags":["some-tag","another-tag"],"hosts":["www.example.com","images.example.com"],"prefixes":["www.example.com/foo","images.example.com/bar/baz"]}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8246"><!-- react-text: 8247 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8248">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8249">
          <pre data-reactid="8250">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="8538">
        <header data-reactid="8539">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="zone-settings" data-reactid="8540"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="8541">Zone Settings</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="8542">A Zone setting changes how the Zone works in relation to caching, security, or other features of Cloudflare</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8543">
         <a class="anchor" id="zone-settings-properties" data-reactid="8544">zone-settings</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="8545">
          <h4 data-reactid="8546"><!-- react-text: 8547 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="8548">s</span></h4>
          <p data-reactid="8549">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="8550"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="8551"><span class="verb" data-reactid="8552">Show</span><!-- react-text: 8553 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8554 -->definition<!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="8555">s</span></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="8556">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-all-zone-settings" data-reactid="8557">zone-settings-get-all-zone-settings</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8558">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8559"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8560">GET</span><!-- react-text: 8561 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8562 -->Get all Zone settings<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8563 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8564"><!-- react-text: 8565 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8566 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8567 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8568">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8569"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8570">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8571"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8572"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8573">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8574"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8575"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8576">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8577"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8578"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8579">enterprise</h6>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8838">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8839"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8840">GET</span><!-- react-text: 8841 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8842 -->Get Browser Cache TTL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8843 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8844"><!-- react-text: 8845 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8846 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8847 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8848">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8849"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8850">free</h6>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8858"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8859">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8860"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="8861">
           <p>Browser Cache TTL (in seconds) specifies how long Cloudflare-cached resources will remain on your visitors' computers. Cloudflare will honor any larger times specified by your server. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168276" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168276</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="8862"><!-- react-text: 8863 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8864 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8865 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/browser_cache_ttl<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="8866"><!-- react-text: 8867 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="8868">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="8869">
          <pre data-reactid="8870">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/browser_cache_ttl" \

(<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170086" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170086</a>)</p>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8919"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8920">GET</span><!-- react-text: 8921 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8922 -->Get Cache Level setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8923 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8924"><!-- react-text: 8925 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8926 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8927 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="8928">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8929"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8930">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8931"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8932"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8933">pro</h6>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8935"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8936">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8937"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8938"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8939">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8940"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="8941">
           <p>Cache Level functions based off the setting level. The basic setting will cache most static resources (i.e., css, images, and JavaScript). The simplified setting will ignore the query string when delivering a cached resource. The aggressive setting will cache all static resources, including ones with a query string. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168256" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168256</a>)</p> 
          </div>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="8958">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="8959"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="8960">GET</span><!-- react-text: 8961 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8962 -->Get Challenge TTL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8963 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="8964"><!-- react-text: 8965 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8966 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 8967 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8969"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8970">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8971"></div></li>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="8978"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="8979">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="8980"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="8981">
           <p>Specify how long a visitor is allowed access to your site after successfully completing a challenge (such as a CAPTCHA). After the TTL has expired the visitor will have to complete a new challenge. We recommend a 15 - 45 minute setting and will attempt to honor any setting above 45 minutes. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170136" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170136</a>)</p>

    "value": 1800,

  }

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9015"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9016">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9017"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9018"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9019">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9020"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9021">
           <p>Development Mode temporarily allows you to enter development mode for your websites if you need to make changes to your site. This will bypass Cloudflare's accelerated cache and slow down your site, but is useful if you are making changes to cacheable content (like images, css, or JavaScript) and would like to see those changes right away. Once entered, development mode will last for 3 hours and then automatically toggle off.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9022"><!-- react-text: 9023 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9024 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9025 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/development_mode<!-- /react-text --></pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9076">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-hotlink-protection-setting" data-reactid="9077">zone-settings-get-hotlink-protection-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9078">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9079"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9080">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9081 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9082 -->Get Hotlink Protection setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9083 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9084"><!-- react-text: 9085 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9086 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9087 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9088">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9089"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9090">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9091"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9092"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9093">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9094"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9095"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9096">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9097"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9098"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9099">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9100"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9101">
           <p>When enabled, the Hotlink Protection option ensures that other sites cannot suck up your bandwidth by building pages that use images hosted on your site. Anytime a request for an image on your site hits Cloudflare, we check to ensure that it's not another site requesting them. People will still be able to download and view images from your page, but other sites won't be able to steal them for use on their own pages. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170026" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170026</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9102"><!-- react-text: 9103 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9104 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9105 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/hotlink_protection<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9106"><!-- react-text: 9107 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9108">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9109">
          <pre data-reactid="9110">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/hotlink_protection" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9111"><!-- react-text: 9112 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9113">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9114">
          <pre data-reactid="9115">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "hotlink_protection",
    "value": "off",
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9132"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9133">pro</h6>

            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9135"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9136">business</h6>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9141">
           <p>Enable IP Geolocation to have Cloudflare geolocate visitors to your website and pass the country code to you.         <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9396">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-polish-setting" data-reactid="9397">zone-settings-get-polish-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9398">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9399"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9400">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9401 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9402 -->Get Polish setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9403 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9404"><!-- react-text: 9405 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9406 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9407 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9408">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9409"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9410">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9411"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9412"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9413">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9414"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9415"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9416">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9417"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9418"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9419">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9420"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9421">
           <p>Strips metadata and compresses your images for faster page load times. Basic (Lossless): Reduce the size of PNG, JPEG, and GIF files - no impact on visual quality. Basic + JPEG (Lossy): Further reduce the size of JPEG files for faster image loading. Larger JPEGs are converted to progressive images, loading a lower-resolution image first and ending in a higher-resolution version. Not recommended for hi-res photography sites.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9422"><!-- react-text: 9423 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9424 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9425 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/polish<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9426"><!-- react-text: 9427 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9428">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9429">
          <pre data-reactid="9430">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/polish" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9431"><!-- react-text: 9432 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9433">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9596">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-response-buffering-setting" data-reactid="9597">zone-settings-get-response-buffering-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9598">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9599"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9600">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9601 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9602 -->Get Response Buffering setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9603 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9604"><!-- react-text: 9605 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9606 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9607 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9608">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9609"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9610">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="9611"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9612"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9613">pro</h6>

            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="9615"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9616">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="9617"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9618"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9619">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9620"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9621">
           <p>Enables or disables buffering of responses from the proxied server. Cloudflare may buffer the whole payload to deliver it at once to the client versus allowing it to be delivered in chunks. By default, the proxied server streams directly and is not buffered by Cloudflare. This is limited to Enterprise Zones.</p> 
          </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9636">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-rocket-loader-setting" data-reactid="9637">zone-settings-get-rocket-loader-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9638">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9639"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9640">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9641 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9642 -->Get Rocket Loader setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9643 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9644"><!-- react-text: 9645 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9646 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9647 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9648">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9649"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9650">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9651"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9652"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9653">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9654"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9655"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9656">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9657"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9658"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9659">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9660"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9661">
           <p>Rocket Loader is a general-purpose asynchronous JavaScript optimisation which prioritises the rendering of your content while loading your site's Javascript asynchronously. Turning on Rocket Loader will immediately improve a web page's rendering time sometimes measured as Time to First Paint (TTFP) and also the window.onload time (assuming there is JavaScript on the page), which can have a positive impact on your Google search ranking. When turned on, Rocket Loader will automatically defer the loading of all Javascript referenced in your HTML, with no configuration required. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168056" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168056</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9662"><!-- react-text: 9663 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9664 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9665 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/rocket_loader<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9666"><!-- react-text: 9667 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9668">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9669">
          <pre data-reactid="9670">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/rocket_loader" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9671"><!-- react-text: 9672 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9673">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9674">
          <pre data-reactid="9675">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "rocket_loader",
    "value": "off",
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
