        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9756">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-server-side-exclude-setting" data-reactid="9757">zone-settings-get-server-side-exclude-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9758">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9759"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9760">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9761 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9762 -->Get Server Side Exclude setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9763 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9764"><!-- react-text: 9765 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9766 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9767 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9768">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9769"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9770">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9771"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9772"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9773">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9774"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9775"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9776">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9777"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9778"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9779">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9780"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9781">
           <p>If there is sensitive content on your website that you want visible to real visitors, but that you want to hide from suspicious visitors, all you have to do is wrap the content with Cloudflare SSE tags. Wrap any content that you want to be excluded from suspicious visitors in the following SSE tags: &lt;!--sse--&gt;&lt;!--/sse--&gt;. For example: &lt;!--sse--&gt; Bad visitors won't see my phone number, 555-555-5555 &lt;!--/sse--&gt;. Note: SSE only will work with HTML. If you have HTML minification enabled, you won't see the SSE tags in your HTML source when it's served through Cloudflare. SSE will still function in this case, as Cloudflare's HTML minification and SSE functionality occur on-the-fly as the resource moves through our network to the visitor's computer. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170036" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170036</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9782"><!-- react-text: 9783 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9784 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9785 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/server_side_exclude<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9786"><!-- react-text: 9787 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9788">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9789">
          <pre data-reactid="9790">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/server_side_exclude" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9791"><!-- react-text: 9792 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9793">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9836">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-ssl-setting" data-reactid="9837">zone-settings-get-ssl-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9838">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9839"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9840">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9841 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9842 -->Get SSL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9843 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9844"><!-- react-text: 9845 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9846 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9847 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9848">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9849"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9850">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9851"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9852"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9853">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9854"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9855"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9856">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9857"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9858"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9859">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9860"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9861">
           <p>SSL encrypts your visitor's connection and safeguards credit card numbers and other personal data to and from your website. SSL can take up to 5 minutes to fully activate. Requires Cloudflare active on your root domain or www domain. Off: no SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare, and no SSL between Cloudflare and your web server (all HTTP traffic). Flexible: SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, but no SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You don't need to have an SSL cert on your web server, but your vistors will still see the site as being HTTPS enabled. Full: SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, and SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You'll need to have your own SSL cert or self-signed cert at the very least. Full (Strict): SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, and SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You'll need to have a valid SSL certificate installed on your web server. This certificate must be signed by a certificate authority, have an expiration date in the future, and respond for the request domain name (hostname). (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170416" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170416</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="9862"><!-- react-text: 9863 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9864 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9865 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/ssl<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9866"><!-- react-text: 9867 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9868">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9869">
          <pre data-reactid="9870">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/ssl" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="9871"><!-- react-text: 9872 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="9873">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="9874">
          <pre data-reactid="9875">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "ssl",
    "value": "off",
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9879"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9880">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9881 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9882 -->Get Minimum TLS Version setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9883 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9884"><!-- react-text: 9885 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9886 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9887 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9900"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="9901">
           <p>Only accept HTTPS requests that use at least the TLS protocol version specified. For example, if TLS 1.1 is selected, TLS 1.0 connections will be rejected, while 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 (if enabled) will be permitted.</p> 
          </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="9956">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-zone-enable-tls-1.3-setting" data-reactid="9957">zone-settings-get-zone-enable-tls-1.3-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="9958">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="9959"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="9960">GET</span><!-- react-text: 9961 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9962 -->Get Zone Enable TLS 1.3 setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9963 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="9964"><!-- react-text: 9965 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9966 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 9967 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="9968">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="9969"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="9970">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="9971"></div></li>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10076">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-get-web-application-firewall-waf-setting" data-reactid="10077">zone-settings-get-web-application-firewall-waf-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10078">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10079"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10080">GET</span><!-- react-text: 10081 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10082 -->Get Web Application Firewall (WAF) setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10083 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10084"><!-- react-text: 10085 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10086 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10087 -->#zone_settings:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10088">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="10089"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10090">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="10091"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10092"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10093">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10094"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10095"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10096">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10097"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10098"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10099">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10100"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10101">
           <p>The WAF examines HTTP requests to your website. It inspects both GET and POST requests and applies rules to help filter out illegitimate traffic from legitimate website visitors. The Cloudflare WAF inspects website addresses or URLs to detect anything out of the ordinary. If the Cloudflare WAF determines suspicious user behavior, then the WAF will 'challenge' the web visitor with a page that asks them to submit a CAPTCHA successfully to continue their action. If the challenge is failed, the action will be stopped. What this means is that Cloudflare's WAF will block any traffic identified as illegitimate before it reaches your origin web server. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200172016" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200172016</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10102"><!-- react-text: 10103 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10104 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10105 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/waf<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10106"><!-- react-text: 10107 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="10108">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="10109">
          <pre data-reactid="10110">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/waf" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10111"><!-- react-text: 10112 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="10113">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="10114">
          <pre data-reactid="10115">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "waf",
    "value": "off",
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10301">
           <p>WebSockets are open connections sustained between the client and the origin server. Inside a WebSockets connection, the client and the origin can pass data back and forth without having to reestablish sessions. This makes exchanging data within a WebSockets connection fast. WebSockets are often used for real-time applications such as live chat and gaming. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169466-Can-I-use-Cloudflare-with-WebSockets-" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169466-Can-I-use-Cloudflare-with-WebSockets-</a>)</p>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10516">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-always-online-setting" data-reactid="10517">zone-settings-change-always-online-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10518">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10519"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10520">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 10521 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10522 -->Change Always Online setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10523 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10524"><!-- react-text: 10525 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10526 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10527 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10528">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10529"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10530">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10531"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10532"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10533">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10534"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10535"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10536">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10537"></div></li>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10540"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10541">
           <p>When enabled, Always Online will serve pages from our cache if your server is offline (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168006" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168006</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10542"><!-- react-text: 10543 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10544 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10545 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/always_online<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="10546">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10547"><em data-reactid="10548">Required</em><!-- react-text: 10549 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="10550">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="10551">
            <thead data-reactid="10552">
             <tr data-reactid="10553">
              <td data-reactid="10554"><!-- react-text: 10555 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10556">/type</small></td>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="10590">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-always-use-https-setting" data-reactid="10591">zone-settings-change-always-use-https-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10592">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10593"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10594">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 10595 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10596 -->Change Always Use HTTPS setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10597 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10598"><!-- react-text: 10599 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10600 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10601 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10615">
           <p>Reply to all requests for URLs that use "http" with a 301 redirect to the equivalent "https" URL. If you only want to redirect for a subset of requests, consider creating an "Always use HTTPS" page rule.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10616"><!-- react-text: 10617 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10618 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10619 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/always_use_https<!-- /react-text --></pre>

         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-browser-cache-ttl-setting" data-reactid="10895">zone-settings-change-browser-cache-ttl-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="10896">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="10897"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="10898">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 10899 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10900 -->Change Browser Cache TTL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10901 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="10902"><!-- react-text: 10903 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10904 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10905 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="10906">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10907"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10908">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10909"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10910"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10911">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10912"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10913"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10914">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10915"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="10916"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="10917">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="10918"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10919">
           <p>Browser Cache TTL (in seconds) specifies how long Cloudflare-cached resources will remain on your visitors' computers. Cloudflare will honor any larger times specified by your server. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168276" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168276</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="10920"><!-- react-text: 10921 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10922 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10923 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/browser_cache_ttl<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="10924">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="10925"><em data-reactid="10926">Required</em><!-- react-text: 10927 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>

             <tr data-reactid="10931">

             <tr data-reactid="10940">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="10941"><strong data-reactid="10942">value</strong><br data-reactid="10943"><small data-reactid="10944"><em data-reactid="10945"><!-- react-text: 10946 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="10947">
               <div data-reactid="10948">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="10949">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="10950"><code data-reactid="10951">14400</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="10952">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="10953">
                <li data-reactid="10954">default value: 14400</li>
                <li data-reactid="10955"><!-- react-text: 10956 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10957 -->0, 30, 60, 300, 1200, 1800, 3600, 7200, 10800, 14400, 18000, 28800, 43200, 57600, 72000, 86400, 172800, 259200, 345600, 432000, 691200, 1382400, 2073600, 2678400, 5356800, 16070400, 31536000<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="10958"><!-- react-text: 10959 -->notes: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 10960 -->Setting a TTL of 0 is equivalent to selecting `Respect Existing Headers`<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>

     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"value":14400}'</pre>
         </div>

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],

    "value": 14400,

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="10996">
           <p>Browser Integrity Check is similar to Bad Behavior and looks for common HTTP headers abused most commonly by spammers and denies access to your page. It will also challenge visitors that do not have a user agent or a non standard user agent (also commonly used by abuse bots, crawlers or visitors). (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170086" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170086</a>)</p>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11045">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-cache-level-setting" data-reactid="11046">zone-settings-change-cache-level-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11047">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11048"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11049">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 11050 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11051 -->Change Cache Level setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11052 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11053"><!-- react-text: 11054 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11055 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11056 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11057">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11058"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11059">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11060"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11061"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11062">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11063"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11064"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11065">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11066"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11067"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11068">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11069"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="11070">
           <p>Cache Level functions based off the setting level. The basic setting will cache most static resources (i.e., css, images, and JavaScript). The simplified setting will ignore the query string when delivering a cached resource. The aggressive setting will cache all static resources, including ones with a query string. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168256" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168256</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11071"><!-- react-text: 11072 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11073 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11074 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/cache_level<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11080">
            <thead data-reactid="11081">
             <tr data-reactid="11082">
              <td data-reactid="11083"><!-- react-text: 11084 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11085">/type</small></td>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11098">
               <div data-reactid="11099">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11119">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-challenge-ttl-setting" data-reactid="11120">zone-settings-change-challenge-ttl-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11121">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11122"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11123">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 11124 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11125 -->Change Challenge TTL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11126 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11127"><!-- react-text: 11128 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11129 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11130 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11131">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11132"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11133">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11134"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11135"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11136">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11137"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11138"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11139">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11140"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11141"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11142">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11143"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="11144">
           <p>Specify how long a visitor is allowed access to your site after successfully completing a challenge (such as a CAPTCHA). After the TTL has expired the visitor will have to complete a new challenge. We recommend a 15 - 45 minute setting and will attempt to honor any setting above 45 minutes. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170136" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170136</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11145"><!-- react-text: 11146 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11147 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11148 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/challenge_ttl<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

             <tr data-reactid="11156">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11172">
               <div data-reactid="11173">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="11174">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11175"><code data-reactid="11176">1800</code></small>
               </div></td>

                <li data-reactid="11180"><!-- react-text: 11181 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11182 -->300, 900, 1800, 2700, 3600, 7200, 10800, 14400, 28800, 57600, 86400, 604800, 2592000, 31536000<!-- /react-text --></li>

           </table>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11193">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-development-mode-setting" data-reactid="11194">zone-settings-change-development-mode-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11195">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11196"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11197">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 11198 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11199 -->Change Development Mode setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11200 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11201"><!-- react-text: 11202 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11203 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11204 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11205">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11206"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11207">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11208"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11209"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11210">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11211"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11212"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11213">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11214"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11215"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11216">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11217"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="11218">
           <p>Development Mode temporarily allows you to enter development mode for your websites if you need to make changes to your site. This will bypass Cloudflare's accelerated cache and slow down your site, but is useful if you are making changes to cacheable content (like images, css, or JavaScript) and would like to see those changes right away. Once entered, development mode will last for 3 hours and then automatically toggle off.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11219"><!-- react-text: 11220 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11221 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11222 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/development_mode<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="11223">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11224"><em data-reactid="11225">Required</em><!-- react-text: 11226 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="11489">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-hotlink-protection-setting" data-reactid="11490">zone-settings-change-hotlink-protection-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="11491">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="11492"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="11493">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 11494 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11495 -->Change Hotlink Protection setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11496 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11497"><!-- react-text: 11498 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11499 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11500 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="11501">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11502"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11503">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11504"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11505"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11506">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11507"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11508"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11509">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11510"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="11511"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="11512">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="11513"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="11514">
           <p>When enabled, the Hotlink Protection option ensures that other sites cannot suck up your bandwidth by building pages that use images hosted on your site. Anytime a request for an image on your site hits Cloudflare, we check to ensure that it's not another site requesting them. People will still be able to download and view images from your page, but other sites won't be able to steal them for use on their own pages. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170026" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170026</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="11515"><!-- react-text: 11516 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11517 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11518 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/hotlink_protection<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="11519">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11520"><em data-reactid="11521">Required</em><!-- react-text: 11522 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="11523">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="11524">
            <thead data-reactid="11525">
             <tr data-reactid="11526">
              <td data-reactid="11527"><!-- react-text: 11528 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11529">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="11530"><!-- react-text: 11531 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="11532">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="11533">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="11534">
             <tr data-reactid="11535">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="11536"><strong data-reactid="11537">value</strong><br data-reactid="11538"><small data-reactid="11539"><em data-reactid="11540"><!-- react-text: 11541 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="11542">
               <div data-reactid="11543">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="11544">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="11545"><code data-reactid="11546">"off"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="11547">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="11548">
                <li data-reactid="11549">default value: off</li>
                <li data-reactid="11550"><!-- react-text: 11551 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 11552 -->on, off<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="11553"><!-- react-text: 11554 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="11555">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="11556">
          <pre data-reactid="11557">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/hotlink_protection" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="11890">
           <p>Automatically optimize image loading for website visitors on mobile devices (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="http://blog.cloudflare.com/mirage2-solving-mobile-speed)" title="null">http://blog.cloudflare.com/mirage2-solving-mobile-speed)</a>.</p>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12018">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12019"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12020">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12021 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12022 -->Change Polish setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12023 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12024"><!-- react-text: 12025 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12026 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12027 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12028">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12029"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12030">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12031"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12032"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12033">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12034"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12035"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12036">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12037"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12038"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12039">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12040"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12041">
           <p>Strips metadata and compresses your images for faster page load times. Basic (Lossless): Reduce the size of PNG, JPEG, and GIF files - no impact on visual quality. Basic + JPEG (Lossy): Further reduce the size of JPEG files for faster image loading. Larger JPEGs are converted to progressive images, loading a lower-resolution image first and ending in a higher-resolution version. Not recommended for hi-res photography sites.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12042"><!-- react-text: 12043 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12044 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12045 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/polish<!-- /react-text --></pre>

               </ul></td>

            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12228"><!-- react-text: 12229 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12230">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="12232">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/brotli" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"value":"off"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12233"><!-- react-text: 12234 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12235">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12386">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-response-buffering-setting" data-reactid="12387">zone-settings-change-response-buffering-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12388">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12389"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12390">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12391 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12392 -->Change Response Buffering setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12393 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12394"><!-- react-text: 12395 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12396 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12397 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12398">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12399"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12400">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12401"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12402"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12403">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12404"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12405"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12406">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12407"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12408"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12409">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12410"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12411">
           <p>Enables or disables buffering of responses from the proxied server. Cloudflare may buffer the whole payload to deliver it at once to the client versus allowing it to be delivered in chunks. By default, the proxied server streams directly and is not buffered by Cloudflare. This is limited to Enterprise Zones.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12412"><!-- react-text: 12413 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12414 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12415 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/response_buffering<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="12416">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12417"><em data-reactid="12418">Required</em><!-- react-text: 12419 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12420">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12421">
            <thead data-reactid="12422">
             <tr data-reactid="12423">
              <td data-reactid="12424"><!-- react-text: 12425 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12426">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12427"><!-- react-text: 12428 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12429">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12430">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="12431">
             <tr data-reactid="12432">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12433"><strong data-reactid="12434">value</strong><br data-reactid="12435"><small data-reactid="12436"><em data-reactid="12437"><!-- react-text: 12438 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12439">
               <div data-reactid="12440">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="12441">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12442"><code data-reactid="12443">"off"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12444">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12445">
                <li data-reactid="12446">default value: off</li>
                <li data-reactid="12447"><!-- react-text: 12448 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12449 -->on, off<!-- /react-text --></li>

             </tr>

           </table>

          <pre data-reactid="12454">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/response_buffering" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12460">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-rocket-loader-setting" data-reactid="12461">zone-settings-change-rocket-loader-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12462">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12463"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12464">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12465 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12466 -->Change Rocket Loader setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12467 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12468"><!-- react-text: 12469 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12470 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12471 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12472">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12473"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12474">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12475"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12476"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12477">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12478"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12479"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12480">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12481"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12482"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12483">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12484"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12485">
           <p>Rocket Loader is a general-purpose asynchronous JavaScript optimisation which prioritises the rendering of your content while loading your site's Javascript asynchronously. Turning on Rocket Loader will immediately improve a web page's rendering time sometimes measured as Time to First Paint (TTFP) and also the window.onload time (assuming there is JavaScript on the page), which can have a positive impact on your Google search ranking. When turned on, Rocket Loader will automatically defer the loading of all Javascript referenced in your HTML, with no configuration required. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168056" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200168056</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12486"><!-- react-text: 12487 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12488 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12489 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/rocket_loader<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="12490">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12491"><em data-reactid="12492">Required</em><!-- react-text: 12493 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12494">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12495">
            <thead data-reactid="12496">
             <tr data-reactid="12497">
              <td data-reactid="12498"><!-- react-text: 12499 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12500">/type</small></td>

              <td data-reactid="12504">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="12505">
             <tr data-reactid="12506">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12507"><strong data-reactid="12508">value</strong><br data-reactid="12509"><small data-reactid="12510"><em data-reactid="12511"><!-- react-text: 12512 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12513">
               <div data-reactid="12514">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="12515">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12516"><code data-reactid="12517">"off"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12518">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12519">

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12534">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-security-header-hsts-setting" data-reactid="12535">zone-settings-change-security-header-hsts-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12536">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12537"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12538">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12539 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12540 -->Change Security Header (HSTS) setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12541 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12542"><!-- react-text: 12543 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12544 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12545 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12546">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12547"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12548">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12549"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12550"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12551">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12552"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12553"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12554">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12555"></div></li>

           <p>Cloudflare security header for a zone.</p>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12684">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-server-side-exclude-setting" data-reactid="12685">zone-settings-change-server-side-exclude-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12686">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12687"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12688">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12689 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12690 -->Change Server Side Exclude setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12691 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12692"><!-- react-text: 12693 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12694 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12695 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12696">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12697"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12698">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12699"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12700"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12701">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12702"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12703"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12704">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12705"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12706"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12707">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12708"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12709">
           <p>If there is sensitive content on your website that you want visible to real visitors, but that you want to hide from suspicious visitors, all you have to do is wrap the content with Cloudflare SSE tags. Wrap any content that you want to be excluded from suspicious visitors in the following SSE tags: &lt;!--sse--&gt;&lt;!--/sse--&gt;. For example: &lt;!--sse--&gt; Bad visitors won't see my phone number, 555-555-5555 &lt;!--/sse--&gt;. Note: SSE only will work with HTML. If you have HTML minification enabled, you won't see the SSE tags in your HTML source when it's served through Cloudflare. SSE will still function in this case, as Cloudflare's HTML minification and SSE functionality occur on-the-fly as the resource moves through our network to the visitor's computer. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170036" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170036</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12710"><!-- react-text: 12711 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12712 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12713 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/server_side_exclude<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="12714">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12715"><em data-reactid="12716">Required</em><!-- react-text: 12717 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12718">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12719">
            <thead data-reactid="12720">
             <tr data-reactid="12721">
              <td data-reactid="12722"><!-- react-text: 12723 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12724">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12725"><!-- react-text: 12726 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12727">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12728">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="12729">
             <tr data-reactid="12730">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12731"><strong data-reactid="12732">value</strong><br data-reactid="12733"><small data-reactid="12734"><em data-reactid="12735"><!-- react-text: 12736 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12737">
               <div data-reactid="12738">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>

              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12742">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12743">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>

          <pre data-reactid="12752">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/server_side_exclude" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12758">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-ssl-setting" data-reactid="12759">zone-settings-change-ssl-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12760">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12761"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12762">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12763 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12764 -->Change SSL setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12765 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12766"><!-- react-text: 12767 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12768 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12769 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12770">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12771"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12772">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12773"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12774"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12775">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12776"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12777"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12778">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12779"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12780"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12781">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12782"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12783">
           <p>SSL encrypts your visitor's connection and safeguards credit card numbers and other personal data to and from your website. SSL can take up to 5 minutes to fully activate. Requires Cloudflare active on your root domain or www domain. Off: no SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare, and no SSL between Cloudflare and your web server (all HTTP traffic). Flexible: SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, but no SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You don't need to have an SSL cert on your web server, but your vistors will still see the site as being HTTPS enabled. Full: SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, and SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You'll need to have your own SSL cert or self-signed cert at the very least. Full (Strict): SSL between the visitor and Cloudflare -- visitor sees HTTPS on your site, and SSL between Cloudflare and your web server. You'll need to have a valid SSL certificate installed on your web server. This certificate must be signed by a certificate authority, have an expiration date in the future, and respond for the request domain name (hostname). (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170416" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200170416</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12784"><!-- react-text: 12785 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12786 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12787 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/ssl<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="12788">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12789"><em data-reactid="12790">Required</em><!-- react-text: 12791 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="12792">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="12793">
            <thead data-reactid="12794">
             <tr data-reactid="12795">
              <td data-reactid="12796"><!-- react-text: 12797 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12798">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12799"><!-- react-text: 12800 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12801">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="12802">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="12803">
             <tr data-reactid="12804">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="12805"><strong data-reactid="12806">value</strong><br data-reactid="12807"><small data-reactid="12808"><em data-reactid="12809"><!-- react-text: 12810 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="12811">
               <div data-reactid="12812">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="12813">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="12814"><code data-reactid="12815">"off"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="12816">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="12817">
                <li data-reactid="12818">default value: off</li>
                <li data-reactid="12819"><!-- react-text: 12820 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12821 -->off, flexible, full, strict<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="12822"><!-- react-text: 12823 -->notes: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12824 -->Depends on the zone's plan level<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12825"><!-- react-text: 12826 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12827">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="12828">
          <pre data-reactid="12829">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/ssl" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"value":"off"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="12830"><!-- react-text: 12831 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="12832">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="12833">
          <pre data-reactid="12834">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "ssl",
    "value": "off",
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="12835">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-tls-client-auth-setting" data-reactid="12836">zone-settings-change-tls-client-auth-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="12837">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12838"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12839">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12840 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12841 -->Change TLS Client Auth setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12842 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12843"><!-- react-text: 12844 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12845 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12846 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="12847">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12848"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12849">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12850"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12851"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12852">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12853"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="12854"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12855">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="12856"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="12857"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="12858">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="12859"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="12860">
           <p>TLS Client Auth requires Cloudflare to connect to your origin server using a client certificate (Enterprise Only)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="12861"><!-- react-text: 12862 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12863 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12864 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/tls_client_auth<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="12865">

     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \

     --data '{"value":"on"}'</pre>

           </ul></h3>

           <p>Allows customer to continue to use True Client IP (Akamai feature) in the headers we send to the origin. This is limited to Enterprise Zones.</p>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="12986"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="12987">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 12988 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12989 -->Change Minimum TLS Version setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12990 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="12991"><!-- react-text: 12992 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12993 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 12994 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="13008">
           <p>Only accept HTTPS requests that use at least the TLS protocol version specified. For example, if TLS 1.1 is selected, TLS 1.0 connections will be rejected, while 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 (if enabled) will be permitted.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="13009"><!-- react-text: 13010 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13011 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13012 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/min_tls_version<!-- /react-text --></pre>

        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="13213">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-settings-change-web-application-firewall-waf-setting" data-reactid="13214">zone-settings-change-web-application-firewall-waf-setting</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="13215">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="13216"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="13217">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 13218 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13219 -->Change Web Application Firewall (WAF) setting<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13220 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13221"><!-- react-text: 13222 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13223 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13224 -->#zone_settings:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="13225">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="13226"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13227">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="13228"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13229"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13230">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13231"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13232"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13233">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13234"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13235"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13236">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13237"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="13238">
           <p>The WAF examines HTTP requests to your website. It inspects both GET and POST requests and applies rules to help filter out illegitimate traffic from legitimate website visitors. The Cloudflare WAF inspects website addresses or URLs to detect anything out of the ordinary. If the Cloudflare WAF determines suspicious user behavior, then the WAF will 'challenge' the web visitor with a page that asks them to submit a CAPTCHA successfully to continue their action. If the challenge is failed, the action will be stopped. What this means is that Cloudflare's WAF will block any traffic identified as illegitimate before it reaches your origin web server. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200172016" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200172016</a>)</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="13239"><!-- react-text: 13240 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13241 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13242 -->zones/:zone_identifier/settings/waf<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="13243">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13244"><em data-reactid="13245">Required</em><!-- react-text: 13246 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="13247">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="13248">
            <thead data-reactid="13249">
             <tr data-reactid="13250">
              <td data-reactid="13251"><!-- react-text: 13252 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13253">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="13254"><!-- react-text: 13255 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13256">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="13257">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="13258">
             <tr data-reactid="13259">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13260"><strong data-reactid="13261">value</strong><br data-reactid="13262"><small data-reactid="13263"><em data-reactid="13264"><!-- react-text: 13265 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13266">
               <div data-reactid="13267">
                <p>Value of the zone setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="13268">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13269"><code data-reactid="13270">"off"</code></small>

              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13271">

          <pre data-reactid="13281">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/waf" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"value":"off"}'</pre>

              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13556"><strong data-reactid="13557">value</strong><br data-reactid="13558"><small data-reactid="13559"><em data-reactid="13560"><!-- react-text: 13561 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13562">
               <div data-reactid="13563">
                <p>Value of the Pseudo IPv4 setting</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="13564">

               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13567">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13568">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>

           </table>
          </div>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="13608">
           <p>WebSockets are open connections sustained between the client and the origin server. Inside a WebSockets connection, the client and the origin can pass data back and forth without having to reestablish sessions. This makes exchanging data within a WebSockets connection fast. WebSockets are often used for real-time applications such as live chat and gaming. (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169466-Can-I-use-Cloudflare-with-WebSockets-" title="null">https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169466-Can-I-use-Cloudflare-with-WebSockets-</a>)</p> 
          </div>
