         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="13875">
          <pre data-reactid="13876">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/automatic_platform_optimization" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"value":{"enabled":true,"cf":true,"wordpress":true,"wp_plugin":true,"hostnames":["www.example.com","example.com","shop.example.com"],"cache_by_device_type":false}}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13877"><!-- react-text: 13878 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="13879">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="13880">
          <pre data-reactid="13881">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "automatic_platform_optimization",
    "value": {
      "enabled": true,
      "cf": true,
      "wordpress": true,
      "wp_plugin": true,
      "hostnames": [
        "www.example.com",
        "example.com",
        "shop.example.com"
      ],
      "cache_by_device_type": false
    },
    "editable": true,
    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="13882">
        <header data-reactid="13883">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="zone-analytics" data-reactid="13884"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="13885">Zone Analytics</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="13886">Analytics data for a zone</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="13887">
         <a class="anchor" id="zone-analytics-properties" data-reactid="13888">zone-analytics</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="13889">
          <h4 data-reactid="13890"><!-- react-text: 13891 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="13892">s</span></h4>
          <p data-reactid="13893">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="13894"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="13895"><span class="verb" data-reactid="13896">Show</span><!-- react-text: 13897 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13898 -->definition<!-- /react-text --><span data-reactid="13899">s</span></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="13900">
         <div class="deprecation-warning-block" data-reactid="13901">
          <h3 class="text-warning" data-reactid="13902">Deprecation Warning</h3>
          <p class="deprecation-date" data-reactid="13903">End of life Date: March 1, 2021</p>
          <p data-reactid="13904">Please use the new GraphQL Analytics API instead: https://developers.cloudflare.com/analytics/graphql-api/. It provides equivalent data and more features, including the ability to select only the metrics you need. Migration guide: https://developers.cloudflare.com/analytics/migration-guides/zone-analytics/.</p>
         </div><a class="anchor2" id="zone-analytics-dashboard" data-reactid="13905">zone-analytics-dashboard</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="13906">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="13907"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="13908">GET</span><!-- react-text: 13909 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13910 -->Dashboard<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13911 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13912"><!-- react-text: 13913 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13914 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13915 -->#analytics:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="13916">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13917"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13918">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13919"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13920"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13921">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13922"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13923"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13924">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13925"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="13926"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="13927">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="13928"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="13929">
           <p>The dashboard view provides both totals and timeseries data for the given zone and time period across the entire Cloudflare network.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="13930"><!-- react-text: 13931 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13932 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13933 -->zones/:zone_identifier/analytics/dashboard<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="13934">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13935"><em data-reactid="13936">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 13937 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="13938">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="13939">
            <thead data-reactid="13940">
             <tr data-reactid="13941">
              <td data-reactid="13942"><!-- react-text: 13943 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13944">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="13945"><!-- react-text: 13946 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="13947">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="13948">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="13949">
             <tr data-reactid="13950">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13951"><strong data-reactid="13952">since</strong><br data-reactid="13953"><small data-reactid="13954"><em data-reactid="13955"><!-- react-text: 13956 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13957 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13958">
               <div data-reactid="13959">
                <p>The (inclusive) beginning of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. At this point in time, it cannot exceed a time in the past greater than one year.</p> 
                <p>Ranges that the Cloudflare web application provides will provide the following period length for each point:</p> 
                <ul> 
                 <li>Last 60 minutes (from -59 to -1): 1 minute resolution</li> 
                 <li>Last 7 hours (from -419 to -60): 15 minutes resolution</li> 
                 <li>Last 15 hours (from -899 to -420): 30 minutes resolution</li> 
                 <li>Last 72 hours (from -4320 to -900): 1 hour resolution</li> 
                 <li>Older than 3 days (-525600 to -4320): 1 day resolution</li> 
                </ul> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="13960">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13961"><code data-reactid="13962">"2015-01-01T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13963">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13964">
                <li data-reactid="13965">default value: -10080</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="13966">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13967"><strong data-reactid="13968">until</strong><br data-reactid="13969"><small data-reactid="13970"><em data-reactid="13971"><!-- react-text: 13972 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 13973 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13974">
               <div data-reactid="13975">
                <p>The (exclusive) end of the requested time frame. This value can be a negative integer representing the number of minutes in the past relative to time the request is made, or can be an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. If omitted, the time of the request is used.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="13976">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13977"><code data-reactid="13978">"2015-01-02T12:23:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13979">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13980">
                <li data-reactid="13981">default value: 0</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="13982">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="13983"><strong data-reactid="13984">continuous</strong><br data-reactid="13985"><small data-reactid="13986"><em data-reactid="13987"><!-- react-text: 13988 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="13989">
               <div data-reactid="13990">
                <p>When set to true, the API will move the requested time window backward, until it finds a region with completely aggregated data.</p> 
                <p>The API response <em>may not represent the requested time window</em>.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="13991">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="13992"><code data-reactid="13993">true</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="13994">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="13995">
                <li data-reactid="13996">default value: true</li>
                <li data-reactid="13997">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="13998"><!-- react-text: 13999 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14000">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14001">
          <pre data-reactid="14002">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/analytics/dashboard?since=2015-01-01T12:23:00Z&amp;until=2015-01-02T12:23:00Z&amp;continuous=true" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

                 <li>Last 15 hours (from -899 to -420): 30 minutes resolution</li>

          <pre data-reactid="14110">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/analytics/colos?since=2015-01-01T12:23:00Z&amp;until=2015-01-02T12:23:00Z&amp;continuous=true" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \

         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14111"><!-- react-text: 14112 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14113">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14114">
          <pre data-reactid="14115">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "colo_id": "SFO",
      "timeseries": [
        {
          "since": "2015-01-01T12:23:00Z",
          "until": "2015-01-02T12:23:00Z",
          "requests": {
            "all": 1234085328,
            "cached": 1234085328,
            "uncached": 13876154,
            "country": {
              "US": 4181364,
              "AG": 37298,
              "GI": 293846
            },
            "http_status": {
              "200": 13496983,
              "301": 283,
              "400": 187936,
              "402": 1828,
              "404": 1293
            }
          },
          "bandwidth": {
            "all": 213867451,
            "cached": 113205063,
            "uncached": 113205063
          },
          "threats": {
            "all": 23423873,
            "country": {
              "US": 123,
              "CN": 523423,
              "AU": 91
            },
            "type": {
              "user.ban.ip": 123,
              "hot.ban.unknown": 5324,
              "macro.chl.captchaErr": 1341,
              "macro.chl.jschlErr": 5323
            }
          }
        }
      ],
      "totals": {
        "since": "2015-01-01T12:23:00Z",
        "until": "2015-01-02T12:23:00Z",
        "requests": {
          "all": 1234085328,
          "cached": 1234085328,
          "uncached": 13876154,
          "country": {
            "US": 4181364,
            "AG": 37298,
            "GI": 293846
          },
          "http_status": {
            "200": 13496983,
            "301": 283,
            "400": 187936,
            "402": 1828,
            "404": 1293
          }
        },
        "bandwidth": {
          "all": 213867451,
          "cached": 113205063,
          "uncached": 113205063
        },
        "threats": {
          "all": 23423873,
          "country": {
            "US": 123,
            "CN": 523423,
            "AU": 91
          },
          "type": {
            "user.ban.ip": 123,
            "hot.ban.unknown": 5324,
            "macro.chl.captchaErr": 1341,
            "macro.chl.jschlErr": 5323
          }
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "query": {
    "since": "2015-01-01T12:23:00Z",
    "until": "2015-01-02T12:23:00Z",
    "time_delta": 60
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
       </article>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="14176">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="14177"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="14178">POST</span><!-- react-text: 14179 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14180 -->Update log retention flag<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14181 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14182"><!-- react-text: 14183 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14184 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14185 -->#logs:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="14186">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14187"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14188">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14189"></div></li>

          <div data-reactid="14199">
           <p>Update log retention flag for Logpull API</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="14200"><!-- react-text: 14201 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14202 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14203 -->zones/:zone_identifier/logs/control/retention/flag<!-- /react-text --></pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14245">
         <a class="anchor2" id="logs-received-logs-received" data-reactid="14246">logs-received-logs-received</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="14247">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="14248"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="14249">GET</span><!-- react-text: 14250 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14251 -->Logs Received<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14252 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14253"><!-- react-text: 14254 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14255 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14256 -->#logs:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="14257">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14258"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14259">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14260"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14261"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14262">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14263"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14264"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14265">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14266"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="14267"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14268">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14269"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="14270">
           <p>The <code>/received</code> api route allows customers to retrieve their edge http logs. The basic access pattern is "give me all the logs for zone Z for minute M" where the minute M refers to the time records were received at Cloudflare's central data center. <code>start</code> is inclusive, and <code>end</code> is exclusive. Because of that, to get all data, at minutely cadence, starting at 10AM, the proper values are: <code>start=2018-05-20T10:00:00Z&amp;end=2018-05-20T10:01:00Z</code>, then <code>start=2018-05-20T10:01:00Z&amp;end=2018-05-20T10:02:00Z</code> and so on; the "overlap" will be handled properly.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="14271"><!-- react-text: 14272 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14273 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14274 -->zones/:zone_identifier/logs/received<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="14275">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14276"><em data-reactid="14277">Required</em><!-- react-text: 14278 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="14279">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="14280">
            <thead data-reactid="14281">
             <tr data-reactid="14282">
              <td data-reactid="14283"><!-- react-text: 14284 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14285">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14286"><!-- react-text: 14287 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14288">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14289">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="14290">
             <tr data-reactid="14291">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14292"><strong data-reactid="14293">start</strong><br data-reactid="14294"><small data-reactid="14295"><em data-reactid="14296"><!-- react-text: 14297 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14298 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14299">
               <div data-reactid="14300">
                <p>The (inclusive) beginning of the requested time frame. This can be a unix timestamp (in seconds or nanoseconds), or an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. At this point in time, it cannot exceed a time in the past greater than 7 days.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14301">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14302"><code data-reactid="14303">"2018-05-20T10:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14304">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14305"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="14306">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14307"><strong data-reactid="14308">end</strong><br data-reactid="14309"><small data-reactid="14310"><em data-reactid="14311"><!-- react-text: 14312 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14313 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14314">
               <div data-reactid="14315">
                <p>The (exclusive) end of the requested time frame. This can be a unix timestamp (in seconds or nanoseconds), or an absolute timestamp that conforms to RFC 3339. <code>end</code> must be at least 5 minutes earlier than now and must be later than <code>start</code>. Difference between <code>start</code> and <code>end</code> must be not greater than 1h.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14316">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14317"><code data-reactid="14318">"2018-05-20T10:01:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14319">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14320"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="14321">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14322"><em data-reactid="14323">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 14324 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="14325">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="14326">
            <thead data-reactid="14327">
             <tr data-reactid="14328">
              <td data-reactid="14329"><!-- react-text: 14330 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14331">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14332"><!-- react-text: 14333 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14334">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14335">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="14336">
             <tr data-reactid="14337">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14338"><strong data-reactid="14339">count</strong><br data-reactid="14340"><small data-reactid="14341"><em data-reactid="14342"><!-- react-text: 14343 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14344">
               <div data-reactid="14345">
                <p>When <code>?count=</code> is provided, the response will contain up to <code>count</code> results. Since results are not sorted, you are likely to get different data for repeated requests. <code>count</code> must be an integer &gt; 0.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14346">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14347"><code data-reactid="14348">7</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14349">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14350">
                <li data-reactid="14351"><!-- react-text: 14352 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14353 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14354 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="14355">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14356"><strong data-reactid="14357">sample</strong><br data-reactid="14358"><small data-reactid="14359"><em data-reactid="14360"><!-- react-text: 14361 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14362">
               <div data-reactid="14363">
                <p>When <code>?sample=</code> is provided, a sample of matching records is returned. If <code>sample=0.1</code> then 10% of records will be returned. Sampling is random: repeated calls will not only return different records, but likely will also vary slightly in number of returned records. When <code>?count=</code> is also specified, <code>count</code> is applied to the number of returned records, not the sampled records. So, with <code>sample=0.05</code> and <code>count=7</code>, when there is a total of 100 records available, approximately 5 will be returned. When there are 1000 records, 7 will be returned. When there are 10,000 records, 7 will be returned.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14364">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14365"><code data-reactid="14366">"0.1"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14367">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14368">
                <li data-reactid="14369"><!-- react-text: 14370 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14371 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14372 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="14373"><!-- react-text: 14374 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14375 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14376 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="14377">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14378"><strong data-reactid="14379">fields</strong><br data-reactid="14380"><small data-reactid="14381"><em data-reactid="14382"><!-- react-text: 14383 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14384">
               <div data-reactid="14385">
                <p>The <code>/received</code> route by default returns a limited set of fields, and allows customers to override the default field set by specifying individual fields. The reasons for this are: 1. most customers require only a small subset of fields, but that subset varies from customer to customer; 2. flat schema is much easier to work with downstream (importing into BigTable etc); 3. performance (time to process, file size). If <code>?fields=</code> is not specified, default field set is returned. This default field set may change at any time. When <code>?fields=</code> is provided, each record is returned with the specified fields. <code>fields</code> must be specified as a comma separated list without any whitespaces, and all fields must exist. The order in which fields are specified doesn't matter, and the order of fields in the response is not specified.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14386">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14387"><code data-reactid="14388">"ClientIP,RayID,EdgeStartTimestamp"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14389">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14390"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="14391">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14392"><strong data-reactid="14393">timestamps</strong><br data-reactid="14394"><small data-reactid="14395"><em data-reactid="14396"><!-- react-text: 14397 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14398">
               <div data-reactid="14399">
                <p>By default timestamps in responses are returned as Unix nanosecond integers. The <code>?timestamps=</code> argument can be set to change the format in which response timestamps are returned. Possible values are: <code>unix</code>, <code>unixnano</code>, <code>rfc3339</code>. Note: <code>unix</code> and <code>unixnano</code> return timestamps as integers; <code>rfc3339</code> returns timestamps as strings.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14400">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14401"><code data-reactid="14402">"unixnano"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14403">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14404">
                <li data-reactid="14405">default value: unixnano</li>
                <li data-reactid="14406"><!-- react-text: 14407 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14408 -->unix, unixnano, rfc3339<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14409"><!-- react-text: 14410 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14411">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14412">
          <pre data-reactid="14413">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/logs/received?start=2018-05-20T10:00:00Z&amp;end=2018-05-20T10:01:00Z&amp;count=7&amp;sample=0.1&amp;fields=ClientIP,RayID,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=unixnano" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14414"><!-- react-text: 14415 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14416">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14417">
          <pre data-reactid="14418">{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}
{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}
{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14419">
         <a class="anchor2" id="logs-received-logs-rayids" data-reactid="14420">logs-received-logs-rayids</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="14421">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="14422"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="14423">GET</span><!-- react-text: 14424 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14425 -->Logs RayIDs<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14426 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14427"><!-- react-text: 14428 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14429 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14430 -->#logs:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="14431">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14432"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14433">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14434"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14435"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14436">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14437"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14438"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14439">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14440"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="14441"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14442">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14443"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="14444">
           <p>The <code>/rayids</code> api route allows lookups by specific rayid. The rayids route will return 0, 1, or more records (ray ids are not unique).</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="14445"><!-- react-text: 14446 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14447 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14448 -->zones/:zone_identifier/logs/rayids/:ray_identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="14449">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14450"><em data-reactid="14451">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 14452 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="14453">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="14454">
            <thead data-reactid="14455">
             <tr data-reactid="14456">
              <td data-reactid="14457"><!-- react-text: 14458 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14459">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14460"><!-- react-text: 14461 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14462">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="14463">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="14464">
             <tr data-reactid="14465">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14466"><strong data-reactid="14467">fields</strong><br data-reactid="14468"><small data-reactid="14469"><em data-reactid="14470"><!-- react-text: 14471 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14472">
               <div data-reactid="14473">
                <p>The <code>/received</code> route by default returns a limited set of fields, and allows customers to override the default field set by specifying individual fields. The reasons for this are: 1. most customers require only a small subset of fields, but that subset varies from customer to customer; 2. flat schema is much easier to work with downstream (importing into BigTable etc); 3. performance (time to process, file size). If <code>?fields=</code> is not specified, default field set is returned. This default field set may change at any time. When <code>?fields=</code> is provided, each record is returned with the specified fields. <code>fields</code> must be specified as a comma separated list without any whitespaces, and all fields must exist. The order in which fields are specified doesn't matter, and the order of fields in the response is not specified.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14474">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14475"><code data-reactid="14476">"ClientIP,RayID,EdgeStartTimestamp"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14477">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14478"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="14479">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="14480"><strong data-reactid="14481">timestamps</strong><br data-reactid="14482"><small data-reactid="14483"><em data-reactid="14484"><!-- react-text: 14485 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14486">
               <div data-reactid="14487">
                <p>By default timestamps in responses are returned as Unix nanosecond integers. The <code>?timestamps=</code> argument can be set to change the format in which response timestamps are returned. Possible values are: <code>unix</code>, <code>unixnano</code>, <code>rfc3339</code>. Note: <code>unix</code> and <code>unixnano</code> return timestamps as integers; <code>rfc3339</code> returns timestamps as strings.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="14488">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14489"><code data-reactid="14490">"unixnano"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="14491">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="14492">
                <li data-reactid="14493">default value: unixnano</li>
                <li data-reactid="14494"><!-- react-text: 14495 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14496 -->unix, unixnano, rfc3339<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14497"><!-- react-text: 14498 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14499">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14500">
          <pre data-reactid="14501">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/logs/rayids/41ddf1740f67442d?fields=ClientIP,RayID,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=unixnano" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="14502"><!-- react-text: 14503 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="14504">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="14505">
          <pre data-reactid="14506">{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}
{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}
{"ClientIP":"192.0.2.1","RayID":"41ddf1740f67442d","EdgeStartTimestamp":1526810289280000000}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

           <tr data-reactid="14554">
            <td data-reactid="14555">If there is an error processing the request before any data has been sent to the client, appropriate status code will be set and error message will be sent in the response body. If there is an error after the response started then an error message will be appended to the response body and the response will be aborted (connection will be closed).</td>
           </tr>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="14692">
         <a class="anchor2" id="logpush-jobs-get-ownership-challenge" data-reactid="14693">logpush-jobs-get-ownership-challenge</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="14694">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="14695"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="14696">POST</span><!-- react-text: 14697 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14698 -->Get Ownership Challenge<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14699 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="14700"><!-- react-text: 14701 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14702 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14703 -->#logs:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="14704">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14705"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14706">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14707"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14708"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14709">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14710"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="14711"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14712">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="14713"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="14714"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="14715">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="14716"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="14717">
           <p>Get a new ownership challenge sent to your destination</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="14718"><!-- react-text: 14719 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14720 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 14721 -->zones/:zone_identifier/logpush/ownership<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="14915">
               <div data-reactid="14916">
                <p>Configuration string. It specifies things like requested fields and timestamp formats.                </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="14918"><code data-reactid="14919">"fields=RayID,ClientIP,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=rfc3339"</code></small>

               </div>
               <div data-reactid="15025">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15026"><code data-reactid="15027">"example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15029">

               </ul></td>

               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>

              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15052"><strong data-reactid="15053">dataset</strong><br data-reactid="15054"><small data-reactid="15055"><em data-reactid="15056"><!-- react-text: 15057 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15058 -->null<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15059">
               <div data-reactid="15060">

               </div>

               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="15072">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15073"><strong data-reactid="15074">logpull_options</strong><br data-reactid="15075"><small data-reactid="15076"><em data-reactid="15077"><!-- react-text: 15078 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15079 -->null<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15080 --> (uri)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15081">
               <div data-reactid="15082">
                <p>Configuration string. It specifies things like requested fields and timestamp formats. If migrating from the logpull api, copy the url (full url or just the query string) of your call here, and logpush will keep on making this call for you, setting start and end times appropriately.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="15083">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15084"><code data-reactid="15085">"fields=RayID,ClientIP,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=rfc3339"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="15086">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15087">
                <li data-reactid="15088"><!-- react-text: 15089 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15090 -->4096<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="15091">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15092"><strong data-reactid="15093">ownership_challenge</strong><br data-reactid="15094"><small data-reactid="15095"><em data-reactid="15096"><!-- react-text: 15097 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15098">
               <div data-reactid="15099">
                <p>Ownership challenge token to prove destination ownership.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="15100">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15101"><code data-reactid="15102">"00000000000000000000"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="15103">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15104">
                <li data-reactid="15105"><!-- react-text: 15106 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15107 -->4096<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="15108"><!-- react-text: 15109 -->pattern: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15110 -->^[a-zA-Z0-9/\+\.\-_]*$<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="15111">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15112"><strong data-reactid="15113">frequency</strong><br data-reactid="15114"><small data-reactid="15115"><em data-reactid="15116"><!-- react-text: 15117 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15118 -->null<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15119">
               <div data-reactid="15120">
                <p>The frequency at which Cloudflare sends batches of logs to your destination. Setting frequency to high sends your logs in larger quantities of smaller files. Setting frequency to low sends logs in smaller quantities of larger files.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="15121">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15122"><code data-reactid="15123">"high"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="15124">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15125">
                <li data-reactid="15126">default value: high</li>
                <li data-reactid="15127"><!-- react-text: 15128 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15129 -->high, low<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="15130"><!-- react-text: 15131 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="15132">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="15133">
          <pre data-reactid="15134">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/logpush/jobs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"example.com","enabled":false,"dataset":"http_requests","logpull_options":"fields=RayID,ClientIP,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=rfc3339","destination_conf":"s3://mybucket/logs?region=us-west-2","ownership_challenge":"00000000000000000000","frequency":"high"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="15135"><!-- react-text: 15136 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="15137">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="15138">
          <pre data-reactid="15139">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": 1,
    "enabled": false,
    "name": "example.com",
    "dataset": "http_requests",
    "logpull_options": "fields=RayID,ClientIP,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=rfc3339",
    "destination_conf": "s3://mybucket/logs?region=us-west-2",
    "last_complete": null,
    "last_error": null,
    "error_message": null,
    "frequency": "high"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>

               <div data-reactid="15251">
                <p>Configuration string. It specifies things like requested fields and timestamp formats.                </div>

                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15253"><code data-reactid="15254">"fields=RayID,ClientIP,EdgeStartTimestamp&amp;timestamps=rfc3339"</code></small>

         <a class="anchor2" id="logpush-jobs-check-destination-exists" data-reactid="15368">logpush-jobs-check-destination-exists</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="15369">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="15370"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="15371">POST</span><!-- react-text: 15372 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15373 -->Check Destination Exists<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15374 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="15375"><!-- react-text: 15376 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15377 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15378 -->#logs:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="15392">
           <p>Check if there is an existing job with a destination</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="15393"><!-- react-text: 15394 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15395 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15396 -->zones/:zone_identifier/logpush/validate/destination/exists<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="15397">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="15398"><em data-reactid="15399">Required</em><!-- react-text: 15400 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="15401">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="15402">
            <thead data-reactid="15403">
             <tr data-reactid="15404">
              <td data-reactid="15405"><!-- react-text: 15406 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="15407">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="15408"><!-- react-text: 15409 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="15410">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="15411">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="15412">
             <tr data-reactid="15413">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15414"><strong data-reactid="15415">destination_conf</strong><br data-reactid="15416"><small data-reactid="15417"><em data-reactid="15418"><!-- react-text: 15419 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15420 --> (uri)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15421">
               <div data-reactid="15422">
                <p>Uniquely identifies a resource (such as an s3 bucket) where data will be pushed. Additional configuration parameters supported by the destination may be included.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="15423">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="15424"><code data-reactid="15425">"s3://mybucket/logs?region=us-west-2"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="15426">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15427">
                <li data-reactid="15428"><!-- react-text: 15429 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15430 -->4096<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="15431"><!-- react-text: 15432 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="15433">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="15434">
          <pre data-reactid="15435">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/logpush/validate/destination/exists" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"destination_conf":"s3://mybucket/logs?region=us-west-2"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="15436"><!-- react-text: 15437 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="15438">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="15439">
          <pre data-reactid="15440">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "exists": false
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section id="logpush-jobs-errors" class="modunit" data-reactid="15441">
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="15442">

           <p>List, search, sort, and filter a zones' DNS records.</p> 
          </div>

          <div data-reactid="15722">
           <p>Create a new DNS record for a zone. See the record object definitions for required attributes for each record type</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="15723"><!-- react-text: 15724 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15725 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 15726 -->zones/:zone_identifier/dns_records<!-- /react-text --></pre>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="15791"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="15792">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="15793"><strong data-reactid="15794">ttl</strong><br data-reactid="15795"><small data-reactid="15796"><em data-reactid="15797"><!-- react-text: 15798 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="15799">

             <tr data-reactid="16132">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="16139">
               <div data-reactid="16140">
                <p>DNS record type</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16141">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="16142"><code data-reactid="16143">"A"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="16144">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="16145">
                <li data-reactid="16146"><!-- react-text: 16147 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16148 -->A, AAAA, CNAME, HTTPS, TXT, SRV, LOC, MX, NS, SPF, CERT, DNSKEY, DS, NAPTR, SMIMEA, SSHFP, SVCB, TLSA, URI<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="16149">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="16150">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="16151"><strong data-reactid="16152">name</strong><br data-reactid="16153"><small data-reactid="16154"><em data-reactid="16155"><!-- react-text: 16156 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="16157">
               <div data-reactid="16158">
                <p>DNS record name</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16159">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="16160"><code data-reactid="16161">"example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="16162">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="16163">
                <li data-reactid="16164"><!-- react-text: 16165 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16166 -->255<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="16167">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="16168"><strong data-reactid="16169">content</strong><br data-reactid="16170"><small data-reactid="16171"><em data-reactid="16172"><!-- react-text: 16173 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="16174">
               <div data-reactid="16175">
                <p>DNS record content</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16176">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="16177"><code data-reactid="16178">"127.0.0.1"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="16179">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="16180"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="16181">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="16182"><strong data-reactid="16183">ttl</strong><br data-reactid="16184"><small data-reactid="16185"><em data-reactid="16186"><!-- react-text: 16187 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="16188">
               <div data-reactid="16189">
                <p>Time to live for DNS record. Value of 1 is 'automatic'</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16190">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="16191"><code data-reactid="16192">120</code></small><span data-reactid="16193"><br data-reactid="16194"><!-- react-text: 16195 -->Any of the following:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16196">
                <h6 data-reactid="16197"></h6>
                <div data-reactid="16198">
                 <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="16199"><span class="verb" data-reactid="16200">Show</span><!-- react-text: 16201 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16202">
                <h6 data-reactid="16203"></h6>
                <div data-reactid="16204">
                 <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="16205"><span class="verb" data-reactid="16206">Show</span><!-- react-text: 16207 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
                </div>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="16208">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="16209"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="16210">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="16211"><strong data-reactid="16212">proxied</strong><br data-reactid="16213"><small data-reactid="16214"><em data-reactid="16215"><!-- react-text: 16216 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="16217">
               <div data-reactid="16218">
                <p>Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="16219">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="16220"><code data-reactid="16221">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="16222">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="16223">
                <li data-reactid="16224">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="16225"><!-- react-text: 16226 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="16227">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="16228">
          <pre data-reactid="16229">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/dns_records/372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"A","name":"example.com","content":"127.0.0.1","ttl":120,"proxied":false}'</pre>
         </div>

    "proxiable": true,
    "proxied": false,

           </tr>

           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16471">

           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16474">
            <td data-reactid="16475">1019</td>
            <td data-reactid="16476">Content for CNAME record is invalid</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16477">
            <td data-reactid="16478">1024</td>
            <td data-reactid="16479">Invalid priority, priority must be set and be between 0 and 65535</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16480">
            <td data-reactid="16481">1025</td>
            <td data-reactid="16482">Invalid content for an MX record</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16483">
            <td data-reactid="16484">1026</td>
            <td data-reactid="16485">Invalid format for a SPF record. A valid example is 'v=spf1 a mx -all'. You should not include either the word TXT or the domain name here in the content</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16486">
            <td data-reactid="16487">1027</td>
            <td data-reactid="16488">Invalid service value</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16489">
            <td data-reactid="16490">1028</td>
            <td data-reactid="16491">Invalid service value. Must be less than 100 characters</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16492">
            <td data-reactid="16493">1029</td>
            <td data-reactid="16494">Invalid protocol value</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16495">
            <td data-reactid="16496">1030</td>
            <td data-reactid="16497">Invalid protocol value. Must be less than 12 characters</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16498">
            <td data-reactid="16499">1031</td>
            <td data-reactid="16500">Invalid SRV name</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16501">
            <td data-reactid="16502">1032</td>
            <td data-reactid="16503">Invalid SRV name. Must be less than 90 characters</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16504">
            <td data-reactid="16505">1033</td>
            <td data-reactid="16506">Invalid weight value. Must be between 0 and 65,535</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16507">
            <td data-reactid="16508">1034</td>

           </tr>

           <tr data-reactid="16522">

           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16531">

           </tr>
