        <section id="dns-records-for-a-zone-notes" class="modunit" data-reactid="16615">
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="16616">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="16617"><!-- react-text: 16618 -->DNS Records for a Zone<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16619 --> Notes<!-- /react-text --></h3>
         </header>
         <table class="table striped notes" data-reactid="16620">
          <tbody data-reactid="16621">
           <tr data-reactid="16622">
            <td data-reactid="16623">If a zone's cname_setup_status is TRUE, you may only add A/AAAA and CNAME records for that zone</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16624">
            <td data-reactid="16625">When adding a CNAME record, it will not be added if there is an A or AAAA record with the same name</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16626">
            <td data-reactid="16627">When adding a A or AAAA record, it will not be added if there is an CNAME record with the same name</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16628">
            <td data-reactid="16629">A CNAME record's name may not match it's content</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16630">
            <td data-reactid="16631">You cannot add an NS record with the same name as any other record type</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16632">
            <td data-reactid="16633">You cannot add a record with the same name as any NS record</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16634">
            <td data-reactid="16635">Cloudflare will not begin serving DNS for a zone until the zone's nameservers are switched to Cloudflare nameservers at the zone's registrar</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16636">
            <td data-reactid="16637">DNS will continue to be served by Cloudflare for 20 days after a zone's nameservers are switched away from Cloudflare namservers</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="16638">
            <td data-reactid="16639">When using unicode characters in domain names, they will be translated to punycode and as such, the length may end up being larger than what is passed into the API</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="16640">
        <header data-reactid="16641">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="dns-analytics" data-reactid="16642"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="16643">DNS Analytics</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="16644">Analytics data for a zone.</h4>
        </header>
        <section data-reactid="16645">
         <a class="anchor" id="dns-analytics-properties" data-reactid="16646"><!-- react-text: 16647 -->$<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16648 -->dns-analytics<!-- /react-text --></a>
         <h3 data-reactid="16649">Metrics</h3>
         <p data-reactid="16650"><!-- react-text: 16651 -->A metric is a numerical value that is based on an attribute of the data, for example<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16652 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16653 -->a query count.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="16654"><!-- react-text: 16655 -->In API requests, <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16656">metrics</code><!-- react-text: 16657 --> are set in the metrics parameter. If you<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16658 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16659 -->need to list multiple metrics, separate them with commas.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="16660">
          <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="16661">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16662">
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16663">Metric</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16664">Name</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16665">Example</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16666">Unit</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="16667">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16668">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16669">queryCount</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16670">Query count</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16671">1000</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16672">Count</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16673">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16674">uncachedCount</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16675">Uncached query count</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16676">1</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16677">Count</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16678">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16679">staleCount</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16680">Stale query count</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16681">1</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16682">Count</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16683">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16684">responseTimeAvg</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16685">Average response time</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16686">1.0</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16687">Time in milliseconds.</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16688">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16689">responseTimeMedian</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16690">Median response time</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16691">1.0</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16692">Time in milliseconds.</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16693">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16694">responseTime90th</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16695">90th percentile response time</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16696">1.0</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16697">Time in milliseconds.</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16698">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16699">responseTime99th</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16700">99th percentile response time</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16701">1.0</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16702">Time in milliseconds.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
         <h3 data-reactid="16703">Dimensions</h3>
         <p data-reactid="16704">Dimensions can be used to break down the data by given attributes.</p>
         <p data-reactid="16705"><!-- react-text: 16706 -->In API requests, dimensions are set in the <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16707">dimensions</code><!-- react-text: 16708 --> parameter.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16709 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16710 -->If you need to list multiple dimensions, separate them with commas.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="16711">
          <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="16712">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16713">
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16714">Dimension</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16715">Name</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16716">Example</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16717">Notes</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="16718">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16719">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16720">queryName</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16721">Query Name</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16722"><code data-reactid="16723">example.com</code></td>
            <td data-reactid="16724"></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16725">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16726">queryType</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16727">Query Type</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16728"><code data-reactid="16729">AAAA</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16730"><!-- react-text: 16731 -->Types <!-- /react-text --><a href="http://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-4" data-reactid="16732">defined by IANA</a><!-- react-text: 16733 -->, unknown types are empty.<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16734">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16735">responseCode</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16736">Response Code</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16737"><code data-reactid="16738">NOERROR</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16739"><!-- react-text: 16740 -->Response codes <!-- /react-text --><a href="http://www.iana.org/assignments/dns-parameters/dns-parameters.xhtml#dns-parameters-6" data-reactid="16741">defined by IANA</a><!-- react-text: 16742 --> (always uppercase).<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16743">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16744">responseCached</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16745">Response Cached</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16746"><code data-reactid="16747">Cached</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16748"><!-- react-text: 16749 -->Either <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16750">Cached</code><!-- react-text: 16751 --> or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16752">Uncached</code><!-- react-text: 16753 -->.<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16754">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16755">coloName</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16756">Colo Name</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16757">SJC</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16758">PoP code.</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16759">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16760">origin</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16761">Origin</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16762"><code data-reactid="16763">2001:db8::1</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16764"><!-- react-text: 16765 -->Origin used to resolve the query (empty if N/A or if the query was<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16766 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16767 -->answered from cache).<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16768">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16769">dayOfWeek</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16770">Day Of Week</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16771"><code data-reactid="16772">1</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16773">Break down by day of week, (Monday is 1, and Sunday is 7).</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16774">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16775">tcp</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16776">TCP</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16777"><code data-reactid="16778">1</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16779"><!-- react-text: 16780 -->Either <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16781">1</code><!-- react-text: 16782 --> or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16783">0</code><!-- react-text: 16784 --> depending on the protocol used.<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16785">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16786">ipVersion</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16787">IP Version</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16788"><code data-reactid="16789">6</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16790"><!-- react-text: 16791 -->IP protocol version used (currently <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16792">4</code><!-- react-text: 16793 --> or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16794">6</code><!-- react-text: 16795 -->).<!-- /react-text --></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16796">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16797">querySizeBucket</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16798">Query Size Bucket</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16799"><code data-reactid="16800">16-31</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16801">Query size bucket by multiples of 16.</td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16802">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16803">responseSizeBucket</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16804">Response Size Bucket</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16805"><code data-reactid="16806">16-31</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16807">Response size bucket by multiples of 16.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
         <h3 data-reactid="16808">Filters</h3>
         <p data-reactid="16809"><!-- react-text: 16810 -->A filter uses the form: <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16811">dimension operator expression</code></p>
         <p data-reactid="16812">In this syntax:</p>
         <ul data-reactid="16813">
          <li data-reactid="16814"><strong data-reactid="16815">name</strong><!-- react-text: 16816 -->  the name of the dimension or metric to filter on.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16817 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16818 -->For example: <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16819">queryName</code></li>
          <li data-reactid="16820"><strong data-reactid="16821">operator</strong><!-- react-text: 16822 -->  defines the type of filter match to use. Operators<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16823 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16824 -->are specific to either dimensions or metrics.<!-- /react-text --></li>
          <li data-reactid="16825"><strong data-reactid="16826">expression</strong><!-- react-text: 16827 -->  states the values to be included in or excluded<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16828 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16829 -->from the results. Expressions use regular expression syntax<!-- /react-text --></li>
         </ul>
         <h3 data-reactid="16830">Filter Operators</h3>
         <table class="cf-table cf-table--bordered" data-reactid="16831">
          <thead class="cf-table__head" data-reactid="16832">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16833">
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16834">Operator</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16835">Name</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16836">Example</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16837">Notes</th>
            <th class="cf-table__cell cf-table__cell--head" data-reactid="16838">URL Encoded</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody class="cf-table__body" data-reactid="16839">
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16840">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16841"><code data-reactid="16842">==</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16843">Equals</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16844"><code data-reactid="16845">queryName==example.com</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16846"><!-- react-text: 16847 -->Return results where queryName is exactly <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16848">example.com</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16849"><code data-reactid="16850">%3D%3D</code></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16851">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16852"><code data-reactid="16853">!=</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16854">Does not equal</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16855"><code data-reactid="16856">responseCode!=NOERROR</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16857"><!-- react-text: 16858 -->Return results where response code is different from <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16859">NOERROR</code><!-- react-text: 16860 -->.<!-- /react-text --></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16861"><code data-reactid="16862">!%3D</code></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16863">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16864"><code data-reactid="16865">&gt;</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16866">Greater than</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16867"><code data-reactid="16868">queryCount&gt;1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16869"><!-- react-text: 16870 -->Return results where query count is higher than <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16871">1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16872"><code data-reactid="16873">%3E</code></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16874">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16875"><code data-reactid="16876">&lt;</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16877">Less than</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16878"><code data-reactid="16879">queryCount&lt;1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16880"><!-- react-text: 16881 -->Return results where query count is lower than <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16882">1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16883"><code data-reactid="16884">%3C</code></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16885">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16886"><code data-reactid="16887">&gt;=</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16888">Greater than or equal to</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16889"><code data-reactid="16890">queryCount&gt;=1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16891"><!-- react-text: 16892 -->Return results where query count is higher than or equal to <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16893">1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16894"><code data-reactid="16895">%3E%3D</code></td>
           </tr>
           <tr class="cf-table__row cf-table__row--default" data-reactid="16896">
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16897"><code data-reactid="16898">&lt;=</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16899">Less than or equal to</td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16900"><code data-reactid="16901">queryCount&lt;=1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16902"><!-- react-text: 16903 -->Return results where query count is lower than or equal to <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16904">1000</code></td>
            <td class="cf-table__cell" data-reactid="16905"><code data-reactid="16906">%3C%3D</code></td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
         <h3 data-reactid="16907">Combining Filters</h3>
         <p data-reactid="16908"><!-- react-text: 16909 -->Filters can be combined using <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16910">OR</code><!-- react-text: 16911 --> and <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16912">AND</code><!-- react-text: 16913 --> boolean logic. <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16914">AND</code><!-- react-text: 16915 --> takes precedence<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16916 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16917 -->over OR in all the expressions.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <h4 data-reactid="16918">OR</h4>
         <p data-reactid="16919"><!-- react-text: 16920 -->The <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16921">OR</code><!-- react-text: 16922 --> operator is defined using a comma (<!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16923">,</code><!-- react-text: 16924 -->) or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16925">OR</code><!-- react-text: 16926 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16927 -->keyword surrounded by whitespace.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="16928">Examples:</p>
         <ul data-reactid="16929">
          <li data-reactid="16930"><!-- react-text: 16931 -->Response code is either <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16932">NOERROR</code><!-- react-text: 16933 --> or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16934">NXDOMAIN</code><!-- react-text: 16935 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16936 --> <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16937">responseCode==NOERROR,responseCode==NXDOMAIN</code></li>
          <li data-reactid="16938"><!-- react-text: 16939 -->Queries in either <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16940">SJC</code><!-- react-text: 16941 --> or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16942">LAX</code><!-- react-text: 16943 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16944 --> <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16945">coloName==SJC OR coloName==LAX</code></li>
         </ul>
         <h4 data-reactid="16946">AND</h4>
         <p data-reactid="16947"><!-- react-text: 16948 -->The <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16949">AND</code><!-- react-text: 16950 --> operator is defined using a semicolon (<!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16951">;</code><!-- react-text: 16952 -->)<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16953 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16954 -->or <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16955">AND</code><!-- react-text: 16956 --> keyword surrounded by whitespace.<!-- /react-text --></p>
         <p data-reactid="16957">Examples:</p>
         <ul data-reactid="16958">
          <li data-reactid="16959"><!-- react-text: 16960 -->Response code is <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16961">NOERROR</code><!-- react-text: 16962 --> and query type is <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16963">AAAA:</code><!-- react-text: 16964 --> <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16965">responseCode==NOERROR;queryType==AAAA</code></li>
          <li data-reactid="16966"><code data-reactid="16967">AAAA</code><!-- react-text: 16968 --> queries in <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16969">SJC</code><!-- react-text: 16970 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16971 --> <!-- /react-text --><code data-reactid="16972">queryType==AAAA AND coloName==SJC</code></li>
         </ul>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="16973">
         <a class="anchor2" id="dns-analytics-table" data-reactid="16974">dns-analytics-table</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="16975">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="16976"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="16977">GET</span><!-- react-text: 16978 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16979 -->Table<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16980 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="16981">
           <p>Retrieves a list of summarised aggregate metrics over a given time period.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="16982"><!-- react-text: 16983 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16984 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 16985 -->zones/:identifier/dns_analytics/report<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="16986">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="16987"><em data-reactid="16988">Required</em><!-- react-text: 16989 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="16990">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="16991">
            <thead data-reactid="16992">
             <tr data-reactid="16993">
              <td data-reactid="16994"><!-- react-text: 16995 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="16996">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="16997"><!-- react-text: 16998 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="16999">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="17000">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="17001">
             <tr data-reactid="17002">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17003"><strong data-reactid="17004">dimensions</strong><br data-reactid="17005"><small data-reactid="17006"><em data-reactid="17007"><!-- react-text: 17008 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17009">
               <div data-reactid="17010">
                <p>Array of dimensions</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17011">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17012"><code data-reactid="17013">[ "responseCode", "queryName" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17014"><br data-reactid="17015"><!-- react-text: 17016 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17017">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17018"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17019">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17020 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17021">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17022"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17023">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17024"><strong data-reactid="17025">metrics</strong><br data-reactid="17026"><small data-reactid="17027"><em data-reactid="17028"><!-- react-text: 17029 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17030">
               <div data-reactid="17031">
                <p>Array of metrics</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17032">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17033"><code data-reactid="17034">[ "queryCount", "responseTimeAvg" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17035"><br data-reactid="17036"><!-- react-text: 17037 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17038">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17039"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17040">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17041 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17042">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17043"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17044">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17045"><strong data-reactid="17046">since</strong><br data-reactid="17047"><small data-reactid="17048"><em data-reactid="17049"><!-- react-text: 17050 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17051 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17052">
               <div data-reactid="17053">
                <p>Start date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17054">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17055"><code data-reactid="17056">"2016-11-11T12:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17057">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17058"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17059">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17060"><strong data-reactid="17061">until</strong><br data-reactid="17062"><small data-reactid="17063"><em data-reactid="17064"><!-- react-text: 17065 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17066 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17067">
               <div data-reactid="17068">
                <p>End date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17069">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17070"><code data-reactid="17071">"2016-11-11T13:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17072">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17073"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="17074">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17075"><em data-reactid="17076">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 17077 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="17078">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="17079">
            <thead data-reactid="17080">
             <tr data-reactid="17081">
              <td data-reactid="17082"><!-- react-text: 17083 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17084">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="17085"><!-- react-text: 17086 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17087">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="17088">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="17089">
             <tr data-reactid="17090">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17091"><strong data-reactid="17092">sort</strong><br data-reactid="17093"><small data-reactid="17094"><em data-reactid="17095"><!-- react-text: 17096 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17097">
               <div data-reactid="17098">
                <p>Array of dimensions to sort by, each dimension may be prefixed by - (descending) or + (ascending)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17099">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17100"><code data-reactid="17101">[ "+responseCode", "-queryName" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17102"><br data-reactid="17103"><!-- react-text: 17104 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17105">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17106"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17107">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17108 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17109">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17110"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17111">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17112"><strong data-reactid="17113">filters</strong><br data-reactid="17114"><small data-reactid="17115"><em data-reactid="17116"><!-- react-text: 17117 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17118">
               <div data-reactid="17119">
                <p>Segmentation filter in 'attribute operator value' format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17120">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17121"><code data-reactid="17122">"responseCode==NOERROR"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17123">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17124"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17125">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17126"><strong data-reactid="17127">limit</strong><br data-reactid="17128"><small data-reactid="17129"><em data-reactid="17130"><!-- react-text: 17131 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17132">
               <div data-reactid="17133">
                <p>Limit number of returned metrics, default is 100</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17134">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17135"><code data-reactid="17136">100</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17137">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17138"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17139"><!-- react-text: 17140 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17141">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17142">
          <pre data-reactid="17143">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/dns_analytics/report?dimensions=responseCode,queryName&amp;metrics=queryCount,responseTimeAvg&amp;sort=+responseCode,-queryName&amp;filters=responseCode==NOERROR&amp;since=2016-11-11T12:00:00Z&amp;until=2016-11-11T13:00:00Z&amp;limit=100" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17144"><!-- react-text: 17145 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17146">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17147">
          <pre data-reactid="17148">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "rows": 100,
    "totals": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "min": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "max": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "data_lag": 60
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="17149">
         <a class="anchor2" id="dns-analytics-by-time" data-reactid="17150">dns-analytics-by-time</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="17151">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="17152"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="17153">GET</span><!-- react-text: 17154 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17155 -->By Time<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17156 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="17157">
           <p>Retrieves a list of aggregate metrics grouped by time interval.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="17158"><!-- react-text: 17159 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17160 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17161 -->zones/:identifier/dns_analytics/report/bytime<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="17162">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17163"><em data-reactid="17164">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 17165 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="17166">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="17167">
            <thead data-reactid="17168">
             <tr data-reactid="17169">
              <td data-reactid="17170"><!-- react-text: 17171 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17172">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="17173"><!-- react-text: 17174 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17175">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="17176">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="17177">
             <tr data-reactid="17178">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17179"><strong data-reactid="17180">dimensions</strong><br data-reactid="17181"><small data-reactid="17182"><em data-reactid="17183"><!-- react-text: 17184 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17185">
               <div data-reactid="17186">
                <p>Array of dimensions</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17187">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17188"><code data-reactid="17189">[ "responseCode", "queryName" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17190"><br data-reactid="17191"><!-- react-text: 17192 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17193">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17194"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17195">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17196 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17197">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17198"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17199">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17200"><strong data-reactid="17201">metrics</strong><br data-reactid="17202"><small data-reactid="17203"><em data-reactid="17204"><!-- react-text: 17205 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17206">
               <div data-reactid="17207">
                <p>Array of metrics</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17208">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17209"><code data-reactid="17210">[ "queryCount", "responseTimeAvg" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17211"><br data-reactid="17212"><!-- react-text: 17213 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17214">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17215"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17216">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17217 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17218">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17219"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17220">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17221"><strong data-reactid="17222">sort</strong><br data-reactid="17223"><small data-reactid="17224"><em data-reactid="17225"><!-- react-text: 17226 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17227">
               <div data-reactid="17228">
                <p>Array of dimensions to sort by, each dimension may be prefixed by - (descending) or + (ascending)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17229">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17230"><code data-reactid="17231">[ "+responseCode", "-queryName" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="17232"><br data-reactid="17233"><!-- react-text: 17234 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17235">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="17236"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17237">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17238 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17239">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17240"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17241">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17242"><strong data-reactid="17243">filters</strong><br data-reactid="17244"><small data-reactid="17245"><em data-reactid="17246"><!-- react-text: 17247 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17248">
               <div data-reactid="17249">
                <p>Segmentation filter in 'attribute operator value' format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17250">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17251"><code data-reactid="17252">"responseCode==NOERROR"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17253">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17254"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17255">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17256"><strong data-reactid="17257">since</strong><br data-reactid="17258"><small data-reactid="17259"><em data-reactid="17260"><!-- react-text: 17261 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17262 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17263">
               <div data-reactid="17264">
                <p>Start date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17265">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17266"><code data-reactid="17267">"2016-11-11T12:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17268">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17269"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17270">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17271"><strong data-reactid="17272">until</strong><br data-reactid="17273"><small data-reactid="17274"><em data-reactid="17275"><!-- react-text: 17276 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17277 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17278">
               <div data-reactid="17279">
                <p>End date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17280">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17281"><code data-reactid="17282">"2016-11-11T13:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17283">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17284"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17285">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17286"><strong data-reactid="17287">limit</strong><br data-reactid="17288"><small data-reactid="17289"><em data-reactid="17290"><!-- react-text: 17291 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17292">
               <div data-reactid="17293">
                <p>Limit number of returned metrics, default is 100</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17294">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17295"><code data-reactid="17296">100</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17297">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17298"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="17299">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="17300"><strong data-reactid="17301">time_delta</strong><br data-reactid="17302"><small data-reactid="17303"><em data-reactid="17304"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="17305">
               <div data-reactid="17306">
                <p>Unit of time to group data by</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="17307">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="17308"><code data-reactid="17309">"hour"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="17310">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="17311">
                <li data-reactid="17312"><!-- react-text: 17313 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17314 -->all, auto, year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, dekaminute, minute<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17315"><!-- react-text: 17316 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17317">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17318">
          <pre data-reactid="17319">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/dns_analytics/report/bytime?dimensions=responseCode,queryName&amp;metrics=queryCount,responseTimeAvg&amp;sort=+responseCode,-queryName&amp;filters=responseCode==NOERROR&amp;since=2016-11-11T12:00:00Z&amp;until=2016-11-11T13:00:00Z&amp;limit=100&amp;time_delta=hour" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17320"><!-- react-text: 17321 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17322">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17323">
          <pre data-reactid="17324">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "rows": 100,
    "totals": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "min": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "max": {
      "queryCount": 1000,
      "responseTimeAvg": 1
    },
    "data_lag": 60
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

        <header data-reactid="17494">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="dns-firewall" data-reactid="17495"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="17496">DNS Firewall</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="17497">Account-level DNS Firewall Management</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="17498">
         <a class="anchor" id="dns-firewall-properties" data-reactid="17499">dns-firewall</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="17500">
          <h4 data-reactid="17501"><!-- react-text: 17502 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="17503">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="17504"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="17505"><span class="verb" data-reactid="17506">Show</span><!-- react-text: 17507 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17508 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="17509">
         <a class="anchor2" id="dns-firewall-list-dns-firewall-clusters" data-reactid="17510">dns-firewall-list-dns-firewall-clusters</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="17511">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="17512"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="17513">GET</span><!-- react-text: 17514 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17515 -->List DNS Firewall Clusters<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17516 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17517"><!-- react-text: 17518 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17519 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17520 -->#dns_records:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="17521">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="17522"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17523">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="17524"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="17525"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17526">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="17527"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="17528"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17529">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="17530"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="17531"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17532">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="17533"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="17534">
           <p>List configured DNS Firewall clusters for an account</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="17535"><!-- react-text: 17536 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17537 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17538 -->accounts/:account_identifier/virtual_dns<!-- /react-text --></pre>

         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17905"><!-- react-text: 17906 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17907">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17908">
          <pre data-reactid="17909">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/virtual_dns/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac","name":"My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster","origin_ips":["192.0.2.1","198.51.100.1","2001:DB8:100::CF"],"virtual_dns_ips":["203.0.113.1","203.0.113.254","2001:DB8:AB::CF","2001:DB8:CD::CF"],"minimum_cache_ttl":60,"maximum_cache_ttl":900,"negative_cache_ttl":900,"deprecate_any_requests":true,"ecs_fallback":false,"ratelimit":600,"modified_on":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="17910"><!-- react-text: 17911 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="17912">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="17913">
          <pre data-reactid="17914">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac",
    "name": "My Awesome DNS Firewall cluster",
    "origin_ips": [
      "192.0.2.1",
      "198.51.100.1",
      "2001:DB8:100::CF"
    ],
    "virtual_dns_ips": [
      "203.0.113.1",
      "203.0.113.254",
      "2001:DB8:AB::CF",
      "2001:DB8:CD::CF"
    ],

         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="17915">
         <a class="anchor2" id="dns-firewall-delete-dns-firewall-cluster" data-reactid="17916">dns-firewall-delete-dns-firewall-cluster</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="17917">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="17918"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="17919">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 17920 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17921 -->Delete DNS Firewall Cluster<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17922 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="17923"><!-- react-text: 17924 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17925 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17926 -->#dns_records:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="17927">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="17928"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17929">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="17930"></div></li>

             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="17933"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="17934"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="17935">business</h6>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="17939"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="17940">
           <p>Delete a configured DNS Firewall Cluster</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="17941"><!-- react-text: 17942 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17943 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 17944 -->accounts/:account_identifier/virtual_dns/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

          <pre data-reactid="17949">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/virtual_dns/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="18139">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="18140"><strong data-reactid="18141">ecs_fallback</strong><br data-reactid="18142"><small data-reactid="18143"><em data-reactid="18144"><!-- react-text: 18145 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18146">
               <div data-reactid="18147">
                <p>Forward client IP (resolver) subnet if no EDNS Client Subnet is sent</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18148">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18149"><code data-reactid="18150">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="18151">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="18152">
                <li data-reactid="18153">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="18154">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="18155"><strong data-reactid="18156">ratelimit</strong><br data-reactid="18157"><small data-reactid="18158"><em data-reactid="18159"><!-- react-text: 18160 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18161">
               <div data-reactid="18162">
                <p>Ratelimit in queries per second.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18163">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18164"><code data-reactid="18165">600</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="18166">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="18167">
                <li data-reactid="18168"><!-- react-text: 18169 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18170 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18171 -->100000000<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="18172"><!-- react-text: 18173 -->notes: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18174 -->A ratelimit of 0 turns off the ratelimit. Otherwise the minimum is 100.<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>

        <header data-reactid="18186">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="dns-firewall-analytics" data-reactid="18187"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="18188">DNS Firewall Analytics</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="18189">Analytics data for a DNS Firewall cluster.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="18190">
         <a class="anchor" id="dns-firewall-analytics-properties" data-reactid="18191">dns-firewall-analytics</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="18192">
          <h4 data-reactid="18193"><!-- react-text: 18194 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="18195">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="18196"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="18197"><span class="verb" data-reactid="18198">Show</span><!-- react-text: 18199 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18200 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="18201">
         <a class="anchor2" id="dns-firewall-analytics-table" data-reactid="18202">dns-firewall-analytics-table</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="18203">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="18204"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="18205">GET</span><!-- react-text: 18206 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18207 -->Table<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18208 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="18209">
           <p>Retrieves a list of summarised aggregate metrics over a given time period.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="18210"><!-- react-text: 18211 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18212 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18213 -->accounts/:account_identifier/virtual_dns/:identifier/dns_analytics/report<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="18214">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="18215"><em data-reactid="18216">Required</em><!-- react-text: 18217 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="18218">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="18219">
            <thead data-reactid="18220">
             <tr data-reactid="18221">
              <td data-reactid="18222"><!-- react-text: 18223 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="18224">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="18225"><!-- react-text: 18226 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="18227">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="18228">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="18229">
             <tr data-reactid="18230">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="18231"><strong data-reactid="18232">dimensions</strong><br data-reactid="18233"><small data-reactid="18234"><em data-reactid="18235"><!-- react-text: 18236 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18237">
               <div data-reactid="18238">
                <p>Array of dimensions</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18239">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18240"><code data-reactid="18241">[ "responseCode", "queryName" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="18242"><br data-reactid="18243"><!-- react-text: 18244 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18245">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="18246"><span class="verb" data-reactid="18247">Show</span><!-- react-text: 18248 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="18249">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="18250"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="18251">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="18252"><strong data-reactid="18253">metrics</strong><br data-reactid="18254"><small data-reactid="18255"><em data-reactid="18256"><!-- react-text: 18257 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18258">
               <div data-reactid="18259">
                <p>Array of metrics</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18260">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18261"><code data-reactid="18262">[ "queryCount", "responseTimeAvg" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="18263"><br data-reactid="18264"><!-- react-text: 18265 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18266">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="18267"><span class="verb" data-reactid="18268">Show</span><!-- react-text: 18269 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="18270">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="18271"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="18272">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="18273"><strong data-reactid="18274">since</strong><br data-reactid="18275"><small data-reactid="18276"><em data-reactid="18277"><!-- react-text: 18278 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18279 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18280">
               <div data-reactid="18281">
                <p>Start date and time of requesting data period in the ISO8601 format</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18282">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18283"><code data-reactid="18284">"2016-11-11T12:00:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="18285">

               <div data-reactid="18296">

           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="18302">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="18360">
               <div data-reactid="18361">
                <p>Limit number of returned metrics, default is 100</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="18362">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="18363"><code data-reactid="18364">100</code></small>

          <pre data-reactid="18371">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/virtual_dns/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/dns_analytics/report?dimensions=responseCode,queryName&amp;metrics=queryCount,responseTimeAvg&amp;sort=+responseCode,-queryName&amp;filters=responseCode==NOERROR&amp;since=2016-11-11T12:00:00Z&amp;until=2016-11-11T13:00:00Z&amp;limit=100" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>

         <a class="anchor2" id="secondary-dns-secondary-zone-configuration-details" data-reactid="18570">secondary-dns-secondary-zone-configuration-details</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="18571">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="18572"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="18573">GET</span><!-- react-text: 18574 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18575 -->Secondary Zone Configuration Details<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18576 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="18577"><!-- react-text: 18578 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18579 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18580 -->#dns_records:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="18581">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="18582"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="18583">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="18584"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="18585"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="18586">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="18587"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="18588"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="18589">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="18590"></div></li>

             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="18593"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="18594">
           <p>Get secondary zone configuration</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="18595"><!-- react-text: 18596 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18597 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 18598 -->zones/:identifier/secondary_dns<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="18599"><!-- react-text: 18600 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="18601">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="18602">
          <pre data-reactid="18603">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/269d8f4853475ca241c4e730be286b20/secondary_dns" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="18604"><!-- react-text: 18605 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="18606">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="18607">
          <pre data-reactid="18608">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "269d8f4853475ca241c4e730be286b20",
    "name": "www.example.com.",
    "primaries": [
      "23ff594956f20c2a721606e94745a8aa",

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="18921">
        <header data-reactid="18922">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="secondary-dns-tsig-" data-reactid="18923"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="18924">Secondary DNS (TSIG)</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="18925">TSIG key management for secondary DNS</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="18926">
         <a class="anchor" id="secondary-dns-tsig--properties" data-reactid="18927">secondary-dns-tsig-</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="18928">
          <h4 data-reactid="18929"><!-- react-text: 18930 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="18931">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>

              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="19253"><strong data-reactid="19254">algo</strong><br data-reactid="19255"><small data-reactid="19256"><em data-reactid="19257"><!-- react-text: 19258 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="19259">
               <div data-reactid="19260">
                <p>TSIG algorithm</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="19261">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="19262"><code data-reactid="19263">"hmac-sha512."</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="19264">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="19265"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="19266"><!-- react-text: 19267 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="19268">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="19269">
          <pre data-reactid="19270">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/secondary_dns/tsigs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"tsig.customer.cf.","secret":"caf79a7804b04337c9c66ccd7bef9190a1e1679b5dd03d8aa10f7ad45e1a9dab92b417896c15d4d007c7c14194538d2a5d0feffdecc5a7f0e1c570cfa700837c","algo":"hmac-sha512."}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="19271"><!-- react-text: 19272 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="19273">(example)</small></h5>

    "secret": "caf79a7804b04337c9c66ccd7bef9190a1e1679b5dd03d8aa10f7ad45e1a9dab92b417896c15d4d007c7c14194538d2a5d0feffdecc5a7f0e1c570cfa700837c",
    "algo": "hmac-sha512."

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="19890">
         <a class="anchor2" id="account-level-custom-nameservers-verify-account-custom-nameserver-glue-records" data-reactid="19891">account-level-custom-nameservers-verify-account-custom-nameserver-glue-records</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="19892">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="19893"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="19894">POST</span><!-- react-text: 19895 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 19896 -->Verify Account Custom Nameserver Glue Records<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 19897 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="19898"><!-- react-text: 19899 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 19900 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 19901 -->#dns_records:edit<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 19902 -->#organization:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="19903">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="19904"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="19905">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="19906"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="19907"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="19908">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="19909"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="19910"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="19911">business</h6>

           </ul></h3>

           <p>A list of available Custom Pages the zone can use</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="20243"><!-- react-text: 20244 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20245 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20246 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_pages<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20247"><!-- react-text: 20248 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20249">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20250">
          <pre data-reactid="20251">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_pages" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20252"><!-- react-text: 20253 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20254">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20255">
          <pre data-reactid="20256">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "basic_challenge",
      "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
      "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
