        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="20491">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-list-ssl-configurations" data-reactid="20492">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-list-ssl-configurations</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="20493">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="20494"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="20495">GET</span><!-- react-text: 20496 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20497 -->List SSL Configurations<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20498 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20499"><!-- react-text: 20500 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20501 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20502 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="20503">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20504"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20505">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20506"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20507"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20508">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20509"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20510"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20511">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20512"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20513"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20514">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20515"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="20516">
           <p>List, search, and filter all of your custom SSL certificates. The higher priority will break ties across overlapping 'legacy_custom' certificates, but 'legacy_custom' certificates will always supercede 'sni_custom' certificates.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="20517"><!-- react-text: 20518 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20519 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20520 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="20521">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20522"><em data-reactid="20523">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 20524 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="20525">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="20526">
            <thead data-reactid="20527">
             <tr data-reactid="20528">
              <td data-reactid="20529"><!-- react-text: 20530 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20531">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="20532"><!-- react-text: 20533 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20534">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="20535">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="20536">
             <tr data-reactid="20537">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20538"><strong data-reactid="20539">status</strong><br data-reactid="20540"><small data-reactid="20541"><em data-reactid="20542"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20543">
               <div data-reactid="20544">
                <p>Status of the zone's custom SSL</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20545">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20546"><code data-reactid="20547">"active"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20548">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20549">
                <li data-reactid="20550"><!-- react-text: 20551 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20552 -->active, expired, deleted, pending, initializing<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="20553">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20554">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20555"><strong data-reactid="20556">page</strong><br data-reactid="20557"><small data-reactid="20558"><em data-reactid="20559"><!-- react-text: 20560 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20561">
               <div data-reactid="20562">
                <p>Page number of paginated results</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20563">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20564"><code data-reactid="20565">1</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20566">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20567">
                <li data-reactid="20568">default value: 1</li>
                <li data-reactid="20569"><!-- react-text: 20570 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20571 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20572 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20573">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20574"><strong data-reactid="20575">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="20576"><small data-reactid="20577"><em data-reactid="20578"><!-- react-text: 20579 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20580">
               <div data-reactid="20581">
                <p>Number of zones per page</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20582">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20583"><code data-reactid="20584">20</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20585">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20586">
                <li data-reactid="20587">default value: 20</li>
                <li data-reactid="20588"><!-- react-text: 20589 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20590 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20591 -->5<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="20592"><!-- react-text: 20593 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20594 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20595 -->50<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20596">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20597"><strong data-reactid="20598">match</strong><br data-reactid="20599"><small data-reactid="20600"><em data-reactid="20601"><!-- react-text: 20602 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20603">
               <div data-reactid="20604">
                <p>Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20605">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20606"><code data-reactid="20607">"all"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20608">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20609">
                <li data-reactid="20610">default value: all</li>
                <li data-reactid="20611"><!-- react-text: 20612 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20613 -->any, all<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20614"><!-- react-text: 20615 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20616">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20617">
          <pre data-reactid="20618">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_certificates?status=active&amp;page=1&amp;per_page=20&amp;match=all" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20619"><!-- react-text: 20620 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20621">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20622">
          <pre data-reactid="20623">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60",
      "hosts": [
        "example.com"
      ],
      "issuer": "GlobalSign",
      "signature": "SHA256WithRSA",
      "status": "active",
      "bundle_method": "ubiquitous",
      "geo_restrictions": {
        "label": "us"
      },
      "zone_id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
      "uploaded_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "expires_on": "2016-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "priority": 1
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="20624">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-create-ssl-configuration" data-reactid="20625">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-create-ssl-configuration</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="20626">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="20627"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="20628">POST</span><!-- react-text: 20629 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20630 -->Create SSL Configuration<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20631 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20632"><!-- react-text: 20633 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20634 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20635 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="20636">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20637"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20638">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20639"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20640"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20641">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20642"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20643"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20644">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20645"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20646"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20647">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20648"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="20649">
           <p>Upload a new SSL certificate for a zone</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="20650"><!-- react-text: 20651 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20652 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20653 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

         <div data-reactid="20698">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20699"><em data-reactid="20700">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 20701 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="20702">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="20703">
            <thead data-reactid="20704">
             <tr data-reactid="20705">
              <td data-reactid="20706"><!-- react-text: 20707 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20708">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="20709"><!-- react-text: 20710 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20711">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="20712">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="20713">
             <tr data-reactid="20714">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20715"><strong data-reactid="20716">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="20717"><small data-reactid="20718"><em data-reactid="20719"><!-- react-text: 20720 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20721">
               <div data-reactid="20722">
                <p>A ubiquitous bundle has the highest probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle uses the shortest chain and newest intermediates. And the force bundle verifies the chain, but does not otherwise modify it.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20723">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20724"><code data-reactid="20725">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20726">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20727">
                <li data-reactid="20728">default value: ubiquitous</li>
                <li data-reactid="20729"><!-- react-text: 20730 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20731 -->ubiquitous, optimal, force<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20732">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20733"><strong data-reactid="20734">geo_restrictions</strong><br data-reactid="20735"><small data-reactid="20736"><em data-reactid="20737"><!-- react-text: 20738 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20739">
               <div data-reactid="20740">
                <p>Specify the region where your private key can be held locally for optimal TLS performance. HTTPS connections to any excluded data center will still be fully encrypted, but will incur some latency while Keyless SSL is used to complete the handshake with the nearest allowed data center. Options allow distribution to only to U.S. data centers, only to E.U. data centers, or only to highest security data centers. Default distribution is to all Cloudflare datacenters, for optimal performance.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20741">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20742"><code data-reactid="20743">{ "label": "us" }</code></small><span data-reactid="20744"><br data-reactid="20745"><!-- react-text: 20746 -->An object with the following properties:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20747">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="20748"><span class="verb" data-reactid="20749">Show</span><!-- react-text: 20750 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20751">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20752"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20753">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20754"><strong data-reactid="20755">type</strong><br data-reactid="20756"><small data-reactid="20757"><em data-reactid="20758"><!-- react-text: 20759 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20760">
               <div data-reactid="20761">
                <p>The type 'legacy_custom' enables support for legacy clients which do not include SNI in the TLS handshake.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20762">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20763"><code data-reactid="20764">"sni_custom"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20765">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20766">
                <li data-reactid="20767">default value: legacy_custom</li>
                <li data-reactid="20768"><!-- react-text: 20769 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20770 -->legacy_custom, sni_custom<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>

     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="20820">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-edit-ssl-configuration" data-reactid="20821">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-edit-ssl-configuration</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="20822">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="20823"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="20824">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 20825 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20826 -->Edit SSL Configuration<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20827 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20828"><!-- react-text: 20829 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20830 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20831 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="20832">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20833"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20834">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20835"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20836"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20837">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20838"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20839"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20840">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20841"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20842"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20843">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20844"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="20845">
           <p>Upload a new private key and/or PEM/CRT for the SSL certificate. Note: PATCHing a configuration for sni_custom certificates will result in a new resource id being returned, and the previous one being deleted.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="20846"><!-- react-text: 20847 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20848 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20849 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20892">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20893"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20894">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20895"><strong data-reactid="20896">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="20897"><small data-reactid="20898"><em data-reactid="20899"><!-- react-text: 20900 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20901">
               <div data-reactid="20902">
                <p>A ubiquitous bundle has the highest probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle uses the shortest chain and newest intermediates. And the force bundle verifies the chain, but does not otherwise modify it.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20903">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20904"><code data-reactid="20905">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20906">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20907">
                <li data-reactid="20908">default value: ubiquitous</li>
                <li data-reactid="20909"><!-- react-text: 20910 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20911 -->ubiquitous, optimal, force<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="20912">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="20913"><strong data-reactid="20914">geo_restrictions</strong><br data-reactid="20915"><small data-reactid="20916"><em data-reactid="20917"><!-- react-text: 20918 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="20919">
               <div data-reactid="20920">
                <p>Specify the region where your private key can be held locally for optimal TLS performance. HTTPS connections to any excluded data center will still be fully encrypted, but will incur some latency while Keyless SSL is used to complete the handshake with the nearest allowed data center. Options allow distribution to only to U.S. data centers, only to E.U. data centers, or only to highest security data centers. Default distribution is to all Cloudflare datacenters, for optimal performance.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20921">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="20922"><code data-reactid="20923">{ "label": "us" }</code></small><span data-reactid="20924"><br data-reactid="20925"><!-- react-text: 20926 -->An object with the following properties:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="20927">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="20928"><span class="verb" data-reactid="20929">Show</span><!-- react-text: 20930 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="20931">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="20932"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20933"><!-- react-text: 20934 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20935">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20936">

     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \

         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-delete-ssl-configuration" data-reactid="20944">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-delete-ssl-configuration</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="20945">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="20946"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="20947">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 20948 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20949 -->Delete SSL Configuration<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20950 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20951"><!-- react-text: 20952 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20953 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20954 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="20955">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20956"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20957">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20958"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20959"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20960">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20961"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20962"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20963">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20964"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="20965"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20966">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="20967"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="20968">
           <p>Remove a SSL certificate from a zone.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="20969"><!-- react-text: 20970 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20971 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20972 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20973"><!-- react-text: 20974 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20975">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="20976">
          <pre data-reactid="20977">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_certificates/2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="20978"><!-- react-text: 20979 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="20980">(example)</small></h5>

  "success": true,
  "errors": [],

    "id": "2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60"

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="20983">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-ssl-for-a-zone-re-prioritize-ssl-certificates" data-reactid="20984">custom-ssl-for-a-zone-re-prioritize-ssl-certificates</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="20985">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="20986"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="20987">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 20988 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20989 -->Re-prioritize SSL Certificates<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20990 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="20991"><!-- react-text: 20992 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20993 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 20994 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="20995">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20996"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="20997">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="20998"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="20999"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21000">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21001"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21002"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21003">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21004"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21005"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21006">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21007"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21008">
           <p>If a zone has multiple SSL certificates, you can set the order in which they should be used during a request. The higher priority will break ties across overlapping 'legacy_custom' certificates.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21009"><!-- react-text: 21010 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21011 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21012 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_certificates/prioritize<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="21013">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21014"><em data-reactid="21015">Required</em><!-- react-text: 21016 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="21017">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="21018">
            <thead data-reactid="21019">
             <tr data-reactid="21020">
              <td data-reactid="21021"><!-- react-text: 21022 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21023">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21024"><!-- react-text: 21025 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21026">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21027">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="21028">
             <tr data-reactid="21029">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21030"><strong data-reactid="21031">certificates</strong><br data-reactid="21032"><small data-reactid="21033"><em data-reactid="21034"><!-- react-text: 21035 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21036">
               <div data-reactid="21037">
                <p>Array of ordered certificates.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21038">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21039"><code data-reactid="21040">[ { "id": "5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac", "priority": 2 }, { "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac", "priority": 1 } ]</code></small><span data-reactid="21041"><br data-reactid="21042"><!-- react-text: 21043 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21044">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="21045"><span class="verb" data-reactid="21046">Show</span><!-- react-text: 21047 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21048">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21049"></ul></td>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21050"><!-- react-text: 21051 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="21052">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="21053">
          <pre data-reactid="21054">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_certificates/prioritize" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"certificates":[{"id":"5a7805061c76ada191ed06f989cc3dac","priority":2},{"id":"9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac","priority":1}]}'</pre>
         </div>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="21060">
        <header data-reactid="21061">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone" data-reactid="21062"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="21063">Custom Hostname for a Zone</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="21064">Manage hostnames for your zone that are routed via CNAME.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21065">
         <a class="anchor" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="21066">custom-hostname-for-a-zone</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="21067">
          <h4 data-reactid="21068"><!-- react-text: 21069 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="21070">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="21071"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="21072"><span class="verb" data-reactid="21073">Show</span><!-- react-text: 21074 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21075 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21076">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-list-custom-hostnames" data-reactid="21077">custom-hostname-for-a-zone-list-custom-hostnames</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21078">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21079"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21080">GET</span><!-- react-text: 21081 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21082 -->List Custom Hostnames<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21083 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21084"><!-- react-text: 21085 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21086 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21087 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21088">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21089"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21090">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21091"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21092"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21093">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21094"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21095"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21096">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21097"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21098"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21099">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21100"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21101">
           <p>List, search, sort, and filter all of your custom hostnames</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21102"><!-- react-text: 21103 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21104 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21105 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_hostnames<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="21106">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21107"><em data-reactid="21108">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 21109 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="21110">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="21111">
            <thead data-reactid="21112">
             <tr data-reactid="21113">
              <td data-reactid="21114"><!-- react-text: 21115 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21116">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21117"><!-- react-text: 21118 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21119">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21120">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="21121">
             <tr data-reactid="21122">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21123"><strong data-reactid="21124">hostname</strong><br data-reactid="21125"><small data-reactid="21126"><em data-reactid="21127"><!-- react-text: 21128 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21129">
               <div data-reactid="21130">
                <p>Fully qualified domain name to match against. This parameter cannot be used with the 'id' parameter.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21131">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21132"><code data-reactid="21133">"app.example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21134">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21135">
                <li data-reactid="21136"><!-- react-text: 21137 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21138 -->255<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21139">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21140"><strong data-reactid="21141">id</strong><br data-reactid="21142"><small data-reactid="21143"><em data-reactid="21144"><!-- react-text: 21145 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21146">
               <div data-reactid="21147">
                <p>Hostname ID to match against. This ID was generated and returned during the initial custom_hostname creation. This parameter cannot be used with the 'hostname' parameter.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21148">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21149"><code data-reactid="21150">"0d89c70d-ad9f-4843-b99f-6cc0252067e9"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21151">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21152">
                <li data-reactid="21153"><!-- react-text: 21154 -->min length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21155 -->36<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="21156"><!-- react-text: 21157 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21158 -->36<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21159">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21160"><strong data-reactid="21161">page</strong><br data-reactid="21162"><small data-reactid="21163"><em data-reactid="21164"><!-- react-text: 21165 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21166">
               <div data-reactid="21167">
                <p>Page number of paginated results</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21168">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21169"><code data-reactid="21170">1</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21171">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21172">

                <li data-reactid="21174"><!-- react-text: 21175 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21176 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21177 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21178">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21179"><strong data-reactid="21180">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="21181"><small data-reactid="21182"><em data-reactid="21183"><!-- react-text: 21184 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21185">

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21201">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21202"><strong data-reactid="21203">order</strong><br data-reactid="21204"><small data-reactid="21205"><em data-reactid="21206"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21207">
               <div data-reactid="21208">
                <p>Field to order hostnames by</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21209">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21210"><code data-reactid="21211">"ssl"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21212">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21213">

                <li data-reactid="21215"><!-- react-text: 21216 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21217 -->ssl, ssl_status<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21218">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21219"><strong data-reactid="21220">direction</strong><br data-reactid="21221"><small data-reactid="21222"><em data-reactid="21223"></em></small></td>

              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21229">

                <li data-reactid="21231"><!-- react-text: 21232 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21233 -->asc, desc<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21234">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21235"><strong data-reactid="21236">ssl</strong><br data-reactid="21237"><small data-reactid="21238"><em data-reactid="21239"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21240">
               <div data-reactid="21241">

               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21245">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21246">

                <li data-reactid="21248"><!-- react-text: 21249 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21250 -->0, 1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21261">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-create-custom-hostname" data-reactid="21262">custom-hostname-for-a-zone-create-custom-hostname</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21263">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21264"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21265">POST</span><!-- react-text: 21266 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21267 -->Create Custom Hostname<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21268 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21269"><!-- react-text: 21270 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21271 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21272 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21273">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21274"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21275">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21276"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21277"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21278">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21279"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21280"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21281">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21282"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21283"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21284">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21285"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21286">
           <p>Add a new custom hostname and request that an SSL certificate be issued for it. One of three validation methodshttp, txt, emailshould be used, with 'http' recommended if the CNAME is already in place (or will be soon). Specifying 'email' will send an email to the WHOIS contacts on file for the base domain plus hostmaster, postmaster, webmaster, admin, administrator. If http is used and the domain is not already pointing to the Managed CNAME host, the PATCH method must be used once it is (to complete validation).</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21287"><!-- react-text: 21288 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21289 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21290 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_hostnames<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="21291">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21292"><em data-reactid="21293">Required</em><!-- react-text: 21294 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="21295">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="21296">
            <thead data-reactid="21297">
             <tr data-reactid="21298">
              <td data-reactid="21299"><!-- react-text: 21300 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21301">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21302"><!-- react-text: 21303 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21304">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="21305">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="21306">
             <tr data-reactid="21307">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21308"><strong data-reactid="21309">hostname</strong><br data-reactid="21310"><small data-reactid="21311"><em data-reactid="21312"><!-- react-text: 21313 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21314">
               <div data-reactid="21315">
                <p>The custom hostname that will point to your hostname via CNAME.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21316">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21317"><code data-reactid="21318">"app.example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21319">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21320">
                <li data-reactid="21321"><!-- react-text: 21322 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21323 -->255<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="21324">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="21325">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="21326"><strong data-reactid="21327">ssl</strong><br data-reactid="21328"><small data-reactid="21329"><em data-reactid="21330"><!-- react-text: 21331 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21332">
               <div data-reactid="21333">
                <p>SSL properties used when creating the custom hostname</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21334">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21335"><code data-reactid="21336">{ "method": "http", "type": "dv", "settings": { "http2": "on", "http3": "on", "min_tls_version": "1.2",                <div data-reactid="21340">
                <h6 data-reactid="21341"></h6>
                <div data-reactid="21342">
                 <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="21343"><span class="verb" data-reactid="21344">Show</span><!-- react-text: 21345 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
                </div>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="21346">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="21347"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21358">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-custom-hostname-details" data-reactid="21359">custom-hostname-for-a-zone-custom-hostname-details</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21360">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21361"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21362">GET</span><!-- react-text: 21363 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21364 -->Custom Hostname Details<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21365 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21366"><!-- react-text: 21367 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21368 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21369 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21370">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21371"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21372">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21373"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21374"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21375">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21376"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21377"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21378">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21379"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21380"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21381">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21382"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21383"><!-- react-text: 21384 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21385 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21386 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_hostnames/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21387"><!-- react-text: 21388 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="21389">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="21390">
          <pre data-reactid="21391">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/custom_hostnames/0d89c70d-ad9f-4843-b99f-6cc0252067e9" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

      "custom_key": "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIEowIBAAKCAQEAwQHoetcl9+5ikGzV6cMzWtWPJHqXT3wpbEkRU9Yz7lgvddmG\ndtcGbg/1CGZu0jJGkMoppoUo4c3dts3iwqRYmBikUP77wwY2QGmDZw2FvkJCJlKn\nabIRuGvBKwzESIXgKk2016aTP6/dAjEHyo6SeoK8lkIySUvK0fyOVlsiEsCmOpid\ntnKX/a+50GjB79CJH4ER2lLVZnhePFR/zUOyPxZQQ4naHf7yu/b5jhO0f8fwt+py\nFxIXjbEIdZliWRkRMtzrHOJIhrmJ2A1J7iOrirbbwillwjjNVUWPf3IJ3M12S9pE\newooaeO2izNTERcG9HzAacbVRn2Y2SWIyT/18QIDAQABAoIBACbhTYXBZYKmYPCb\nHBR1IBlCQA2nLGf0qRuJNJZg5iEzXows/6tc8YymZkQE7nolapWsQ+upk2y5Xdp/\naxiuprIs9JzkYK8Ox0r+dlwCG1kSW+UAbX0bQ/qUqlsTvU6muVuMP8vZYHxJ3wmb\n+ufRBKztPTQ/rYWaYQcgC0RWI20HTFBMxlTAyNxYNWzX7RKFkGVVyB9RsAtmcc8g\n+j4OdosbfNoJPS0HeIfNpAznDfHKdxDk2Yc1tV6RHBrC1ynyLE9+TaflIAdo2MVv\nKLMLq51GqYKtgJFIlBRPQqKoyXdz3fGvXrTkf/WY9QNq0J1Vk5ERePZ54mN8iZB7\n9lwy/AkCgYEA6FXzosxswaJ2wQLeoYc7ceaweX/SwTvxHgXzRyJIIT0eJWgx13Wo\n/WA3Iziimsjf6qE+SI/8laxPp2A86VMaIt3Z3mJN/CqSVGw8LK2AQst+OwdPyDMu\niacE8lj/IFGC8mwNUAb9CzGU3JpU4PxxGFjS/eMtGeRXCWkK4NE+G08CgYEA1Kp9\nN2JrVlqUz+gAX+LPmE9OEMAS9WQSQsfCHGogIFDGGcNf7+uwBM7GAaSJIP01zcoe\nVAgWdzXCv3FLhsaZoJ6RyLOLay5phbu1iaTr4UNYm5WtYTzMzqh8l1+MFFDl9xDB\nvULuCIIrglM5MeS/qnSg1uMoH2oVPj9TVst/ir8CgYEAxrI7Ws9Zc4Bt70N1As+U\nlySjaEVZCMkqvHJ6TCuVZFfQoE0r0whdLdRLU2PsLFP+q7qaeZQqgBaNSKeVcDYR\n9B+nY/jOmQoPewPVsp/vQTCnE/R81spu0mp0YI6cIheT1Z9zAy322svcc43JaWB7\nmEbeqyLOP4Z4qSOcmghZBSECgYACvR9Xs0DGn+wCsW4vze/2ei77MD4OQvepPIFX\ndFZtlBy5ADcgE9z0cuVB6CiL8DbdK5kwY9pGNr8HUCI03iHkW6Zs+0L0YmihfEVe\nPG19PSzK9CaDdhD9KFZSbLyVFmWfxOt50H7YRTTiPMgjyFpfi5j2q348yVT0tEQS\nfhRqaQKBgAcWPokmJ7EbYQGeMbS7HC8eWO/RyamlnSffdCdSc7ue3zdVJxpAkQ8W\nqu80pEIF6raIQfAf8MXiiZ7auFOSnHQTXUbhCpvDLKi0Mwq3G8Pl07l+2s6dQG6T\nlv6XTQaMyf6n1yjzL+fzDrH3qXMxHMO/b13EePXpDMpY7HQpoLDi\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n"

         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21397">
         <a class="anchor2" id="custom-hostname-for-a-zone-edit-custom-hostname" data-reactid="21398">custom-hostname-for-a-zone-edit-custom-hostname</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21399">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21400"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21401">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 21402 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21403 -->Edit Custom Hostname<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21404 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21405"><!-- react-text: 21406 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21407 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21408 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21409">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21410"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21411">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21412"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21413"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21414">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21415"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21416"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21417">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21418"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21419"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21420">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21421"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21422">
           <p>Modify SSL configuration for a custom hostname. When sent with SSL config that matches existing config, used to indicate that hostname should pass domain control validation (DCV). Can also be used to change validation type, e.g., from 'http' to 'email'.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21423"><!-- react-text: 21424 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21425 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21426 -->zones/:zone_identifier/custom_hostnames/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="21427">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21428"><em data-reactid="21429">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 21430 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>

          <pre data-reactid="21512">{

        <header data-reactid="21719">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone" data-reactid="21720"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="21721">Keyless SSL for a Zone</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="21722">A Keyless certificate is an SSL certificate where the SSL private key is not stored on Cloudflare</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21723">
         <a class="anchor" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-properties" data-reactid="21724">keyless-ssl-for-a-zone</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="21725">
          <h4 data-reactid="21726"><!-- react-text: 21727 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="21728">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="21729"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="21730"><span class="verb" data-reactid="21731">Show</span><!-- react-text: 21732 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21733 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21734">
         <a class="anchor2" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-list-keyless-ssl-configurations" data-reactid="21735">keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-list-keyless-ssl-configurations</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21736">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21737"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21738">GET</span><!-- react-text: 21739 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21740 -->List Keyless SSL Configurations<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21741 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21742"><!-- react-text: 21743 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21744 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21745 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21746">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21747"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21748">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21749"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21750"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21751">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21752"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21753"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21754">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21755"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21756"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21757">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21758"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21759">
           <p>List all Keyless SSL configurations for a given zone</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21760"><!-- react-text: 21761 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21762 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21763 -->zones/:zone_identifier/keyless_certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21764"><!-- react-text: 21765 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="21766">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="21767">
          <pre data-reactid="21768">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/keyless_certificates" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="21769"><!-- react-text: 21770 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="21771">(example)</small></h5>

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="21912">
               <div data-reactid="21913">
                <p>A ubiquitous bundle has the highest probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle uses the shortest chain and newest intermediates. And the force bundle verifies the chain, but does not otherwise modify it.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="21914">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="21915"><code data-reactid="21916">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
               </div></td>

           </table>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="21973">
         <a class="anchor2" id="keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-edit-keyless-ssl-configuration" data-reactid="21974">keyless-ssl-for-a-zone-edit-keyless-ssl-configuration</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="21975">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="21976"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="21977">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 21978 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21979 -->Edit Keyless SSL Configuration<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21980 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="21981"><!-- react-text: 21982 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21983 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 21984 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="21985">
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21986"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21987">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21988"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21989"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21990">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21991"></div></li>
            <li class="plan unavailable" data-reactid="21992"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21993">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-remove small" data-reactid="21994"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="21995"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="21996">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="21997"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="21998">
           <p>This will update attributes of a Keyless SSL. Consists of one or more of the following: host,name,port,certificate,enabled</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="21999"><!-- react-text: 22000 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22001 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22002 -->zones/:zone_identifier/keyless_certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="22003">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22004"><em data-reactid="22005">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 22006 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="22007">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="22008">
            <thead data-reactid="22009">
             <tr data-reactid="22010">
              <td data-reactid="22011"><!-- react-text: 22012 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22013">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22014"><!-- react-text: 22015 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22016">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22017">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="22018">
             <tr data-reactid="22019">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22020"><strong data-reactid="22021">host</strong><br data-reactid="22022"><small data-reactid="22023"><em data-reactid="22024"><!-- react-text: 22025 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22026">
               <div data-reactid="22027">
                <p>The keyless SSL name</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22028">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22029"><code data-reactid="22030">"example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22031">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22032">
                <li data-reactid="22033"><!-- react-text: 22034 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22035 -->253<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="22036"><!-- react-text: 22037 -->pattern: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22038 -->hostname_or_ip<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22039">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22040"><strong data-reactid="22041">name</strong><br data-reactid="22042"><small data-reactid="22043"><em data-reactid="22044"><!-- react-text: 22045 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22046">
               <div data-reactid="22047">
                <p>The keyless SSL name</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22048">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22049"><code data-reactid="22050">"example.com Keyless SSL"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22051">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22052">
                <li data-reactid="22053"><!-- react-text: 22054 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22055 -->180<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="22056">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22057">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22058"><strong data-reactid="22059">port</strong><br data-reactid="22060"><small data-reactid="22061"><em data-reactid="22062"><!-- react-text: 22063 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22064">
               <div data-reactid="22065">
                <p>The keyless SSL port used to commmunicate between Cloudflare and the client's Keyless SSL server</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22066">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22067"><code data-reactid="22068">24008</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22069">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22070">
                <li data-reactid="22071">default value: 24008</li>
                <li data-reactid="22072"><!-- react-text: 22073 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22074 -->65535<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22075">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22076"><strong data-reactid="22077">enabled</strong><br data-reactid="22078"><small data-reactid="22079"><em data-reactid="22080"><!-- react-text: 22081 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22082">
               <div data-reactid="22083">
                <p>Whether or not the Keyless SSL is on or off</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22084">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22085"><code data-reactid="22086">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22087">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22088">
                <li data-reactid="22089">valid values: (true,false)</li>
                <li data-reactid="22090">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22091"><!-- react-text: 22092 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22093">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22094">
          <pre data-reactid="22095">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/keyless_certificates/4d2844d2ce78891c34d0b6c0535a291e" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"host":"example.com","name":"example.com Keyless SSL","port":24008,"enabled":false}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22096"><!-- react-text: 22097 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22098">(example)</small></h5>

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {

    "host": "example.com",
    "port": 24008,
    "status": "active",
    "enabled": false,
    "permissions": [
      "#ssl:read",
      "#ssl:edit"
    ],

    "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00Z"

         </div>
        </section>

        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="22145">

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="22156">
         <a class="anchor2" id="analyze-certificate-analyze-certificate" data-reactid="22157">analyze-certificate-analyze-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="22158">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="22159"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="22160">POST</span><!-- react-text: 22161 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22162 -->Analyze Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22163 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22164"><!-- react-text: 22165 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22166 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22167 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="22168">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22169"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22170">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22171"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22172"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22173">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22174"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22175"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22176">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22177"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22178"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22179">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22180"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="22181">
           <p>Returns the set of hostnames, the signature algorithm, and the expiration date of the certificate.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="22182"><!-- react-text: 22183 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22184 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22185 -->zones/:identifier/ssl/analyze<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="22186">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22187"><em data-reactid="22188">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 22189 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="22190">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="22191">
            <thead data-reactid="22192">
             <tr data-reactid="22193">
              <td data-reactid="22194"><!-- react-text: 22195 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22196">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22197"><!-- react-text: 22198 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22199">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22200">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="22201">
             <tr data-reactid="22202">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22203"><strong data-reactid="22204">certificate</strong><br data-reactid="22205"><small data-reactid="22206"><em data-reactid="22207"><!-- react-text: 22208 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22209">
               <div data-reactid="22210">
                <p>The zone's SSL certificate or certificate and the intermediate(s)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22211">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22212"><code data-reactid="22213">"-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIDtTCCAp2gAwIBAgIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAMEUxCzAJBgNV\nBAYTAkFVMRMwEQYDVQQIEwpTb21lLVN0YXRlMSEwHwYDVQQKExhJbnRlcm5ldCBX\naWRnaXRzIFB0eSBMdGQwHhcNMTYwODI0MTY0MzAxWhcNMTYxMTIyMTY0MzAxWjBF\nMQswCQYDVQQGEwJBVTETMBEGA1UECBMKU29tZS1TdGF0ZTEhMB8GA1UEChMYSW50\nZXJuZXQgV2lkZ2l0cyBQdHkgTHRkMIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIB\nCgKCAQEAwQHoetcl9+5ikGzV6cMzWtWPJHqXT3wpbEkRU9Yz7lgvddmGdtcGbg/1\nCGZu0jJGkMoppoUo4c3dts3iwqRYmBikUP77wwY2QGmDZw2FvkJCJlKnabIRuGvB\nKwzESIXgKk2016aTP6/dAjEHyo6SeoK8lkIySUvK0fyOVlsiEsCmOpidtnKX/a+5\n0GjB79CJH4ER2lLVZnhePFR/zUOyPxZQQ4naHf7yu/b5jhO0f8fwt+pyFxIXjbEI\ndZliWRkRMtzrHOJIhrmJ2A1J7iOrirbbwillwjjNVUWPf3IJ3M12S9pEewooaeO2\nizNTERcG9HzAacbVRn2Y2SWIyT/18QIDAQABo4GnMIGkMB0GA1UdDgQWBBT/LbE4\n9rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJIGDB1BgNVHSMEbjBsgBT/LbE49rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJI\nGKFJpEcwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgTClNvbWUtU3RhdGUxITAfBgNV\nBAoTGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZIIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMAwGA1UdEwQF\nMAMBAf8wDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQADggEBAHHFwl0tH0quUYZYO0dZYt4R7SJ0pCm2\n2satiyzHl4OnXcHDpekAo7/a09c6Lz6AU83cKy/+x3/djYHXWba7HpEu0dR3ugQP\nMlr4zrhd9xKZ0KZKiYmtJH+ak4OM4L3FbT0owUZPyjLSlhMtJVcoRp5CJsjAMBUG\nSvD8RX+T01wzox/Qb+lnnNnOlaWpqu8eoOenybxKp1a9ULzIVvN/LAcc+14vioFq\n2swRWtmocBAs8QR9n4uvbpiYvS8eYueDCWMM4fvFfBhaDZ3N9IbtySh3SpFdQDhw\nYbjM2rxXiyLGxB4Bol7QTv4zHif7Zt89FReT/NBy4rzaskDJY5L6xmY=\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22214">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22215"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22216">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22217"><strong data-reactid="22218">bundle_method</strong><br data-reactid="22219"><small data-reactid="22220"><em data-reactid="22221"><!-- react-text: 22222 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22223">
               <div data-reactid="22224">
                <p>A ubiquitous bundle has the highest probability of being verified everywhere, even by clients using outdated or unusual trust stores. An optimal bundle uses the shortest chain and newest intermediates. And the force bundle verifies the chain, but does not otherwise modify it.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22225">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22226"><code data-reactid="22227">"ubiquitous"</code></small>
               </div></td>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>

     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"certificate":"-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIDtTCCAp2gAwIBAgIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAMEUxCzAJBgNV\nBAYTAkFVMRMwEQYDVQQIEwpTb21lLVN0YXRlMSEwHwYDVQQKExhJbnRlcm5ldCBX\naWRnaXRzIFB0eSBMdGQwHhcNMTYwODI0MTY0MzAxWhcNMTYxMTIyMTY0MzAxWjBF\nMQswCQYDVQQGEwJBVTETMBEGA1UECBMKU29tZS1TdGF0ZTEhMB8GA1UEChMYSW50\nZXJuZXQgV2lkZ2l0cyBQdHkgTHRkMIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIB\nCgKCAQEAwQHoetcl9+5ikGzV6cMzWtWPJHqXT3wpbEkRU9Yz7lgvddmGdtcGbg/1\nCGZu0jJGkMoppoUo4c3dts3iwqRYmBikUP77wwY2QGmDZw2FvkJCJlKnabIRuGvB\nKwzESIXgKk2016aTP6/dAjEHyo6SeoK8lkIySUvK0fyOVlsiEsCmOpidtnKX/a+5\n0GjB79CJH4ER2lLVZnhePFR/zUOyPxZQQ4naHf7yu/b5jhO0f8fwt+pyFxIXjbEI\ndZliWRkRMtzrHOJIhrmJ2A1J7iOrirbbwillwjjNVUWPf3IJ3M12S9pEewooaeO2\nizNTERcG9HzAacbVRn2Y2SWIyT/18QIDAQABo4GnMIGkMB0GA1UdDgQWBBT/LbE4\n9rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJIGDB1BgNVHSMEbjBsgBT/LbE49rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJI\nGKFJpEcwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgTClNvbWUtU3RhdGUxITAfBgNV\nBAoTGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZIIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMAwGA1UdEwQF\nMAMBAf8wDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQADggEBAHHFwl0tH0quUYZYO0dZYt4R7SJ0pCm2\n2satiyzHl4OnXcHDpekAo7/a09c6Lz6AU83cKy/+x3/djYHXWba7HpEu0dR3ugQP\nMlr4zrhd9xKZ0KZKiYmtJH+ak4OM4L3FbT0owUZPyjLSlhMtJVcoRp5CJsjAMBUG\nSvD8RX+T01wzox/Qb+lnnNnOlaWpqu8eoOenybxKp1a9ULzIVvN/LAcc+14vioFq\n2swRWtmocBAs8QR9n4uvbpiYvS8eYueDCWMM4fvFfBhaDZ3N9IbtySh3SpFdQDhw\nYbjM2rxXiyLGxB4Bol7QTv4zHif7Zt89FReT/NBy4rzaskDJY5L6xmY=\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n","bundle_method":"ubiquitous"}'</pre>
         </div>

        <header data-reactid="22245">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="certificate-packs" data-reactid="22246"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="22247">Certificate Packs</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="22248"></h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="22249">
         <a class="anchor" id="certificate-packs-properties" data-reactid="22250">certificate-packs</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="22251">
          <h4 data-reactid="22252"><!-- react-text: 22253 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="22254">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="22255"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="22256"><span class="verb" data-reactid="22257">Show</span><!-- react-text: 22258 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22259 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>

             <tr data-reactid="22297">

               <div data-reactid="22313">

          <div data-reactid="22438">
           <p>For a given zone, order a certificate pack with a list of hostnames</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="22439"><!-- react-text: 22440 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22441 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22442 -->zones/:zone_identifier/ssl/certificate_packs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="22443">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22444"><em data-reactid="22445">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 22446 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="22447">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="22448">
            <thead data-reactid="22449">
             <tr data-reactid="22450">
              <td data-reactid="22451"><!-- react-text: 22452 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22453">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22454"><!-- react-text: 22455 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22456">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22457">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="22458">
             <tr data-reactid="22459">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22460"><strong data-reactid="22461">hosts</strong><br data-reactid="22462"><small data-reactid="22463"><em data-reactid="22464"><!-- react-text: 22465 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22466">
               <div data-reactid="22467">
                <p>Comma separated list of valid host names for the certificate packs. Must contain the zone apex, may not contain more than 50 hosts, and may not be empty.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22468">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22469"><code data-reactid="22470">[ "example.com", "*.example.com", "www.example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="22471"><br data-reactid="22472"><!-- react-text: 22473 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22474">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="22475"><span class="verb" data-reactid="22476">Show</span><!-- react-text: 22477 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22478">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22479"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22480"><!-- react-text: 22481 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22482">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22483">
          <pre data-reactid="22484">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/ssl/certificate_packs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"hosts":["example.com","*.example.com","www.example.com"]}'</pre>
         </div>

             <tr data-reactid="22528">

               <div data-reactid="22545">
