             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22554">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22555"><strong data-reactid="22556">hosts</strong><br data-reactid="22557"><small data-reactid="22558"><em data-reactid="22559"><!-- react-text: 22560 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22561">
               <div data-reactid="22562">
                <p>Comma separated list of valid host names for the certificate packs. Must contain the zone apex, may not contain more than 50 hosts, and may not be empty.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22563">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22564"><code data-reactid="22565">[ "example.com", "*.example.com", "www.example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="22566"><br data-reactid="22567"><!-- react-text: 22568 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22569">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="22570"><span class="verb" data-reactid="22571">Show</span><!-- react-text: 22572 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22573">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22574"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22575">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22576"><strong data-reactid="22577">validation_method</strong><br data-reactid="22578"><small data-reactid="22579"><em data-reactid="22580"><!-- react-text: 22581 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22582">
               <div data-reactid="22583">
                <p>Validation Method selected for the order</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22584">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22585"><code data-reactid="22586">"txt"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22587">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22588">
                <li data-reactid="22589"><!-- react-text: 22590 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22591 -->txt, http, email<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22592">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22593"><strong data-reactid="22594">validity_days</strong><br data-reactid="22595"><small data-reactid="22596"><em data-reactid="22597"><!-- react-text: 22598 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22599">
               <div data-reactid="22600">
                <p>Validity Days selected for the order</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22601">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22602"><code data-reactid="22603">365</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22604">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22605">
                <li data-reactid="22606"><!-- react-text: 22607 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22608 -->14, 30, 90, 365<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="22609">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22610"><strong data-reactid="22611">certificate_authority</strong><br data-reactid="22612"><small data-reactid="22613"><em data-reactid="22614"><!-- react-text: 22615 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22616">
               <div data-reactid="22617">
                <p>Certificate Authority selected for the order. Selecting Let's Encrypt will reduce customization of other fields: validation_method must be 'txt', validity_days must be 90, cloudflare_branding must be omitted, and hosts must contain only 2 entries, one for the zone name and one for the subdomain wildcard of the zone name (e.g. example.com, *.example.com).</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22618">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22619"><code data-reactid="22620">"digicert"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22621">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22622">
                <li data-reactid="22623"><!-- react-text: 22624 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22625 -->digicert, lets_encrypt<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="22626">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22627"><em data-reactid="22628">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 22629 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="22630">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="22631">
            <thead data-reactid="22632">
             <tr data-reactid="22633">
              <td data-reactid="22634"><!-- react-text: 22635 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22636">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22637"><!-- react-text: 22638 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22639">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22640">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="22641">
             <tr data-reactid="22642">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22643"><strong data-reactid="22644">cloudflare_branding</strong><br data-reactid="22645"><small data-reactid="22646"><em data-reactid="22647"><!-- react-text: 22648 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22649">
               <div data-reactid="22650">
                <p>Whether or not to add Cloudflare Branding for the order. This will add sni.cloudflaressl.com as the Common Name if set true</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22651">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22652"><code data-reactid="22653">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22654">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22655">
                <li data-reactid="22656">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22657"><!-- react-text: 22658 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22659">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22660">
          <pre data-reactid="22661">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/ssl/certificate_packs/order" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"advanced","hosts":["example.com","*.example.com","www.example.com"],"validation_method":"txt","validity_days":365,"certificate_authority":"digicert","cloudflare_branding":false}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22662"><!-- react-text: 22663 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22664">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22665">
          <pre data-reactid="22666">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "3822ff90-ea29-44df-9e55-21300bb9419b",
    "type": "advanced",
    "hosts": [
      "example.com",
      "*.example.com",
      "www.example.com"
    ],
    "status": "initializing",
    "validation_method": "txt",
    "validity_days": 365,
    "certificate_authority": "digicert",
    "cloudflare_branding": false
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

         <div data-reactid="22851">

            <thead data-reactid="22857">
             <tr data-reactid="22858">

              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22873">
               <div data-reactid="22874">
                <p>Immediately retry SSL Verification</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22875">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22876"><code data-reactid="22877">true</code></small>
               </div></td>

               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22879">

            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22883"><!-- react-text: 22884 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22885">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22886">
          <pre data-reactid="22887">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/ssl/verification?retry=true" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22888"><!-- react-text: 22889 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22890">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22891">
          <pre data-reactid="22892">{
  "result": [
    {
      "certificate_status": "active",
      "verification_type": "cname",
      "verification_status": true,
      "verification_info": {
        "record_name": "b3b90cfedd89a3e487d3e383c56c4267.example.com",
        "record_target": "6979be7e4cfc9e5c603e31df7efac9cc60fee82d.comodoca.com"
      },
      "brand_check": false,
      "validation_method": "txt",
      "cert_pack_uuid": "a77f8bd7-3b47-46b4-a6f1-75cf98109948"
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="22893">
         <a class="anchor2" id="ssl-verification-edit-ssl-certificate-pack-validation-method" data-reactid="22894">ssl-verification-edit-ssl-certificate-pack-validation-method</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="22895">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="22896"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="22897">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 22898 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22899 -->Edit SSL Certificate Pack Validation Method<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22900 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22901"><!-- react-text: 22902 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22903 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22904 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22905 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="22906">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22907"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22908">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22909"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22910"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22911">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22912"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22913"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22914">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22915"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="22916"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="22917">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="22918"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="22919">
           <p>Edit SSL validation method for a certificate pack. A PATCH request will request an immediate validation check on any certificate, and return the updated status. If a validation method is provided, the validation will be immediately attempted using that method.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="22920"><!-- react-text: 22921 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22922 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22923 -->zones/:zone_identifier/ssl/verification/:cert_pack_uuid<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="22924">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22925"><em data-reactid="22926">Required</em><!-- react-text: 22927 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="22928">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="22929">
            <thead data-reactid="22930">
             <tr data-reactid="22931">
              <td data-reactid="22932"><!-- react-text: 22933 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22934">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22935"><!-- react-text: 22936 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="22937">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="22938">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="22939">
             <tr data-reactid="22940">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="22941"><strong data-reactid="22942">validation_method</strong><br data-reactid="22943"><small data-reactid="22944"><em data-reactid="22945"><!-- react-text: 22946 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="22947">
               <div data-reactid="22948">
                <p>Desired validation method</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="22949">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="22950"><code data-reactid="22951">"txt"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="22952">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="22953">
                <li data-reactid="22954"><!-- react-text: 22955 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 22956 -->http, cname, txt, email<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22957"><!-- react-text: 22958 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22959">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="22960">
          <pre data-reactid="22961">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/ssl/verification/a77f8bd7-3b47-46b4-a6f1-75cf98109948" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"validation_method":"txt"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="22962"><!-- react-text: 22963 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="22964">(example)</small></h5>

  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],

    "validation_method": "txt",
    "status": "pending_validation"
  }

         </div>

         <a class="anchor2" id="universal-ssl-settings-for-a-zone-edit-universal-ssl-settings" data-reactid="23024">universal-ssl-settings-for-a-zone-edit-universal-ssl-settings</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23025">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23026"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23027">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 23028 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23029 -->Edit Universal SSL Settings<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23030 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23031"><!-- react-text: 23032 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23033 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23034 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23035 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23036">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23037"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23038">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23039"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23040"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23041">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23042"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23043"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23044">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23045"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23046"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23047">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23048"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23049">
           <p>Patch Universal SSL Settings for a Zone</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23050"><!-- react-text: 23051 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23052 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23053 -->zones/:zone_identifier/ssl/universal/settings<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="23054">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23055"><em data-reactid="23056">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 23057 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="23058">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="23059">
            <thead data-reactid="23060">
             <tr data-reactid="23061">
              <td data-reactid="23062"><!-- react-text: 23063 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23064">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23065"><!-- react-text: 23066 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23067">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23068">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="23069">
             <tr data-reactid="23070">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23071"><strong data-reactid="23072">enabled</strong><br data-reactid="23073"><small data-reactid="23074"><em data-reactid="23075"><!-- react-text: 23076 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23077">
               <div data-reactid="23078">
                <p>Disabling Universal SSL removes any currently active Universal SSL certificates for your zone from the edge and prevents any future Universal SSL certificates from being ordered. If there are no dedicated certificates or custom certificates uploaded for the domain, visitors will be unable to access the domain over HTTPS.</p> 
                <p>By disabling Universal SSL, you understand that the following Cloudflare settings and preferences will result in visitors being unable to visit your domain unless you have uploaded a custom certificate or purchased a dedicated certificate.</p> 
                <ul> 
                 <li>HSTS</li> 
                 <li>Always Use HTTPS</li> 
                 <li>Opportunistic Encryption</li> 
                 <li>Onion Routing</li> 
                 <li>Any Page Rules redirecting traffic to HTTPS</li> 
                </ul> 
                <p>Similarly, any HTTP redirect to HTTPS at the origin while the Cloudflare proxy is enabled will result in users being unable to visit your site without a valid certificate at Cloudflare's edge.</p> 
                <p>If you do not have a valid custom or dedicated certificate at Cloudflare's edge and are unsure if any of the above Cloudflare settings are enabled, or if any HTTP redirects exist at your origin, we advise leaving Universal SSL enabled for your domain.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23079">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23080"><code data-reactid="23081">true</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23082">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23083">
                <li data-reactid="23084">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23085"><!-- react-text: 23086 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23087">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23088">
          <pre data-reactid="23089">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/ssl/universal/settings" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"enabled":true}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23090"><!-- react-text: 23091 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23092">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23093">
          <pre data-reactid="23094">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "enabled": true
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="23095">
        <header data-reactid="23096">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="origin-ca" data-reactid="23097"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="23098">Origin CA</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="23099">API to create Cloudflare-issued SSL certificates that can be installed on your origin server. Use your Origin CA Key as your User Service Key when calling these endpoints (see the section on request headers for details).</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23100">
         <a class="anchor" id="origin-ca-properties" data-reactid="23101">origin-ca</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="23102">
          <h4 data-reactid="23103"><!-- react-text: 23104 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="23105">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="23106"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="23107"><span class="verb" data-reactid="23108">Show</span><!-- react-text: 23109 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23110 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23111">
         <a class="anchor2" id="origin-ca-list-certificates" data-reactid="23112">origin-ca-list-certificates</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23113">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23114"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23115">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23116 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23117 -->List Certificates<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23118 --> <!-- /react-text -->

             <tr data-reactid="23144">

               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23165">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23166">

             </tr>

          <pre data-reactid="23175">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/certificates?zone_id=023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353" \
     -H "X-Auth-User-Service-Key: v1.0-e24fd090c02efcfecb4de8f4ff246fd5c75b48946fdf0ce26c59f91d0d90797b-cfa33fe60e8e34073c149323454383fc9005d25c9b4c502c2f063457ef65322eade065975001a0b4b4c591c5e1bd36a6e8f7e2d4fa8a9ec01c64c041e99530c2-07b9efe0acd78c82c8d9c690aacb8656d81c369246d7f996a205fe3c18e9254a"</pre>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23179">
          <pre data-reactid="23180">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "328578533902268680212849205732770752308931942346",
      "certificate": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIICvDCCAaQCAQAwdzELMAkGA1UEBhMCVVMxDTALBgNVBAgMBFV0YWgxDzANBgNV\nBAcMBkxpbmRvbjEWMBQGA1UECgwNRGlnaUNlcnQgSW5jLjERMA8GA1UECwwIRGln\naUNlcnQxHTAbBgNVBAMMFGV4YW1wbGUuZGlnaWNlcnQuY29tMIIBIjANBgkqhkiG\n9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIBCgKCAQEA8+To7d+2kPWeBv/orU3LVbJwDrSQbeKamCmo\nwp5bqDxIwV20zqRb7APUOKYoVEFFOEQs6T6gImnIolhbiH6m4zgZ/CPvWBOkZc+c\n1Po2EmvBz+AD5sBdT5kzGQA6NbWyZGldxRthNLOs1efOhdnWFuhI162qmcflgpiI\nWDuwq4C9f+YkeJhNn9dF5+owm8cOQmDrV8NNdiTqin8q3qYAHHJRW28glJUCZkTZ\nwIaSR6crBQ8TbYNE0dc+Caa3DOIkz1EOsHWzTx+n0zKfqcbgXi4DJx+C1bjptYPR\nBPZL8DAeWuA8ebudVT44yEp82G96/Ggcf7F33xMxe0yc+Xa6owIDAQABoAAwDQYJ\nKoZIhvcNAQEFBQADggEBAB0kcrFccSmFDmxox0Ne01UIqSsDqHgL+XmHTXJwre6D\nhJSZwbvEtOK0G3+dr4Fs11WuUNt5qcLsx5a8uk4G6AKHMzuhLsJ7XZjgmQXGECpY\nQ4mC3yT3ZoCGpIXbw+iP3lmEEXgaQL0Tx5LFl/okKbKYwIqNiyKWOMj7ZR/wxWg/\nZDGRs55xuoeLDJ/ZRFf9bI+IaCUd1YrfYcHIl3G87Av+r49YVwqRDT0VDV7uLgqn\n29XI1PpVUNCPQGn9p/eX6Qo7vpDaPybRtA2R7XLKjQaF9oXWeCUqy1hvJac9QFO2\n97Ob1alpHPoZ7mWiEuJwjBPii6a9M9G30nUo39lBi1w=\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----",

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23181">
         <a class="anchor2" id="origin-ca-create-certificate" data-reactid="23182">origin-ca-create-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23183">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23184"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23185">POST</span><!-- react-text: 23186 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23187 -->Create Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23188 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23189">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23190"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23191">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23192"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23193"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23194">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23195"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23196"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23197">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23198"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23199"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23200">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23201"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23202">
           <p>Create an Origin CA certificate. Use your Origin CA Key as your User Service Key when calling this endpoint (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="#requests" title="null">see above</a>).</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23203"><!-- react-text: 23204 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23205 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23206 -->certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="23207">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23208"><em data-reactid="23209">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 23210 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="23211">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="23212">
            <thead data-reactid="23213">
             <tr data-reactid="23214">
              <td data-reactid="23215"><!-- react-text: 23216 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23217">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23218"><!-- react-text: 23219 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23220">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23221">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="23222">
             <tr data-reactid="23223">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23224"><strong data-reactid="23225">hostnames</strong><br data-reactid="23226"><small data-reactid="23227"><em data-reactid="23228"><!-- react-text: 23229 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23230">
               <div data-reactid="23231">
                <p>Array of hostnames or wildcard names (e.g., *.example.com) bound to the certificate</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23232">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23233"><code data-reactid="23234">[ "example.com", "*.example.com" ]</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23235">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23236"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="23237">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23238"><strong data-reactid="23239">requested_validity</strong><br data-reactid="23240"><small data-reactid="23241"><em data-reactid="23242"><!-- react-text: 23243 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23244">
               <div data-reactid="23245">
                <p>The number of days for which the certificate should be valid</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23246">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23247"><code data-reactid="23248">5475</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23249">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23250">
                <li data-reactid="23251">default value: 5475</li>
                <li data-reactid="23252"><!-- react-text: 23253 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23254 -->7, 30, 90, 365, 730, 1095, 5475<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="23255">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23256"><strong data-reactid="23257">request_type</strong><br data-reactid="23258"><small data-reactid="23259"><em data-reactid="23260"><!-- react-text: 23261 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23262">
               <div data-reactid="23263">
                <p>Signature type desired on certificate ("origin-rsa" (rsa), "origin-ecc" (ecdsa), or "keyless-certificate" (for Keyless SSL servers)</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23264">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23265"><code data-reactid="23266">"origin-rsa"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23267">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23268">
                <li data-reactid="23269"><!-- react-text: 23270 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23271 -->origin-rsa, origin-ecc, keyless-certificate<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="23272">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23273"><strong data-reactid="23274">csr</strong><br data-reactid="23275"><small data-reactid="23276"><em data-reactid="23277"><!-- react-text: 23278 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23279">
               <div data-reactid="23280">
                <p>The Certificate Signing Request (CSR). Must be newline-encoded.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23281">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23282"><code data-reactid="23283">"-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----\nMIICxzCCAa8CAQAwSDELMAkGA1UEBhMCVVMxFjAUBgNVBAgTDVNhbiBGcmFuY2lz\nY28xCzAJBgNVBAcTAkNBMRQwEgYDVQQDEwtleGFtcGxlLm5ldDCCASIwDQYJKoZI\nhvcNAQEBBQADggEPADCCAQoCggEBALxejtu4b+jPdFeFi6OUsye8TYJQBm3WfCvL\nHu5EvijMO/4Z2TImwASbwUF7Ir8OLgH+mGlQZeqyNvGoSOMEaZVXcYfpR1hlVak8\n4GGVr+04IGfOCqaBokaBFIwzclGZbzKmLGwIQioNxGfqFm6RGYGA3be2Je2iseBc\nN8GV1wYmvYE0RR+yWweJCTJ157exyRzu7sVxaEW9F87zBQLyOnwXc64rflXslRqi\ng7F7w5IaQYOl8yvmk/jEPCAha7fkiUfEpj4N12+oPRiMvleJF98chxjD4MH39c5I\nuOslULhrWunfh7GB1jwWNA9y44H0snrf+xvoy2TcHmxvma9Eln8CAwEAAaA6MDgG\nCSqGSIb3DQEJDjErMCkwJwYDVR0RBCAwHoILZXhhbXBsZS5uZXSCD3d3dy5leGFt\ncGxlLm5ldDANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQsFAAOCAQEAcBaX6dOnI8ncARrI9ZSF2AJX+8mx\npTHY2+Y2C0VvrVDGMtbBRH8R9yMbqWtlxeeNGf//LeMkSKSFa4kbpdx226lfui8/\nauRDBTJGx2R1ccUxmLZXx4my0W5iIMxunu+kez+BDlu7bTT2io0uXMRHue4i6quH\nyc5ibxvbJMjR7dqbcanVE10/34oprzXQsJ/VmSuZNXtjbtSKDlmcpw6To/eeAJ+J\nhXykcUihvHyG4A1m2R6qpANBjnA0pHexfwM/SgfzvpbvUg0T1ubmer8BgTwCKIWs\ndcWYTthM51JIqRBfNqy4QcBnX+GY05yltEEswQI55wdiS3CjTTA67sdbcQ==\n-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----"</code></small>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23296">
         <a class="anchor2" id="origin-ca-get-certificate" data-reactid="23297">origin-ca-get-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23298">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23299"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23300">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23301 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23302 -->Get Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23303 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23304">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23305"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23306">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23307"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23308"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23309">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23310"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23311"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23312">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23313"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23314"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23315">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23316"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23317">
           <p>Get an existing Origin CA certificate by its serial number. Use your Origin CA Key as your User Service Key when calling this endpoint (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="#requests" title="null">see above</a>).</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23318"><!-- react-text: 23319 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23320 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23321 -->certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23322"><!-- react-text: 23323 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23324">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23325">
          <pre data-reactid="23326">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/certificates/328578533902268680212849205732770752308931942346" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23332">
         <a class="anchor2" id="origin-ca-revoke-certificate" data-reactid="23333">origin-ca-revoke-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23334">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23335"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23336">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 23337 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23338 -->Revoke Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23339 --> <!-- /react-text -->
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23340">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23341"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23342">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23343"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23344"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23345">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23346"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23347"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23348">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23349"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23350"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23351">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23352"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23353">
           <p>Revoke an existing Origin CA certificate by its serial number. Use your Origin CA Key as your User Service Key when calling this endpoint (<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="#requests" title="null">see above</a>).</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23354"><!-- react-text: 23355 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23356 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23357 -->certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23358"><!-- react-text: 23359 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23360">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23361">
          <pre data-reactid="23362">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/certificates/328578533902268680212849205732770752308931942346" \
     -H "X-Auth-User-Service-Key: v1.0-e24fd090c02efcfecb4de8f4ff246fd5c75b48946fdf0ce26c59f91d0d90797b-cfa33fe60e8e34073c149323454383fc9005d25c9b4c502c2f063457ef65322eade065975001a0b4b4c591c5e1bd36a6e8f7e2d4fa8a9ec01c64c041e99530c2-07b9efe0acd78c82c8d9c690aacb8656d81c369246d7f996a205fe3c18e9254a"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23363"><!-- react-text: 23364 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23365">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23366">
          <pre data-reactid="23367">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "328578533902268680212849205732770752308931942346"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="23448">
        <header data-reactid="23449">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls" data-reactid="23450"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="23451">Zone-Level Authenticated Origin Pulls</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="23452">Setup authenticated origin pulls for your zone.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23453">
         <a class="anchor" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-properties" data-reactid="23454">zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="23455">
          <h4 data-reactid="23456"><!-- react-text: 23457 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="23458">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="23459"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="23460"><span class="verb" data-reactid="23461">Show</span><!-- react-text: 23462 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23463 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23464">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-get-enablement-setting-for-zone" data-reactid="23465">zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-get-enablement-setting-for-zone</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23466">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23467"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23468">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23469 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23470 -->Get Enablement Setting for Zone<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23471 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23472"><!-- react-text: 23473 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23474 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23475 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23476">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23477"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23478">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23479"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23480"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23481">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23482"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23483"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23484">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23485"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23486"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23487">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23488"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23489">
           <p>Get whether zone-level authenticated origin pulls is enabled or not. It is false by default.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23490"><!-- react-text: 23491 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23492 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23493 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/settings<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23494"><!-- react-text: 23495 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23496">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23497">
          <pre data-reactid="23498">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/settings" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23499"><!-- react-text: 23500 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23501">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23502">
          <pre data-reactid="23503">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "enabled": true
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23504">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-set-enablement-for-zone" data-reactid="23505">zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-set-enablement-for-zone</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23506">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23507"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23508">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 23509 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23510 -->Set Enablement for Zone<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23511 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23512"><!-- react-text: 23513 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23514 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23515 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23516">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23517"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23518">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23519"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23520"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23521">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23522"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23523"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23524">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23525"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23526"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23527">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23528"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23529">
           <p>Enable or disable zone-level authenticated origin pulls. 'enabled' should be set true either before/after the certificate is uploaded to see the certificate in use.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23530"><!-- react-text: 23531 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23532 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23533 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/settings<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="23534">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23535"><em data-reactid="23536">Required</em><!-- react-text: 23537 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="23538">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="23539">
            <thead data-reactid="23540">
             <tr data-reactid="23541">
              <td data-reactid="23542"><!-- react-text: 23543 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23544">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23545"><!-- react-text: 23546 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23547">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23548">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="23549">
             <tr data-reactid="23550">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23551"><strong data-reactid="23552">enabled</strong><br data-reactid="23553"><small data-reactid="23554"><em data-reactid="23555"><!-- react-text: 23556 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23557">
               <div data-reactid="23558">
                <p>Indicates whether zone-level authenticated origin pulls is enabled</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23559">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="23560"><code data-reactid="23561">true</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="23562">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="23563">
                <li data-reactid="23564">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23565"><!-- react-text: 23566 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23567">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23568">
          <pre data-reactid="23569">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/settings" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"enabled":true}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23570"><!-- react-text: 23571 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23572">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23573">
          <pre data-reactid="23574">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "enabled": true
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23575">
         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-upload-certificate" data-reactid="23576">zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-upload-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23577">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23578"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23579">POST</span><!-- react-text: 23580 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23581 -->Upload Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23582 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23583"><!-- react-text: 23584 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23585 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23586 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23587">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23588"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23589">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23590"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23591"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23592">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23593"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23594"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23595">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23596"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23597"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23598">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23599"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23600">
           <p>Upload your own certificate you want Cloudflare to use for edge-to-origin communication to override the shared certificate. Please note that it is important to keep only one certificate active. Also, make sure to enable zone-level authenticated origin pulls by making a PUT call to settings endpoint to see the uploaded certificate in use.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23601"><!-- react-text: 23602 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23603 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23604 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="23605">

         <a class="anchor2" id="zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-list-certificates" data-reactid="23660">zone-level-authenticated-origin-pulls-list-certificates</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23661">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23662"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23663">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23664 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23665 -->List Certificates<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23666 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23667"><!-- react-text: 23668 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23669 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23670 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23671">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23672"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23673">free</h6>

          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23684"><!-- react-text: 23685 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23686 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23687 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth<!-- /react-text --></pre>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23688"><!-- react-text: 23689 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23690">(example)</small></h5>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="23776">
        <header data-reactid="23777">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull" data-reactid="23778"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="23779">Per-hostname Authenticated Origin Pull</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="23780">Setup a client certficate per hostname to be sent in a request to Origin</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23781">
         <a class="anchor" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-properties" data-reactid="23782">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="23783">
          <h4 data-reactid="23784"><!-- react-text: 23785 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="23786">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="23787"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="23788"><span class="verb" data-reactid="23789">Show</span><!-- react-text: 23790 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23791 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23792">
         <a class="anchor2" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-upload-a-hostname-client-certificate" data-reactid="23793">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-upload-a-hostname-client-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23794">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23795"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23796">POST</span><!-- react-text: 23797 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23798 -->Upload a Hostname Client Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23799 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23800"><!-- react-text: 23801 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23802 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23803 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23804">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23805"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23806">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23807"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23808"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23809">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23810"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23811"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23812">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23813"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23814"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23815">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23816"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23817">
           <p>Upload a certificate to be used for client authentication on a hostname. 10 hostname certificates per zone are allowed</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23818"><!-- react-text: 23819 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23820 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23821 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="23822">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23823"><em data-reactid="23824">Required</em><!-- react-text: 23825 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="23826">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="23827">
            <thead data-reactid="23828">
             <tr data-reactid="23829">
              <td data-reactid="23830"><!-- react-text: 23831 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23832">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23833"><!-- react-text: 23834 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23835">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="23836">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="23837">
             <tr data-reactid="23838">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="23839"><strong data-reactid="23840">certificate</strong><br data-reactid="23841"><small data-reactid="23842"><em data-reactid="23843"><!-- react-text: 23844 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="23845">
               <div data-reactid="23846">
                <p>The hostname certificate</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="23847">

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23876">
         <a class="anchor2" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-list-certificates" data-reactid="23877">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-list-certificates</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23878">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23879"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23880">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23881 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23882 -->List Certificates<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23883 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23884"><!-- react-text: 23885 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23886 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23887 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="23888">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23889"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23890">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23891"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23892"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23893">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23894"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23895"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23896">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23897"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="23898"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="23899">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="23900"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23901"><!-- react-text: 23902 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23903 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23904 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/certificates<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23905"><!-- react-text: 23906 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23907">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23908">
          <pre data-reactid="23909">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/certificates" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="23910"><!-- react-text: 23911 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="23912">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="23913">
          <pre data-reactid="23914">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "hostname": "app.example.com",
      "cert_id": "2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60",
      "enabled": true,
      "status": "active",
      "created_at": "2100-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "updated_at": "2100-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "cert_status": "active",
      "issuer": "GlobalSign",
      "signature": "SHA256WithRSA",
      "serial_number": "6743787633689793699141714808227354901",
      "certificate": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIDtTCCAp2gAwIBAgIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAMEUxCzAJBgNV\nBAYTAkFVMRMwEQYDVQQIEwpTb21lLVN0YXRlMSEwHwYDVQQKExhJbnRlcm5ldCBX\naWRnaXRzIFB0eSBMdGQwHhcNMTYwODI0MTY0MzAxWhcNMTYxMTIyMTY0MzAxWjBF\nMQswCQYDVQQGEwJBVTETMBEGA1UECBMKU29tZS1TdGF0ZTEhMB8GA1UEChMYSW50\nZXJuZXQgV2lkZ2l0cyBQdHkgTHRkMIIBIjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAQ8AMIIB\nCgKCAQEAwQHoetcl9+5ikGzV6cMzWtWPJHqXT3wpbEkRU9Yz7lgvddmGdtcGbg/1\nCGZu0jJGkMoppoUo4c3dts3iwqRYmBikUP77wwY2QGmDZw2FvkJCJlKnabIRuGvB\nKwzESIXgKk2016aTP6/dAjEHyo6SeoK8lkIySUvK0fyOVlsiEsCmOpidtnKX/a+5\n0GjB79CJH4ER2lLVZnhePFR/zUOyPxZQQ4naHf7yu/b5jhO0f8fwt+pyFxIXjbEI\ndZliWRkRMtzrHOJIhrmJ2A1J7iOrirbbwillwjjNVUWPf3IJ3M12S9pEewooaeO2\nizNTERcG9HzAacbVRn2Y2SWIyT/18QIDAQABo4GnMIGkMB0GA1UdDgQWBBT/LbE4\n9rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJIGDB1BgNVHSMEbjBsgBT/LbE49rWf288N6sJA5BRb6FJI\nGKFJpEcwRTELMAkGA1UEBhMCQVUxEzARBgNVBAgTClNvbWUtU3RhdGUxITAfBgNV\nBAoTGEludGVybmV0IFdpZGdpdHMgUHR5IEx0ZIIJAMHAwfXZ5/PWMAwGA1UdEwQF\nMAMBAf8wDQYJKoZIhvcNAQELBQADggEBAHHFwl0tH0quUYZYO0dZYt4R7SJ0pCm2\n2satiyzHl4OnXcHDpekAo7/a09c6Lz6AU83cKy/+x3/djYHXWba7HpEu0dR3ugQP\nMlr4zrhd9xKZ0KZKiYmtJH+ak4OM4L3FbT0owUZPyjLSlhMtJVcoRp5CJsjAMBUG\nSvD8RX+T01wzox/Qb+lnnNnOlaWpqu8eoOenybxKp1a9ULzIVvN/LAcc+14vioFq\n2swRWtmocBAs8QR9n4uvbpiYvS8eYueDCWMM4fvFfBhaDZ3N9IbtySh3SpFdQDhw\nYbjM2rxXiyLGxB4Bol7QTv4zHif7Zt89FReT/NBy4rzaskDJY5L6xmY=\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n",

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23915">
         <a class="anchor2" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-get-the-hostname-client-certificate" data-reactid="23916">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-get-the-hostname-client-certificate</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23917">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23918"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23919">GET</span><!-- react-text: 23920 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23921 -->Get the Hostname Client Certificate<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23922 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="23923"><!-- react-text: 23924 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23925 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23926 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>

           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="23940">
           <p>Get the certificate by ID to be used for client authentication on a hostname</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="23941"><!-- react-text: 23942 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23943 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 23944 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/certificates/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>

          <pre data-reactid="23949">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/certificates/2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="23994">
         <a class="anchor2" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-enable-or-disable-a-hostname-for-client-authentication" data-reactid="23995">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-enable-or-disable-a-hostname-for-client-authentication</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="23996">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="23997"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="23998">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 23999 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24000 -->Enable or Disable a Hostname for Client Authentication<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24001 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24002"><!-- react-text: 24003 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24004 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24005 -->#ssl:edit<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="24006">
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="24007"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="24008">free</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="24009"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="24010"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="24011">pro</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="24012"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="24013"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="24014">business</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="24015"></div></li>
            <li class="plan false" data-reactid="24016"><h6 class="uppercase inline" data-reactid="24017">enterprise</h6>
             <div class="icon icon-ok text-success small" data-reactid="24018"></div></li>
           </ul></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24019">
           <p>Associate a hostname to a certificate and enable, disable or invalidate the association. If disabled, client certificate will not be sent to the hostname even if activated at the zone level. 100 maximum associations on a single certificate are allowed</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24020"><!-- react-text: 24021 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24022 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24023 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24024">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24025"><em data-reactid="24026">Required</em><!-- react-text: 24027 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24028">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24029">
            <thead data-reactid="24030">
             <tr data-reactid="24031">
              <td data-reactid="24032"><!-- react-text: 24033 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24034">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24035"><!-- react-text: 24036 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24037">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24038">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24039">
             <tr data-reactid="24040">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24041"><strong data-reactid="24042">config</strong><br data-reactid="24043"><small data-reactid="24044"><em data-reactid="24045"><!-- react-text: 24046 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24047">
               <div data-reactid="24048">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24049"><code data-reactid="24050">[ { "hostname": "app.example.com", "cert_id": "2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60", "enabled": true } ]</code></small><span data-reactid="24051"><br data-reactid="24052"><!-- react-text: 24053 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24054">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24055"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24056">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24057 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24058">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24059"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24060"><!-- react-text: 24061 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24062">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24063">
          <pre data-reactid="24064">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"config":[{"hostname":"app.example.com","cert_id":"2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60","enabled":true}]}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24065"><!-- react-text: 24066 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24067">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24068">
          <pre data-reactid="24069">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "hostname": "app.example.com",
      "cert_id": "2458ce5a-0c35-4c7f-82c7-8e9487d3ff60",
      "enabled": true,
      "status": "active",
      "created_at": "2100-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "updated_at": "2100-01-01T05:20:00Z",
      "cert_status": "active",
      "issuer": "GlobalSign",
      "signature": "SHA256WithRSA",
      "serial_number": "6743787633689793699141714808227354901",

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24070">
         <a class="anchor2" id="per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-get-the-hostname-status-for-client-authentication" data-reactid="24071">per-hostname-authenticated-origin-pull-get-the-hostname-status-for-client-authentication</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24072">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24073"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24074">GET</span><!-- react-text: 24075 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24076 -->Get the Hostname Status for Client Authentication<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24077 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24078"><!-- react-text: 24079 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24080 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24081 -->#ssl:read<!-- /react-text --></small>
           <ul class="available-plans inline" data-reactid="24082">

           </ul></h3>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24095"><!-- react-text: 24096 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24097 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24098 -->zones/:zone_identifier/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/:hostname<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

          <pre data-reactid="24103">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/origin_tls_client_auth/hostnames/app.example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \

        <header data-reactid="24110">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="stream-videos" data-reactid="24111"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="24112">Stream Videos</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="24113">You can upload videos to Cloudflare Stream for fast video processing and delivery.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24114">
         <a class="anchor" id="stream-videos-properties" data-reactid="24115">stream-videos</a>

          <p data-reactid="24119">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
