        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24125">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-upload-a-video-from-a-url" data-reactid="24126">stream-videos-upload-a-video-from-a-url</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24127">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24128"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24129">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24130 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24131 -->Upload a video from a URL<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24132 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24133">
           <p>Link to a video and it will be downloaded and made available on Stream.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24134"><!-- react-text: 24135 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24136 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24137 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/copy<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24138">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24139"><em data-reactid="24140">Required</em><!-- react-text: 24141 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24142">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24143">
            <thead data-reactid="24144">
             <tr data-reactid="24145">
              <td data-reactid="24146"><!-- react-text: 24147 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24148">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24149"><!-- react-text: 24150 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24151">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24152">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24153">
             <tr data-reactid="24154">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24155"><strong data-reactid="24156">url</strong><br data-reactid="24157"><small data-reactid="24158"><em data-reactid="24159"><!-- react-text: 24160 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24161 --> (uri)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24162">
               <div data-reactid="24163">
                <p>URL to the video. Server must be publicly routable and support HTTP HEAD requests and HTTP GET range requests. Server should respond to HTTP HEAD requests with a content-range header with the size of the file.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24164">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24165"><code data-reactid="24166">"https://example.com/myvideo.mp4"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24167">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24168"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24169">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24170"><em data-reactid="24171">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 24172 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24173">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24174">
            <thead data-reactid="24175">
             <tr data-reactid="24176">
              <td data-reactid="24177"><!-- react-text: 24178 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24179">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24180"><!-- react-text: 24181 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24182">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24183">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24184">
             <tr data-reactid="24185">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24186"><strong data-reactid="24187">thumbnailTimestampPct</strong><br data-reactid="24188"><small data-reactid="24189"><em data-reactid="24190"><!-- react-text: 24191 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24192">
               <div data-reactid="24193">
                <p>Timestamp location of thumbnail image calculated as a percentage value of the video's duration. To convert from a second-wise timestamp to a percentage, divide the desired timestamp by the total duration of the video. If this value is not set, the default thumbnail image will be from 0s of the video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24194">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24195"><code data-reactid="24196">0.529241</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24197">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24198">
                <li data-reactid="24199">default value: 0</li>
                <li data-reactid="24200"><!-- react-text: 24201 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24202 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24203 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24204"><!-- react-text: 24205 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24206 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24207 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24208">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24209"><strong data-reactid="24210">allowedOrigins</strong><br data-reactid="24211"><small data-reactid="24212"><em data-reactid="24213"><!-- react-text: 24214 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24215">
               <div data-reactid="24216">
                <p>List which origins should be allowed to display the video. Enter allowed origin domains in an array and use <code>*</code> for wildcard subdomains. Empty array will allow the video to be viewed on any origin.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24217">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24218"><code data-reactid="24219">[ "example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="24220"><br data-reactid="24221"><!-- react-text: 24222 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24223">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24224"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24225">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24226 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24227">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24228"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24229">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24230"><strong data-reactid="24231">requireSignedURLs</strong><br data-reactid="24232"><small data-reactid="24233"><em data-reactid="24234"><!-- react-text: 24235 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24236">
               <div data-reactid="24237">
                <p>Indicates whether the video can be a accessed only using it's UID. If set to true, a signed token needs to be generated with a signing key to view the video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24238">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24239"><code data-reactid="24240">true</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24241">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24242">
                <li data-reactid="24243">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="24244">valid values: (true,false)</li>
                <li data-reactid="24245">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24246">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24247"><strong data-reactid="24248">watermark</strong><br data-reactid="24249"><small data-reactid="24250"><em data-reactid="24251"><!-- react-text: 24252 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24253">
               <div data-reactid="24254">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24255"><code data-reactid="24256">{ "uid": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a" }</code></small><span data-reactid="24257"><br data-reactid="24258"><!-- react-text: 24259 -->An object with the following properties:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24260">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24261"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24262">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24263 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24264">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24265"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24269">
          <pre data-reactid="24270">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/copy" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"url":"https://example.com/myvideo.mp4","thumbnailTimestampPct":0.529241,"allowedOrigins":["example.com"],"requireSignedURLs":true,"watermark":{"uid":"ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a"}}'</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24276">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-upload-a-video-using-a-single-http-request" data-reactid="24277">stream-videos-upload-a-video-using-a-single-http-request</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24278">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24279"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24280">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24281 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24282 -->Upload a video using a single HTTP request<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24283 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24284">
           <p>You can upload a video up to 200 Megabytes using a single HTTP POST (multipart/form-data) request. For larger file sizes, please upload using the TUS protocol.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24285"><!-- react-text: 24286 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24287 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24288 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24289">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24290"><em data-reactid="24291">Required</em><!-- react-text: 24292 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>

            <thead data-reactid="24295">
             <tr data-reactid="24296">
              <td data-reactid="24297"><!-- react-text: 24298 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24299">/type</small></td>

             <tr data-reactid="24305">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24306"><strong data-reactid="24307">file</strong><br data-reactid="24308"><small data-reactid="24309"><em data-reactid="24310"><!-- react-text: 24311 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24312">
               <div data-reactid="24313">

               </div>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24319"><!-- react-text: 24320 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24321">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24322">
          <pre data-reactid="24323">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     --form 'file=@/Users/kyle/Desktop/skiing.mp4'</pre>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24329">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-create-a-video-and-get-authenticated-direct-upload-url" data-reactid="24330">stream-videos-create-a-video-and-get-authenticated-direct-upload-url</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24331">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24332"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24333">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24334 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24335 -->Create a video and get authenticated direct upload URL<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24336 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24337">
           <p>Direct uploads allow users to upload videos without API keys. A common place to use direct uploads is on web apps, client side applications, or on mobile devices where users upload content directly to Stream.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24338"><!-- react-text: 24339 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24340 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24341 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/direct_upload<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24342">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24343"><em data-reactid="24344">Required</em><!-- react-text: 24345 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24346">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24347">
            <thead data-reactid="24348">
             <tr data-reactid="24349">
              <td data-reactid="24350"><!-- react-text: 24351 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24352">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24353"><!-- react-text: 24354 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24355">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24356">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24357">
             <tr data-reactid="24358">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24359"><strong data-reactid="24360">maxDurationSeconds</strong><br data-reactid="24361"><small data-reactid="24362"><em data-reactid="24363"><!-- react-text: 24364 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24365">
               <div data-reactid="24366">
                <p>Direct uploads occupy minutes of videos on your Stream account until they are expired. This value will be used to calculate the duration the video will occupy before the video is uploaded. After upload, the duration of the uploaded will be used instead. If a video longer than this value is uploaded, the video will result in an error.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24367">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24368"><code data-reactid="24369">300</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24370">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24371">
                <li data-reactid="24372"><!-- react-text: 24373 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24374 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24375 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24376"><!-- react-text: 24377 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24378 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24379 -->21600<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24380">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24381"><em data-reactid="24382">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 24383 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24384">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24385">
            <thead data-reactid="24386">
             <tr data-reactid="24387">
              <td data-reactid="24388"><!-- react-text: 24389 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24390">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24391"><!-- react-text: 24392 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24393">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24394">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24395">
             <tr data-reactid="24396">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24397"><strong data-reactid="24398">expiry</strong><br data-reactid="24399"><small data-reactid="24400"><em data-reactid="24401"><!-- react-text: 24402 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24403 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24404">
               <div data-reactid="24405">
                <p>The date after upload will not be accepted</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24406">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24407"><code data-reactid="24408">"2021-01-02T02:20:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24409">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24410">
                <li data-reactid="24411">default value: Now + 30 minutes</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24412">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24413"><strong data-reactid="24414">thumbnailTimestampPct</strong><br data-reactid="24415"><small data-reactid="24416"><em data-reactid="24417"><!-- react-text: 24418 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24419">
               <div data-reactid="24420">
                <p>Timestamp location of thumbnail image calculated as a percentage value of the video's duration. To convert from a second-wise timestamp to a percentage, divide the desired timestamp by the total duration of the video. If this value is not set, the default thumbnail image will be from 0s of the video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24421">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24422"><code data-reactid="24423">0.529241</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24424">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24425">
                <li data-reactid="24426">default value: 0</li>
                <li data-reactid="24427"><!-- react-text: 24428 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24429 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24430 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24431"><!-- react-text: 24432 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24433 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24434 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24435">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24436"><strong data-reactid="24437">allowedOrigins</strong><br data-reactid="24438"><small data-reactid="24439"><em data-reactid="24440"><!-- react-text: 24441 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24442">
               <div data-reactid="24443">
                <p>List which origins should be allowed to display the video. Enter allowed origin domains in an array and use <code>*</code> for wildcard subdomains. Empty array will allow the video to be viewed on any origin.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24444">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24445"><code data-reactid="24446">[ "example.com" ]</code></small><span data-reactid="24447"><br data-reactid="24448"><!-- react-text: 24449 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24450">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24451"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24452">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24453 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24454">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24455"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24456">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24457"><strong data-reactid="24458">requireSignedURLs</strong><br data-reactid="24459"><small data-reactid="24460"><em data-reactid="24461"><!-- react-text: 24462 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24463">
               <div data-reactid="24464">
                <p>Indicates whether the video can be a accessed only using it's UID. If set to true, a signed token needs to be generated with a signing key to view the video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24465">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24466"><code data-reactid="24467">true</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24468">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24469">
                <li data-reactid="24470">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="24471">valid values: (true,false)</li>
                <li data-reactid="24472">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24473">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24474"><strong data-reactid="24475">watermark</strong><br data-reactid="24476"><small data-reactid="24477"><em data-reactid="24478"><!-- react-text: 24479 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24480">
               <div data-reactid="24481">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24482"><code data-reactid="24483">{ "uid": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a" }</code></small><span data-reactid="24484"><br data-reactid="24485"><!-- react-text: 24486 -->An object with the following properties:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24487">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24488"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24489">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24490 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24491">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24492"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24493"><!-- react-text: 24494 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24495">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24496">
          <pre data-reactid="24497">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/direct_upload" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"maxDurationSeconds":300,"expiry":"2021-01-02T02:20:00Z","thumbnailTimestampPct":0.529241,"allowedOrigins":["example.com"],"requireSignedURLs":true,"watermark":{"uid":"ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a"}}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24498"><!-- react-text: 24499 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24500">(example)</small></h5>

          <pre data-reactid="24502">{

    "watermark": {
      "uid": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a",
      "size": 29472,
      "height": 600,
      "width": 400,

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24503">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-list-videos" data-reactid="24504">stream-videos-list-videos</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24505">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24506"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24507">GET</span><!-- react-text: 24508 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24509 -->List videos<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24510 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24511">
           <p>Up to 1000 videos can be listed with one request, use optional parameters below to get a specific range of videos.</p> 
           <p>Please note that Cloudflare Stream does not use pagination, instead it uses a cursor pattern to list more than 1000 videos. In order to list all videos, make multiple requests to the API using the created date-time of the last item in the previous request as the <code>before</code> or <code>after</code> parameter.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24512"><!-- react-text: 24513 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24514 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24515 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24516">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24517"><em data-reactid="24518">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 24519 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24520">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24521">
            <thead data-reactid="24522">
             <tr data-reactid="24523">
              <td data-reactid="24524"><!-- react-text: 24525 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24526">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24527"><!-- react-text: 24528 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24529">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24530">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24531">
             <tr data-reactid="24532">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24533"><strong data-reactid="24534">after</strong><br data-reactid="24535"><small data-reactid="24536"><em data-reactid="24537"><!-- react-text: 24538 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24539 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24540">
               <div data-reactid="24541">
                <p>Show videos created after this date-time</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24542">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24543"><code data-reactid="24544">"2014-01-02T02:20:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24545">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24546"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24547">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24548"><strong data-reactid="24549">before</strong><br data-reactid="24550"><small data-reactid="24551"><em data-reactid="24552"><!-- react-text: 24553 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24554 --> (date-time)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24555">
               <div data-reactid="24556">
                <p>Show videos created before this time</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24557">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24558"><code data-reactid="24559">"2014-01-02T02:20:00Z"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24560">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24561"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24562">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24563"><strong data-reactid="24564">include_counts</strong><br data-reactid="24565"><small data-reactid="24566"><em data-reactid="24567"><!-- react-text: 24568 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24569">
               <div data-reactid="24570">
                <p>Include stats in the response about the number of videos in response range and total number of videos available</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24571">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24572"><code data-reactid="24573">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24574">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24575">
                <li data-reactid="24576">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="24577">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24578">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24579"><strong data-reactid="24580">search</strong><br data-reactid="24581"><small data-reactid="24582"><em data-reactid="24583"><!-- react-text: 24584 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24585">
               <div data-reactid="24586">
                <p>A string provided in this field will be used to search over the 'name' key in meta field, which can be set with the upload request of after.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24587">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24588"><code data-reactid="24589">"puppy.mp4"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24590">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24591"></ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24592">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24593"><strong data-reactid="24594">limit</strong><br data-reactid="24595"><small data-reactid="24596"><em data-reactid="24597"><!-- react-text: 24598 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24599">
               <div data-reactid="24600">
                <p>Number of videos to include in the response</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24601"></div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24602">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24603">
                <li data-reactid="24604"><!-- react-text: 24605 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24606 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24607 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24608"><!-- react-text: 24609 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24610 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24611 -->1000<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24612">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24613"><strong data-reactid="24614">asc</strong><br data-reactid="24615"><small data-reactid="24616"><em data-reactid="24617"><!-- react-text: 24618 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24619">
               <div data-reactid="24620">
                <p>List videos in ascending order of creation</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24621">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24622"><code data-reactid="24623">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24624">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24625">
                <li data-reactid="24626">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="24627">valid values: (true,false)</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24628">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24629"><strong data-reactid="24630">status</strong><br data-reactid="24631"><small data-reactid="24632"><em data-reactid="24633"><!-- react-text: 24634 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24635">
               <div data-reactid="24636">
                <p>Filter by statuses</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24637">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24638"><code data-reactid="24639">"downloading,queued,inprogress,ready,error"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24640">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24641">
                <li data-reactid="24642">default value: downloading,queued,inprogress,ready,error</li>
                <li data-reactid="24643"><!-- react-text: 24644 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24645 -->pendingupload, downloading, queued, inprogress, ready, error<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24646"><!-- react-text: 24647 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24648">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24649">
          <pre data-reactid="24650">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream?after=2014-01-02T02:20:00Z&amp;before=2014-01-02T02:20:00Z&amp;include_counts=false&amp;search=puppy.mp4&amp;limit=undefined&amp;asc=false&amp;status=downloading,queued,inprogress,ready,error" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24651"><!-- react-text: 24652 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24653">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24656">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-initiate-a-video-upload-using-tus" data-reactid="24657">stream-videos-initiate-a-video-upload-using-tus</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24658">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24659"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24660">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24661 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24662 -->Initiate a Video Upload using TUS<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24663 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24664">
           <p>Initiate a video upload using the TUS protocol. On success, server will response with status code 201 (Created) and include a 'location' header indicating where the video content should be uploaded to. See <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://tus.io" title="null">https://tus.io</a> for protocol details.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24665"><!-- react-text: 24666 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24667 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24668 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24669"><!-- react-text: 24670 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24671">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24672">
          <pre data-reactid="24673">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Tus-Resumable: 1.0.0" \
     -H "Upload-Length: 900000000"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24674"><!-- react-text: 24675 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24676">(example)</small></h5>

        </section>

         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-embed-code-html" data-reactid="24703">stream-videos-embed-code-html</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24704">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24705"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24706">GET</span><!-- react-text: 24707 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24708 -->Embed Code HTML<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24709 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24710">
           <p>Fetch an HTML code snippet that can be used to embed the video in a web page that is delivered through Cloudflare. On success returns an HTML fragment (not a full document) that can be included on a web page to display the video. On failure returns a JSON response body (see Error Response) above.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24711"><!-- react-text: 24712 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24713 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24714 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:identifier/embed<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24748">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-associate-video-to-an-nft" data-reactid="24749">stream-videos-associate-video-to-an-nft</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24750">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24751"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24752">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24753 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24754 -->Associate video to an NFT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24755 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24756">
           <p>By associating a token ID and contract address on Stream videos, you make it possible to transfer admin rights on a video. If a change in ownership of the ERC-721 token happens on the Ethereum blockchain, the new owner of the token may claim control over of the video.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24757"><!-- react-text: 24758 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24759 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24760 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24761">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24762"><em data-reactid="24763">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 24764 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24765">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24766">
            <thead data-reactid="24767">
             <tr data-reactid="24768">
              <td data-reactid="24769"><!-- react-text: 24770 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24771">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24772"><!-- react-text: 24773 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24774">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24775">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24776">
             <tr data-reactid="24777">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24778"><strong data-reactid="24779">contract</strong><br data-reactid="24780"><small data-reactid="24781"><em data-reactid="24782"><!-- react-text: 24783 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24784">
               <div data-reactid="24785">
                <p>ERC-721 compatible contract address</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24786">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24787"><code data-reactid="24788">"0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0d912b9b2acc9af147ea85"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24789">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24790">
                <li data-reactid="24791"><!-- react-text: 24792 -->min length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24793 -->42<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24794"><!-- react-text: 24795 -->max length: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24796 -->42<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="24797">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24798">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24799"><strong data-reactid="24800">token</strong><br data-reactid="24801"><small data-reactid="24802"><em data-reactid="24803"><!-- react-text: 24804 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24805">
               <div data-reactid="24806">
                <p>Token ID for the NFT</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24807">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24808"><code data-reactid="24809">5</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24810">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24811">
                <li data-reactid="24812">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>

         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24813"><!-- react-text: 24814 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24815">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24816">
          <pre data-reactid="24817">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"contract":"0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0d912b9b2acc9af147ea85","token":5}'</pre>
         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="24823">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-videos-create-a-signed-url-token-for-a-video" data-reactid="24824">stream-videos-create-a-signed-url-token-for-a-video</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="24825">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="24826"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="24827">POST</span><!-- react-text: 24828 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24829 -->Create a signed URL token for a video<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24830 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="24831">
           <p>Create a signed URL token for a video. If no body is provided in the request, a token will be created with default values.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="24832"><!-- react-text: 24833 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24834 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 24835 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:identifier/token<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="24836">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24837"><em data-reactid="24838">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 24839 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="24840">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="24841">
            <thead data-reactid="24842">
             <tr data-reactid="24843">
              <td data-reactid="24844"><!-- react-text: 24845 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24846">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24847"><!-- react-text: 24848 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="24849">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="24850">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="24851">
             <tr data-reactid="24852">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24853"><strong data-reactid="24854">id</strong><br data-reactid="24855"><small data-reactid="24856"><em data-reactid="24857"><!-- react-text: 24858 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24859">
               <div data-reactid="24860">
                <p>Optional id of a Stream signing key. If present, the 'pem' field is also required.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24861">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24862"><code data-reactid="24863">"ab0d4ef71g4425f8dcba9041231813000"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24864">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24865">
                <li data-reactid="24866">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24867">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24868"><strong data-reactid="24869">pem</strong><br data-reactid="24870"><small data-reactid="24871"><em data-reactid="24872"><!-- react-text: 24873 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24874">
               <div data-reactid="24875">
                <p>Optional base64 encoded private key in PEM format associated with a Stream signing key. If present, the 'id' field is also required.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24876">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24877"><code data-reactid="24878">""</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24879">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24880">
                <li data-reactid="24881">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24882">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24883"><strong data-reactid="24884">exp</strong><br data-reactid="24885"><small data-reactid="24886"><em data-reactid="24887"><!-- react-text: 24888 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24889">
               <div data-reactid="24890">
                <p>Optional unix epoch timestamp after which the token will not be accepted, up to a maximum of 24 hours from issuing time. If not set, defaults to one hour after issuing.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24891">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24892"><code data-reactid="24893">1621555515</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24894">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24895">
                <li data-reactid="24896">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24897">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24898"><strong data-reactid="24899">nbf</strong><br data-reactid="24900"><small data-reactid="24901"><em data-reactid="24902"><!-- react-text: 24903 -->integer<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24904">
               <div data-reactid="24905">
                <p>Optional unix epoch timestamp before which the token will not be accepted. If not set, defaults to one hour before issuing.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24906">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24907"><code data-reactid="24908">1621548315</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24909">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24910">
                <li data-reactid="24911">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24912">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24913"><strong data-reactid="24914">downloadable</strong><br data-reactid="24915"><small data-reactid="24916"><em data-reactid="24917"><!-- react-text: 24918 -->boolean<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24919">
               <div data-reactid="24920">
                <p>Optional boolean value which enables the signed token to be used to access mp4 download links for the video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24921">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24922"><code data-reactid="24923">false</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24924">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24925">
                <li data-reactid="24926">default value: false</li>
                <li data-reactid="24927">valid values: (true,false)</li>
                <li data-reactid="24928">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="24929">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="24930"><strong data-reactid="24931">accessRules</strong><br data-reactid="24932"><small data-reactid="24933"><em data-reactid="24934"><!-- react-text: 24935 -->array<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="24936">
               <div data-reactid="24937">
                <p>Optional list of access rule constraints on the token. Access can be blocked or allowed based on an IP, IP range, or by country. Access Rules are evaluated first-to-last. If a Rule matches, the associated action is applied and no further rules are evaluated.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24938">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="24939"><code data-reactid="24940">[ { "type": "ip.geoip.country", "country": [ "US", "MX" ], "action": "block" }, { "type": "ip.src", "ip": [ "93.184.216.0/24", "2400:cb00::/32" ], "action": "allow" }, { "type": "any", "action": "block" } ]</code></small><span data-reactid="24941"><br data-reactid="24942"><!-- react-text: 24943 -->An array with items in the following form:<!-- /react-text --></span>
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="24944">
                <a class="sub-object-definition-toggle" style="cursor:pointer;" data-reactid="24945"><span class="verb" data-reactid="24946">Show</span><!-- react-text: 24947 --> definition <!-- /react-text --></a>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="24948">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="24949">
                <li data-reactid="24950">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24951"><!-- react-text: 24952 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24953">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24954">
          <pre data-reactid="24955">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a/token" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"ab0d4ef71g4425f8dcba9041231813000","pem":"","exp":1621555515,"nbf":1621548315,"downloadable":false,"accessRules":[{"type":"ip.geoip.country","country":["US","MX"],"action":"block"},{"type":"ip.src","ip":["93.184.216.0/24","2400:cb00::/32"],"action":"allow"},{"type":"any","action":"block"}]}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="24956"><!-- react-text: 24957 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="24958">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="24959">
          <pre data-reactid="24960">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImU5ZGI5OTBhODI2NjZkZDU3MWM3N2Y5NDRhNWM1YzhkIn0.eyJzdWIiOiJlYTk1MTMyYzE1NzMyNDEyZDIyYzE0NzZmYTgzZjI3YSIsImtpZCI6ImU5ZGI5OTBhODI2NjZkZDU3MWM3N2Y5NDRhNWM1YzhkIiwiZXhwIjoiMTUzNzQ2MDM2NSIsIm5iZiI6IjE1Mzc0NTMxNjUifQ.OZhqOARADn1iubK6GKcn25hN3nU-hCFF5q9w2C4yup0C4diG7aMIowiRpP-eDod8dbAJubsiFuTKrqPcmyCKWYsiv0TQueukqbQlF7HCO1TV-oF6El5-7ldJ46eD-ZQ0XgcIYEKrQOYFF8iDQbqPm3REWd6BnjKZdeVrLzuRaiSnZ9qqFpGu5dfxIY9-nZKDubJHqCr3Imtb211VIG_b9MdtO92JjvkDS-rxT_pkEfTZSafl1OU-98A7KBGtPSJHz2dHORIrUiTA6on4eIXTj9aFhGiir4rSn-rn0OjPRTtJMWIDMoQyE_fwrSYzB7MPuzL2t82BWaEbHZTfixBm5A"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="25032">
        <header data-reactid="25033">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="stream-signing-keys" data-reactid="25034"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="25035">Stream Signing Keys</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="25036">Stream signing keys are required to use signed URLs with Stream videos.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25037">
         <a class="anchor" id="stream-signing-keys-properties" data-reactid="25038">stream-signing-keys</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="25039">
          <h4 data-reactid="25040"><!-- react-text: 25041 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="25042">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="25043"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="25044"><span class="verb" data-reactid="25045">Show</span><!-- react-text: 25046 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25047 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25048">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-signing-keys-create-a-signing-key" data-reactid="25049">stream-signing-keys-create-a-signing-key</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25050">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25051"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25052">POST</span><!-- react-text: 25053 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25054 -->Create a Signing Key<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25055 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25056">
           <p>Upon creation you will get a RSA private key in PEM and JWK formats. Keys are created, used and deleted independently of videos. Every key can sign any of your videos. Key files are displayed only once upon creation.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25057"><!-- react-text: 25058 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25059 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25060 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/keys<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25061"><!-- react-text: 25062 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25063">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25064">
          <pre data-reactid="25065">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/keys" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25066"><!-- react-text: 25067 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25068">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25069">
          <pre data-reactid="25070">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "5213cfa121f70b8c1380686ffc371ba3",
    "pem": "",
    "jwk": "",
    "created": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25071">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-signing-keys-list-signing-keys" data-reactid="25072">stream-signing-keys-list-signing-keys</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25073">

          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25080"><!-- react-text: 25081 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25082 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25083 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/keys<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

          <pre data-reactid="25088">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/keys" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25094">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-signing-keys-delete-key" data-reactid="25095">stream-signing-keys-delete-key</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25096">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25097"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25098">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 25099 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25100 -->Delete key<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25101 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25102">
           <p>Deleting a key revokes all signed URLs generated with the key.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25103"><!-- react-text: 25104 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25105 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25106 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/keys/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25107"><!-- react-text: 25108 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25109">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25110">
          <pre data-reactid="25111">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/keys/5213cfa121f70b8c1380686ffc371ba3" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25112"><!-- react-text: 25113 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25114">(example)</small></h5>

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": ""
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="25117">
        <header data-reactid="25118">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="stream-mp4-downloads" data-reactid="25119"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="25120">Stream MP4 Downloads</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="25121">Create .mp4 files for offline viewing and downloading.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25122">
         <a class="anchor" id="stream-mp4-downloads-properties" data-reactid="25123">stream-mp4-downloads</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="25124">
          <h4 data-reactid="25125"><!-- react-text: 25126 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="25127">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="25128"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="25129"><span class="verb" data-reactid="25130">Show</span><!-- react-text: 25131 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25132 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25133">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-mp4-downloads-create-downloads" data-reactid="25134">stream-mp4-downloads-create-downloads</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25135">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25136"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25137">POST</span><!-- react-text: 25138 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25139 -->Create downloads<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25140 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25141">
           <p>Create downloads for a video, this can only be done if the video is ready to view.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25142"><!-- react-text: 25143 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25144 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25145 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:video_identifier/downloads<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25146"><!-- react-text: 25147 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25148">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25149">
          <pre data-reactid="25150">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a/downloads" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25151"><!-- react-text: 25152 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25153">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25154">
          <pre data-reactid="25155">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "default": {
      "url": "https://videodelivery.net/7227269b8c5324f9b9a68502e80df65a/downloads/default.mp4",
      "status": "ready",
      "percentComplete": "100.0"
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25156">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-mp4-downloads-list-downloads" data-reactid="25157">stream-mp4-downloads-list-downloads</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25158">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25159"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25160">GET</span><!-- react-text: 25161 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25162 -->List downloads<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25163 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25164">
           <p>View the downloads created for this video</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25165"><!-- react-text: 25166 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25167 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25168 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:video_identifier/downloads<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25169"><!-- react-text: 25170 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25171">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25172">
          <pre data-reactid="25173">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a/downloads" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25174"><!-- react-text: 25175 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25176">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25177">
          <pre data-reactid="25178">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "default": {
      "url": "https://videodelivery.net/7227269b8c5324f9b9a68502e80df65a/downloads/default.mp4",
      "status": "ready",
      "percentComplete": "100.0"
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
       </article>

         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25197">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25198"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25199">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 25200 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25201 -->Upload a caption/subtitle<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25202 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25203">
           <p>Upload the file to the endpoint for a specific BCP47 language. One caption/subtitle per language is allowed.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25204"><!-- react-text: 25205 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25206 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25207 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/:video_identifier/captions/:language<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="25208">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25209"><em data-reactid="25210">Required</em><!-- react-text: 25211 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="25212">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="25213">
            <thead data-reactid="25214">
             <tr data-reactid="25215">
              <td data-reactid="25216"><!-- react-text: 25217 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25218">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25219"><!-- react-text: 25220 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25221">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25222">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="25223">
             <tr data-reactid="25224">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25225"><strong data-reactid="25226">file</strong><br data-reactid="25227"><small data-reactid="25228"><em data-reactid="25229"><!-- react-text: 25230 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25231">
               <div data-reactid="25232">
                <p>WebVTT file to upload</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25233">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25234"><code data-reactid="25235">"@/Users/kyle/Desktop/tr.vtt"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25236">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25237"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25241">
          <pre data-reactid="25242">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a/captions/tr" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     --form 'file=@/Users/kyle/Desktop/tr.vtt'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25243"><!-- react-text: 25244 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25245">(example)</small></h5>

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],

    "label": "Trke",
    "language": "tr"
  }

          <p data-reactid="25304">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="25305"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="25306"><span class="verb" data-reactid="25307">Show</span><!-- react-text: 25308 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25309 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>

        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25310">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-webhook-create-a-webhook" data-reactid="25311">stream-webhook-create-a-webhook</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25312">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25313"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25314">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 25315 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25316 -->Create a webhook<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25317 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3><!-- react-text: 25318 --><!-- /react-text -->
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25319"><!-- react-text: 25320 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25321 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25322 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/webhook<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="25323">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25324"><em data-reactid="25325">Required</em><!-- react-text: 25326 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="25327">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="25328">
            <thead data-reactid="25329">
             <tr data-reactid="25330">
              <td data-reactid="25331"><!-- react-text: 25332 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25333">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25334"><!-- react-text: 25335 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25336">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25337">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="25338">
             <tr data-reactid="25339">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25340"><strong data-reactid="25341">notificationUrl</strong><br data-reactid="25342"><small data-reactid="25343"><em data-reactid="25344"><!-- react-text: 25345 -->string<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25346 --> (url)<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25347">
               <div data-reactid="25348">
                <p>The URL the webhooks will be sent to</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25349">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25350"><code data-reactid="25351">"https://example.com"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25352">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25353"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25354"><!-- react-text: 25355 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25356">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25357">
          <pre data-reactid="25358">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/webhook" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"notificationUrl":"https://example.com"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25359"><!-- react-text: 25360 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25361">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25362">
          <pre data-reactid="25363">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "notificationUrl": "https://example.com",
    "modified": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z",
    "secret": "0b1c2423aa030a11583c6ffadda57fad681d00cd"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25364">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-webhook-view-the-webhook" data-reactid="25365">stream-webhook-view-the-webhook</a>
