       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="25427">
        <header data-reactid="25428">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="stream-watermark-profile" data-reactid="25429"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="25430">Stream Watermark Profile</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="25431">You can create watermark profile for different videos.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25432">
         <a class="anchor" id="stream-watermark-profile-properties" data-reactid="25433">stream-watermark-profile</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="25434">
          <h4 data-reactid="25435"><!-- react-text: 25436 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="25437">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="25438"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="25439"><span class="verb" data-reactid="25440">Show</span><!-- react-text: 25441 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25442 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25443">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-watermark-profile-create-a-watermark-profile-from-an-url" data-reactid="25444">stream-watermark-profile-create-a-watermark-profile-from-an-url</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25445">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25446"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25447">POST</span><!-- react-text: 25448 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25449 -->Create a Watermark Profile from an URL<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25450 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25451">
           <p>You can create a watermark profile by specifying the URL to the image.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25452"><!-- react-text: 25453 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25454 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25455 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/watermarks<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="25456">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25457"><em data-reactid="25458">Required</em><!-- react-text: 25459 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="25460">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="25461">
            <thead data-reactid="25462">
             <tr data-reactid="25463">
              <td data-reactid="25464"><!-- react-text: 25465 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25466">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25467"><!-- react-text: 25468 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25469">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25470">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="25471">
             <tr data-reactid="25472">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25473"><strong data-reactid="25474">url</strong><br data-reactid="25475"><small data-reactid="25476"><em data-reactid="25477"><!-- react-text: 25478 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25479">
               <div data-reactid="25480">
                <p>The source URL to the image where it was downloaded from. If the watermark profile was created via direct upload, this field will be null.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25481">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25482"><code data-reactid="25483">"https://company.com/logo.png"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25484">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25485">
                <li data-reactid="25486">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="25487">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25488"><em data-reactid="25489">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 25490 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="25491">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="25492">
            <thead data-reactid="25493">
             <tr data-reactid="25494">
              <td data-reactid="25495"><!-- react-text: 25496 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25497">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25498"><!-- react-text: 25499 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25500">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25501">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="25502">
             <tr data-reactid="25503">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25504"><strong data-reactid="25505">name</strong><br data-reactid="25506"><small data-reactid="25507"><em data-reactid="25508"><!-- react-text: 25509 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25510">
               <div data-reactid="25511">
                <p>A short description for the profile.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25512">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25513"><code data-reactid="25514">"Marketing Videos"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25515">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25516">
                <li data-reactid="25517">default value: </li>
                <li data-reactid="25518">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="25519">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25520"><strong data-reactid="25521">opacity</strong><br data-reactid="25522"><small data-reactid="25523"><em data-reactid="25524"><!-- react-text: 25525 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25526">
               <div data-reactid="25527">
                <p>Translucency of the image. 0.0 means completely transparent, and 1.0 means completely opaque. Note that if the image is already semi-transparent, setting this to 1.0 will not make it completely opaque.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25528">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25529"><code data-reactid="25530">0.75</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25531">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25532">
                <li data-reactid="25533">default value: 1</li>
                <li data-reactid="25534"><!-- react-text: 25535 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25536 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25537 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25538"><!-- react-text: 25539 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25540 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25541 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25542">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="25543">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25544"><strong data-reactid="25545">padding</strong><br data-reactid="25546"><small data-reactid="25547"><em data-reactid="25548"><!-- react-text: 25549 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25550">
               <div data-reactid="25551">
                <p>Whitespace between the adjacent edges (determined by position) of the video and the image. 0.0 means no padding, and 1.0 means padded full video width or length, determined by the algorithm.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25552">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25553"><code data-reactid="25554">0.1</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25555">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25556">
                <li data-reactid="25557">default value: 0.05</li>
                <li data-reactid="25558"><!-- react-text: 25559 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25560 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25561 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25562"><!-- react-text: 25563 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25564 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25565 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25566">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="25567">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25568"><strong data-reactid="25569">scale</strong><br data-reactid="25570"><small data-reactid="25571"><em data-reactid="25572"><!-- react-text: 25573 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25574">
               <div data-reactid="25575">
                <p>The size of the image relative to the overall size of the video. This parameter will adapt to horizontal and vertical videos automatically. 0.0 means no scaling (use the size of the image as-is), and 1.0 fills the entire video.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25576">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25577"><code data-reactid="25578">0.1</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25579">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25580">
                <li data-reactid="25581">default value: 0.15</li>
                <li data-reactid="25582"><!-- react-text: 25583 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25584 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25585 -->0<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25586"><!-- react-text: 25587 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25588 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25589 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="25590">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="25591">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25592"><strong data-reactid="25593">position</strong><br data-reactid="25594"><small data-reactid="25595"><em data-reactid="25596"><!-- react-text: 25597 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25598">
               <div data-reactid="25599">
                <p>Location of the image. Valid positions are: "upperRight", "upperLeft", "lowerLeft", "lowerRight", and "center". Note that "center" will ignore the "padding" parameter. </p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25600">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25601"><code data-reactid="25602">"center"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25603">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25604">
                <li data-reactid="25605">default value: upperRight</li>
                <li data-reactid="25606">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25607"><!-- react-text: 25608 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25609">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25610">
          <pre data-reactid="25611">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/watermarks" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"url":"https://company.com/logo.png","name":"Marketing Videos","opacity":0.75,"padding":0.1,"scale":0.1,"position":"center"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25612"><!-- react-text: 25613 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25614">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25615">
          <pre data-reactid="25616">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "uid": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a",
    "size": 29472,
    "height": 600,
    "width": 400,
    "created": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z",
    "downloadedFrom": "https://company.com/logo.png",
    "name": "Marketing Videos",
    "opacity": 0.75,
    "padding": 0.1,
    "scale": 0.1,
    "position": "center"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>

     --form 'file=@/Users/rchen/Downloads/watermark.png' \
     --form 'name=Marketing Videos' \
     --form 'opacity=0.75' \
     --form 'padding=0.1' \
     --form 'scale=0.1' \
     --form 'position=center'</pre>
         </div>

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25793"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25794">GET</span><!-- react-text: 25795 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25796 -->List Watermark Profiles<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25797 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>

         </div>

          <pre data-reactid="25807">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/watermarks" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25813">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-watermark-profile-watermark-profile-details" data-reactid="25814">stream-watermark-profile-watermark-profile-details</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25815">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25816"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25817">GET</span><!-- react-text: 25818 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25819 -->Watermark Profile Details<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25820 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25821">
           <p>Fetch details of a single watermark profile.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25822"><!-- react-text: 25823 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25824 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25825 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/watermarks/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25826"><!-- react-text: 25827 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25828">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25829">
          <pre data-reactid="25830">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/watermarks/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25831"><!-- react-text: 25832 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25833">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25834">
          <pre data-reactid="25835">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "uid": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a",
    "size": 29472,
    "height": 600,
    "width": 400,
    "created": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z",
    "downloadedFrom": "https://company.com/logo.png",
    "name": "Marketing Videos",
    "opacity": 0.75,
    "padding": 0.1,
    "scale": 0.1,
    "position": "center"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25836">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-watermark-profile-delete-watermark-profile" data-reactid="25837">stream-watermark-profile-delete-watermark-profile</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25838">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25839"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25840">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 25841 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25842 -->Delete Watermark Profile<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25843 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25844">
           <p>Mark a watermark profile as deleted</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25845"><!-- react-text: 25846 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25847 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25848 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/watermarks/:identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25849"><!-- react-text: 25850 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25851">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25852">
          <pre data-reactid="25853">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/stream/watermarks/ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>

  "messages": [],
  "result": ""

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="25885">
        <header data-reactid="25886">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="stream-connect" data-reactid="25887"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="25888">Stream Connect</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="25889">Push RTMPS feeds to the Cloudflare edge and have them restreamed to your audience on any platform that supports RTMP</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25890">
         <a class="anchor" id="stream-connect-properties" data-reactid="25891">stream-connect</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="25892">
          <h4 data-reactid="25893"><!-- react-text: 25894 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="25895">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="25896"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="25897"><span class="verb" data-reactid="25898">Show</span><!-- react-text: 25899 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25900 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25901">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-create-a-live-input" data-reactid="25902">stream-connect-create-a-live-input</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25903">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25904"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25905">POST</span><!-- react-text: 25906 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25907 -->Create a live input<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25908 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25909">
           <p>Create a live input that can be streamed to. Add an output in order to direct traffic.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25910"><!-- react-text: 25911 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25912 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25913 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="25914">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25915"><em data-reactid="25916">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 25917 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="25918">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="25919">
            <thead data-reactid="25920">
             <tr data-reactid="25921">
              <td data-reactid="25922"><!-- react-text: 25923 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25924">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25925"><!-- react-text: 25926 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="25927">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="25928">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="25929">
             <tr data-reactid="25930">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="25931"><strong data-reactid="25932">meta</strong><br data-reactid="25933"><small data-reactid="25934"><em data-reactid="25935"><!-- react-text: 25936 -->object<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="25937">
               <div data-reactid="25938">
                <p>User modifyable key-value store. Can use used for keeping references to another system of record for managing live inputs.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="25939">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="25940"><code data-reactid="25941">{ "name": "test stream 1" }</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="25942">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="25943"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25944"><!-- react-text: 25945 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25946">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25947">
          <pre data-reactid="25948">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"meta":{"name":"test stream 1"}}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25949"><!-- react-text: 25950 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25951">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="25952">
          <pre data-reactid="25953">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "uid": "66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd",
    "meta": {
      "name": "test stream 1"
    },
    "created": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z",
    "modified": "2014-01-02T02:20:00Z",
    "rtmps": {
      "url": "rtmps://live.cloudflare.com:443/live/",
      "streamKey": "MjE2OTAxNzQyMjQxNDkyNDYyNTAxNjc3MzE3NzY4MjAwMTYxODMxMjMxOTc66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd"
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="25954">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-list-live-inputs" data-reactid="25955">stream-connect-list-live-inputs</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="25956">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="25957"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="25958">GET</span><!-- react-text: 25959 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25960 -->List live inputs<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25961 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="25962">
           <p>View the live inputs that have been created on this account. Some information is not included on list requests, such as the URL to stream to. To get that information, request a single live input.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="25963"><!-- react-text: 25964 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25965 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 25966 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

          <pre data-reactid="25971">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="25972"><!-- react-text: 25973 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="25974">(example)</small></h5>

        "name": "test stream 1"

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26000">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-delete-live-input" data-reactid="26001">stream-connect-delete-live-input</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26002">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26003"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26004">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 26005 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26006 -->Delete live input<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26007 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26008">
           <p>Prevent a live input from being streamed to. This makes the live input inaccessible to any future API calls or RTMPS transmission</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26009"><!-- react-text: 26010 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26011 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26012 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs/:live_input_identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26013"><!-- react-text: 26014 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26015">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26016">
          <pre data-reactid="26017">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs/66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26018"><!-- react-text: 26019 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26020">(example)</small></h5>

        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26023">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-add-an-output-to-a-live-input" data-reactid="26024">stream-connect-add-an-output-to-a-live-input</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26025">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26026"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26027">POST</span><!-- react-text: 26028 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26029 -->Add an output to a live input<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26030 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26031">
           <p>Create a new output which will be restreamed to by a live input</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26032"><!-- react-text: 26033 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26034 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26035 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs/:live_input_identifier/outputs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="26036">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26037"><em data-reactid="26038">Required</em><!-- react-text: 26039 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="26040">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="26041">
            <thead data-reactid="26042">
             <tr data-reactid="26043">
              <td data-reactid="26044"><!-- react-text: 26045 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26046">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26047"><!-- react-text: 26048 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26049">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26050">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="26051">
             <tr data-reactid="26052">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="26053"><strong data-reactid="26054">url</strong><br data-reactid="26055"><small data-reactid="26056"><em data-reactid="26057"><!-- react-text: 26058 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="26059">
               <div data-reactid="26060">
                <p>The URL a output will restream to</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="26061">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="26062"><code data-reactid="26063">"rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="26064">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="26065">
                <li data-reactid="26066">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="26067">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="26068"><strong data-reactid="26069">streamKey</strong><br data-reactid="26070"><small data-reactid="26071"><em data-reactid="26072"><!-- react-text: 26073 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="26074">
               <div data-reactid="26075">
                <p>The streamKey used to authenticate against a output's target</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="26076">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="26077"><code data-reactid="26078">"uzya-f19y-g2g9-a2ee-51j2"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="26079">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="26080">
                <li data-reactid="26081">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26082"><!-- react-text: 26083 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26084">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26085">
          <pre data-reactid="26086">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs/66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd/outputs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"url":"rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2","streamKey":"uzya-f19y-g2g9-a2ee-51j2"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26087"><!-- react-text: 26088 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26089">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26090">
          <pre data-reactid="26091">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "uid": "baea4d9c515887b80289d5c33cf01145",
    "url": "rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2",
    "streamKey": "uzya-f19y-g2g9-a2ee-51j2"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26092">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-list-outputs-associated-with-a-live-input" data-reactid="26093">stream-connect-list-outputs-associated-with-a-live-input</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26094">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26095"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26096">GET</span><!-- react-text: 26097 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26098 -->List outputs associated with a live input<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26099 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26100">
           <p>Create a new output to restream to when a live input receives data</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26101"><!-- react-text: 26102 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26103 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26104 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs/:live_input_identifier/outputs<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26105"><!-- react-text: 26106 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26107">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26108">
          <pre data-reactid="26109">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs/66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd/outputs" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26110"><!-- react-text: 26111 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26112">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26113">
          <pre data-reactid="26114">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "uid": "baea4d9c515887b80289d5c33cf01145",
      "url": "rtmp://a.rtmp.youtube.com/live2",
      "streamKey": "uzya-f19y-g2g9-a2ee-51j2"
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26115">
         <a class="anchor2" id="stream-connect-remove-an-output-from-a-live-input" data-reactid="26116">stream-connect-remove-an-output-from-a-live-input</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26117">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26118"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26119">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 26120 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26121 -->Remove an output from a live input<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26122 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26123">
           <p>Remove an output from a live input</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26124"><!-- react-text: 26125 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26126 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26127 -->accounts/:account_identifier/stream/live_inputs/:live_input_identifier/outputs/:output_identifier<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26128"><!-- react-text: 26129 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26130">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26131">
          <pre data-reactid="26132">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/stream/live_inputs/66be4bf738797e01e1fca35a7bdecdcd/outputs/baea4d9c515887b80289d5c33cf01145" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26133"><!-- react-text: 26134 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26135">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26136">
          <pre data-reactid="26137"></pre>
         </div>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="26138">
        <header data-reactid="26139">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="pages-project" data-reactid="26140"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="26141">Pages Project</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="26142">A Pages project represents a website deployed to Cloudflare's edge.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="26143">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Pages see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/" title="null">Pages docs</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26144">
         <a class="anchor" id="pages-project-properties" data-reactid="26145">pages-project</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="26146">
          <h4 data-reactid="26147"><!-- react-text: 26148 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="26149">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="26150"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="26151"><span class="verb" data-reactid="26152">Show</span><!-- react-text: 26153 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26154 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26155">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-project-get-projects" data-reactid="26156">pages-project-get-projects</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26157">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26158"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26159">GET</span><!-- react-text: 26160 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26161 -->Get projects<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26162 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26163">
           <p>Fetch a list of all user projects</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26164"><!-- react-text: 26165 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26166 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26167 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26168"><!-- react-text: 26169 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26170">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26171">
          <pre data-reactid="26172">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26173"><!-- react-text: 26174 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26175">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26178">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-project-get-project" data-reactid="26179">pages-project-get-project</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26180">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26181"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26182">GET</span><!-- react-text: 26183 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26184 -->Get project<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26185 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26186">
           <p>Fetch a project by name</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26187"><!-- react-text: 26188 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26189 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26190 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26191"><!-- react-text: 26192 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26193">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26194">
          <pre data-reactid="26195">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26201">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-project-delete-project" data-reactid="26202">pages-project-delete-project</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26203">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26204"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26205">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 26206 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26207 -->Delete project<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26208 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26209">
           <p>Destroy a project by name</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26210"><!-- react-text: 26211 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26212 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26213 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26214"><!-- react-text: 26215 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26216">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26217">
          <pre data-reactid="26218">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26219"><!-- react-text: 26220 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26221">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26222">
          <pre data-reactid="26223">{
  "result": null,
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": []
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26224">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-project-create-project" data-reactid="26225">pages-project-create-project</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26226">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26227"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26228">POST</span><!-- react-text: 26229 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26230 -->Create project<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26231 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26232">
           <p>Make a new project</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26233"><!-- react-text: 26234 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26235 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26236 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="26237">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26238"><em data-reactid="26239">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 26240 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="26241">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="26242">
            <thead data-reactid="26243">
             <tr data-reactid="26244">
              <td data-reactid="26245"><!-- react-text: 26246 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26247">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26248"><!-- react-text: 26249 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26250">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26251">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="26252">
             <tr data-reactid="26253">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="26254"><strong data-reactid="26255">subdomain</strong><br data-reactid="26256"><small data-reactid="26257"><em data-reactid="26258"><!-- react-text: 26259 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="26260">
               <div data-reactid="26261">
                <p>The Cloudflare subdomain associated with the project</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="26262">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="26263"><code data-reactid="26264">"helloworld.pages.dev"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="26265">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="26266">
                <li data-reactid="26267">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="26268">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="26269"><strong data-reactid="26270">name</strong><br data-reactid="26271"><small data-reactid="26272"><em data-reactid="26273"><!-- react-text: 26274 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="26275">
               <div data-reactid="26276">

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26449">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-project-update-project" data-reactid="26450">pages-project-update-project</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26451">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26452"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26453">PATCH</span><!-- react-text: 26454 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26455 -->Update project<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26456 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26457">
           <p>Set new attributes for an existing project</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26458"><!-- react-text: 26459 -->PATCH<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26460 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26461 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="26462">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26463"><em data-reactid="26464">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 26465 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="26466">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="26467">
            <thead data-reactid="26468">
             <tr data-reactid="26469">
              <td data-reactid="26470"><!-- react-text: 26471 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26472">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26473"><!-- react-text: 26474 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="26475">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="26476">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="26477">
             <tr data-reactid="26478">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="26479"><strong data-reactid="26480">subdomain</strong><br data-reactid="26481"><small data-reactid="26482"><em data-reactid="26483"><!-- react-text: 26484 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="26485">
               <div data-reactid="26486">
                <p>The Cloudflare subdomain associated with the project</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="26487">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="26488"><code data-reactid="26489">"helloworld.pages.dev"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="26490">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="26491">
                <li data-reactid="26492">read only</li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="26493">

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="26796">
        <header data-reactid="26797">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="pages-deployment" data-reactid="26798"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="26799">Pages Deployment</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="26800">A Pages deployment is a published build for a commit on Pages</h4>
         <div data-reactid="26801">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Pages see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/" title="null">Pages docs</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26802">
         <a class="anchor" id="pages-deployment-properties" data-reactid="26803">pages-deployment</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="26804">
          <h4 data-reactid="26805"><!-- react-text: 26806 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="26807">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="26808"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="26809"><span class="verb" data-reactid="26810">Show</span><!-- react-text: 26811 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26812 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26813">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-deployment-get-deployment-info" data-reactid="26814">pages-deployment-get-deployment-info</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26815">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26816"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26817">GET</span><!-- react-text: 26818 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26819 -->Get deployment info<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26820 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26821">
           <p>Fetch a deployment</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26822"><!-- react-text: 26823 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26824 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26825 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26826"><!-- react-text: 26827 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26828">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26829">
          <pre data-reactid="26830">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26831"><!-- react-text: 26832 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26833">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26834">
          <pre data-reactid="26835">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "f64788e9-fccd-4d4a-a28a-cb84f88f6",
    "project_id": "7b162ea7-7367-4d67-bcde-1160995d5",
    "project_name": "ninja-kittens",
    "environment": "preview",
    "preview_url": "https://f64788e9.ninja-kittens.pages.dev",
    "created_on": "2021-03-09T00:55:03.923456Z",
    "modified_on": "2021-03-09T00:58:59.045655",
    "latest_stage": {
      "name": "deploy",
      "started_on": "2021-03-09T00:55:03.923456Z",
      "ended_on": "2021-03-09T00:58:59.045655",
      "status": "success"
    },
    "deployment_trigger": {
      "type": "push",
      "metadata": {
        "branch": "main",

        "commit_message": "Update index.html"
      }
    },

      {
        "name": "deploy",

        "status": "success"
      }

          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26839"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26840">GET</span><!-- react-text: 26841 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26842 -->Get deployment stage logs<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26843 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26859">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-deployment-delete-deployment" data-reactid="26860">pages-deployment-delete-deployment</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26861">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26862"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26863">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 26864 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26865 -->Delete deployment<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26866 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26867">
           <p>Destroy a deployment</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26868"><!-- react-text: 26869 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26870 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26871 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26872"><!-- react-text: 26873 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26874">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26875">
          <pre data-reactid="26876">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="26905">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-deployment-retry-deployment" data-reactid="26906">pages-deployment-retry-deployment</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="26907">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="26908"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="26909">POST</span><!-- react-text: 26910 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26911 -->Retry deployment<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26912 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="26913">
           <p>Retry a previous deployment</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="26914"><!-- react-text: 26915 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26916 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 26917 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}/retry<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26918"><!-- react-text: 26919 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26920">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26921">
          <pre data-reactid="26922">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployments/{deployment_id}/retry" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="26923"><!-- react-text: 26924 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="26925">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="26926">
          <pre data-reactid="26927">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "f64788e9-fccd-4d4a-a28a-cb84f88f6",
    "project_id": "7b162ea7-7367-4d67-bcde-1160995d5",
    "project_name": "ninja-kittens",
    "environment": "preview",
    "preview_url": "https://f64788e9.ninja-kittens.pages.dev",
    "created_on": "2021-03-09T00:55:03.923456Z",
    "modified_on": "2021-03-09T00:58:59.045655",
    "latest_stage": {
      "name": "deploy",
      "started_on": "2021-03-09T00:55:03.923456Z",
      "ended_on": "2021-03-09T00:58:59.045655",
      "status": "success"
    },
    "deployment_trigger": {
      "type": "push",
      "metadata": {
        "branch": "main",
        "commit_hash": "ad9ccd918a81025731e10e40267e11273a263421",
        "commit_message": "Update index.html"
      }
    },
    "stages": [
      {
        "name": "deploy",
        "started_on": "2021-03-09T00:55:03.923456Z",
        "ended_on": "2021-03-09T00:58:59.045655",
        "status": "success"
      }
    ],
    "build_config": {
      "build_command": "npm run build",
      "destination_dir": "build",
      "root_dir": "/"
    },
    "source": {
      "type": "github",
      "config": {
        "owner": "rit3k",
        "repo_name": "ninja-kittens",
        "production_branch": "main",
        "url": "https://github.com/rit3k/ninja-kittens",
        "pr_comments_enabled": true,
        "deployments_disabled": false
      }
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="27050">
        <header data-reactid="27051">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="pages-deployment-config" data-reactid="27052"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="27053">Pages Deployment-Config</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="27054">A deployment-config represents environment variables set for a specific Pages build environment.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="27055">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Pages see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/" title="null">Pages docs</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27056">
         <a class="anchor" id="pages-deployment-config-properties" data-reactid="27057">pages-deployment-config</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27058">
          <h4 data-reactid="27059"><!-- react-text: 27060 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="27061">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="27062"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="27063"><span class="verb" data-reactid="27064">Show</span><!-- react-text: 27065 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27066 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27067">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-deployment-config-get-production-deployment-config" data-reactid="27068">pages-deployment-config-get-production-deployment-config</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27069">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27070"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27071">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27072 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27073 -->Get production deployment config<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27074 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27075">
           <p>Fetch production deployment config</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27076"><!-- react-text: 27077 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27078 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27079 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployment_configs/production<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27080"><!-- react-text: 27081 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27082">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27083">
          <pre data-reactid="27084">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployment_configs/production" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27085"><!-- react-text: 27086 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27087">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27088">
          <pre data-reactid="27089">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "production": {
      "env_vars": [
        {
          "key": "BUILD_VERSION",
          "value": "3.3",
          "encrypted": "false"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27273"><!-- react-text: 27274 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27275">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27276">
          <pre data-reactid="27277">curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/deployment_configs/production/env_vars " \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '[{"key":"BUILD_VERSION","value":"3.3","encrypted":false}]'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27278"><!-- react-text: 27279 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27280">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27281">
          <pre data-reactid="27282">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "key": "BUILD_VERSION",
      "value": "3.3",
      "encrypted": "false"
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

         <h2 data-reactid="27408">Pages Build-Config</h2>

         <div data-reactid="27410">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Pages see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/" title="null">Pages docs</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27411">
         <a class="anchor" id="pages-build-config-properties" data-reactid="27412">pages-build-config</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27413">
          <h4 data-reactid="27414"><!-- react-text: 27415 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="27416">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="27417"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="27418"><span class="verb" data-reactid="27419">Show</span><!-- react-text: 27420 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27421 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27422">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-build-config-update-build-config" data-reactid="27423">pages-build-config-update-build-config</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27424">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27425"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27426">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 27427 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27428 -->Update build config<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27429 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27430">
           <p>Change the project build behavior</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27431"><!-- react-text: 27432 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27433 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27434 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/build_config<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27435"><!-- react-text: 27436 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27437">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27438">
          <pre data-reactid="27439">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/build_config" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"object","properties":{"build_command":{"description":"Command used to build project","type":"string","readOnly":true,"example":"npm run build"},"destination_dir":{"description":"Output directory of the build","type":"string","readOnly":true,"example":"build"},"root_dir":{"description":"Root directory to run the build command","type":"string","readOnly":true,"example":"/"}}}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27440"><!-- react-text: 27441 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27442">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27443">
          <pre data-reactid="27444">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "build_command": "npm run build",
    "destination_dir": "build",
    "root_dir": "/"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="27567">
        <header data-reactid="27568">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="pages-domains" data-reactid="27569"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="27570">Pages Domains</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="27571">A domain represents a custom domain tied to a Pages project.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="27572">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Pages see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/" title="null">Pages docs</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27573">
         <a class="anchor" id="pages-domains-properties" data-reactid="27574">pages-domains</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27575">
          <h4 data-reactid="27576"><!-- react-text: 27577 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="27578">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="27579"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="27580"><span class="verb" data-reactid="27581">Show</span><!-- react-text: 27582 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27583 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27584">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-domains-get-domains" data-reactid="27585">pages-domains-get-domains</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27586">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27587"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27588">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27589 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27590 -->Get domains<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27591 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27592">
           <p>Fetch a list of all domains</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27593"><!-- react-text: 27594 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27595 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27596 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/domains<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27597"><!-- react-text: 27598 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27599">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27600">
          <pre data-reactid="27601">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/domains" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27602"><!-- react-text: 27603 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27604">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27605">
          <pre data-reactid="27606">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "domain_id": "8232210c-6818-4e34-8d95-cc386874b8d2",
      "name": "helloworld.com",
      "status": "pending",
      "verification_data": {
        "status": "active"
      },
      "validation_data": {
        "status": "active",
        "method": "http"
      },
      "zone_tag": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
      "created_on": "2017-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27607">
         <a class="anchor2" id="pages-domains-get-domain" data-reactid="27608">pages-domains-get-domain</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27609">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27610"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27611">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27612 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27613 -->Get domain<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27614 --> <!-- /react-text --></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27615">
           <p>Fetch a single domain</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27616"><!-- react-text: 27617 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27618 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27619 -->accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/domains/{domain_name}<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27620"><!-- react-text: 27621 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27622">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27623">
          <pre data-reactid="27624">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/{account_id}/pages/projects/{project_name}/domains/{domain_name}" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27625"><!-- react-text: 27626 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27627">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27628">
          <pre data-reactid="27629">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "domain_id": "8232210c-6818-4e34-8d95-cc386874b8d2",
    "name": "helloworld.com",
    "status": "pending",
    "verification_data": {
      "status": "active"
    },
    "validation_data": {
      "status": "active",
      "method": "http"
    },
    "zone_tag": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
    "created_on": "2017-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="27752">
        <header data-reactid="27753">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="worker-script" data-reactid="27754"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="27755">Worker Script</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="27756">A Worker script is a single script that is executed on matching routes in the Cloudflare edge</h4>
         <div data-reactid="27757">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Workers see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://workers.cloudflare.com/docs/reference/tooling/api/" title="null">Workers API</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27758">
         <a class="anchor" id="worker-script-properties" data-reactid="27759">worker-script</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27760">
          <h4 data-reactid="27761"><!-- react-text: 27762 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="27763">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="27764"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="27765"><span class="verb" data-reactid="27766">Show</span><!-- react-text: 27767 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27768 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27769">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-upload-worker" data-reactid="27770">worker-script-upload-worker</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27771">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27772"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27773">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 27774 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27775 -->Upload Worker<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27776 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27777"><!-- react-text: 27778 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27779 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27780 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.create<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27781">
           <p>Upload a worker, or a new version of a worker.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27782"><!-- react-text: 27783 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27784 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27785 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts/:script_name<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27786"><!-- react-text: 27787 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27788">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27789">
          <pre data-reactid="27790">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts/this-is_my_script-01" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/javascript" \
--data "addEventListener('fetch', event =&gt; { event.respondWith(fetch(event.request)) })"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27791"><!-- react-text: 27792 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27793">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27794">
          <pre data-reactid="27795">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "script": "addEventListener('fetch', event =&gt; { event.respondWith(fetch(event.request)) })",
    "etag": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a",
    "size": 1024,
    "usage_model": "unbound",
    "modified_on": "2017-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27796">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-list-workers" data-reactid="27797">worker-script-list-workers</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27798">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27799"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27800">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27801 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27802 -->List Workers<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27803 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27804"><!-- react-text: 27805 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27806 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27807 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.list<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27808">
           <p>Fetch a list of uploaded workers.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27809"><!-- react-text: 27810 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27811 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27812 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27816">
          <pre data-reactid="27817">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27818"><!-- react-text: 27819 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27820">(example)</small></h5>

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "this-is_my_script-01",
      "etag": "ea95132c15732412d22c1476fa83f27a",
      "usage_model": "unbound",
      "created_on": "2017-01-01T00:00:00Z",
      "modified_on": "2017-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    }
  ]

         </div>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27823">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-download-worker" data-reactid="27824">worker-script-download-worker</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27825">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27826"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27827">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27828 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27829 -->Download Worker<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27830 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27831"><!-- react-text: 27832 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27833 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27834 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.read<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27835">
           <p>Fetch raw script content for your worker. Note this is the original script content, not JSON encoded.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27836"><!-- react-text: 27837 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27838 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27839 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts/:script_name<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27840"><!-- react-text: 27841 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27842">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27843">
          <pre data-reactid="27844">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts/this-is_my_script-01" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Accept: application/javascript"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27845"><!-- react-text: 27846 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27847">(example)</small></h5>
