        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27850">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-delete-worker" data-reactid="27851">worker-script-delete-worker</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27852">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27853"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27854">DELETE</span><!-- react-text: 27855 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27856 -->Delete Worker<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27857 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27858"><!-- react-text: 27859 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27860 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27861 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.delete<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27862">
           <p>Delete your worker. This call has no response body on a successful delete.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27863"><!-- react-text: 27864 -->DELETE<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27865 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27866 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts/:script_name<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27867"><!-- react-text: 27868 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27869">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27870">
          <pre data-reactid="27871">curl -X DELETE "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts/this-is_my_script-01" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27872"><!-- react-text: 27873 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27874">(example)</small></h5>

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27877">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-update-usage-model" data-reactid="27878">worker-script-update-usage-model</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27879">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27880"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27881">PUT</span><!-- react-text: 27882 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27883 -->Update Usage Model<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27884 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27885"><!-- react-text: 27886 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27887 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27888 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.create<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27889">
           <p>Updates the Usage Model for a given Worker. Requires a Workers Paid subscription.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27890"><!-- react-text: 27891 -->PUT<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27892 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27893 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts/:script_name/usage-model<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27894"><!-- react-text: 27895 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27896">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27897">
          <pre data-reactid="27898">curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts/this-is_my_script-01/usage-model" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     --data '"{'usage_model': 'unbound'}"'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27899"><!-- react-text: 27900 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27901">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27902">
          <pre data-reactid="27903">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "usage_model": "unbound"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27904">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-script-fetch-usage-model" data-reactid="27905">worker-script-fetch-usage-model</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="27906">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27907"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="27908">GET</span><!-- react-text: 27909 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27910 -->Fetch Usage Model<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27911 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="27912"><!-- react-text: 27913 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27914 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27915 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.script.read<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="27916">
           <p>Fetches the Usage Model for a given Worker.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="27917"><!-- react-text: 27918 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27919 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27920 -->accounts/:account_identifier/workers/scripts/:script_name/usage-model<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>

         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27924">
          <pre data-reactid="27925">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac/workers/scripts/this-is_my_script-01/usage-model" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="27926"><!-- react-text: 27927 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="27928">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="27929">

  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "usage_model": "unbound"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section id="worker-script-errors" class="modunit" data-reactid="27931">
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27932">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="27933"><!-- react-text: 27934 -->Worker Script<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27935 --> error codes<!-- /react-text --></h3>
         </header>
         <table class="table striped error-codes" data-reactid="27936">
          <thead data-reactid="27937">
           <tr data-reactid="27938">
            <td data-reactid="27939">Code</td>
            <td data-reactid="27940">Description</td>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody data-reactid="27941">
           <tr data-reactid="27942">
            <td data-reactid="27943">10001</td>
            <td data-reactid="27944">Unsupported or unexpected Content Type</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27945">
            <td data-reactid="27946">10002</td>
            <td data-reactid="27947">Unexpected internal server error</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27948">
            <td data-reactid="27949">10003</td>
            <td data-reactid="27950">Missing required URL parameter</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27951">

            <td data-reactid="27953">Malformed URL parameter</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27954">
            <td data-reactid="27955">10006</td>
            <td data-reactid="27956">Unparseable script body</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27957">
            <td data-reactid="27958">10007</td>
            <td data-reactid="27959">Resource not found (similar to HTTP 404)</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27960">
            <td data-reactid="27961">10014</td>
            <td data-reactid="27962">Internal error while attempting authorization checks</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27963">
            <td data-reactid="27964">10015</td>
            <td data-reactid="27965">The current account is not authorized to use workers</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27966">
            <td data-reactid="27967">10018</td>
            <td data-reactid="27968">Attempted to update a script where the e-tag does not match</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27969">
            <td data-reactid="27970">10021</td>
            <td data-reactid="27971">Script content failed validation checks, but was otherwise parseable</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27972">
            <td data-reactid="27973">10023</td>
            <td data-reactid="27974">Unauthorized access attempt</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27975">
            <td data-reactid="27976">10027</td>
            <td data-reactid="27977">Script body was too large</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="27978">
            <td data-reactid="27979">10075</td>
            <td data-reactid="27980">Requires a Workers Paid plan</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="27981">
        <header data-reactid="27982">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="worker-routes" data-reactid="27983"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="27984">Worker Routes</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="27985">Routes are basic patterns used to enable or disable workers that match requests.</h4>
         <div data-reactid="27986">
          <p><strong>For more detailed documentation on using the API for Workers see the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://workers.cloudflare.com/docs/reference/tooling/api/" title="null">Workers API</a>.</strong></p> 
         </div>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27987">
         <a class="anchor" id="worker-routes-properties" data-reactid="27988">worker-routes</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="27989">
          <h4 data-reactid="27990"><!-- react-text: 27991 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="27992">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="27993"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="27994"><span class="verb" data-reactid="27995">Show</span><!-- react-text: 27996 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 27997 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="27998">
         <a class="anchor2" id="worker-routes-create-route" data-reactid="27999">worker-routes-create-route</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="28000">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="28001"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="28002">POST</span><!-- react-text: 28003 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28004 -->Create Route<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28005 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28006"><!-- react-text: 28007 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28008 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28009 -->com.cloudflare.edge.worker.route.create<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="28010"><!-- react-text: 28011 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28012 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28013 -->zones/:zone_id/workers/routes<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="28014">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28015"><em data-reactid="28016">Required</em><!-- react-text: 28017 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="28018">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="28019">
            <thead data-reactid="28020">
             <tr data-reactid="28021">
              <td data-reactid="28022"><!-- react-text: 28023 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28024">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28025"><!-- react-text: 28026 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28027">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28028">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="28029">
             <tr data-reactid="28030">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28031"><strong data-reactid="28032">pattern</strong><br data-reactid="28033"><small data-reactid="28034"><em data-reactid="28035"><!-- react-text: 28036 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28037">
               <div data-reactid="28038">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28039"><code data-reactid="28040">"example.net/*"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28041">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28042"></ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="28043">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28044"><em data-reactid="28045">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 28046 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="28047">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="28048">
            <thead data-reactid="28049">
             <tr data-reactid="28050">
              <td data-reactid="28051"><!-- react-text: 28052 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28053">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28054"><!-- react-text: 28055 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28056">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28057">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="28058">
             <tr data-reactid="28059">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28060"><strong data-reactid="28061">script</strong><br data-reactid="28062"><small data-reactid="28063"><em data-reactid="28064"><!-- react-text: 28065 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28066">
               <div data-reactid="28067">
                <p>Name of the script to apply when the route is matched. The route is skipped when this is blank/missing.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28068">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28069"><code data-reactid="28070">"this-is_my_script-01"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28071">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28072">
                <li data-reactid="28073"><!-- react-text: 28074 -->pattern: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28075 -->^[a-z0-9_][a-z0-9-_]*$<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28076"><!-- react-text: 28077 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="28078">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="28079">
          <pre data-reactid="28080">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/workers/routes" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"pattern":"example.net/*","script":"this-is_my_script-01"}'</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28081"><!-- react-text: 28082 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="28083">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="28084">
          <pre data-reactid="28085">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": {
    "id": "9a7806061c88ada191ed06f989cc3dac"
  }
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>

        <section id="worker-routes-errors" class="modunit" data-reactid="28254">
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="28255">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="28256"><!-- react-text: 28257 -->Worker Routes<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28258 --> error codes<!-- /react-text --></h3>
         </header>
         <table class="table striped error-codes" data-reactid="28259">
          <thead data-reactid="28260">
           <tr data-reactid="28261">
            <td data-reactid="28262">Code</td>
            <td data-reactid="28263">Description</td>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody data-reactid="28264">
           <tr data-reactid="28265">
            <td data-reactid="28266">10001</td>
            <td data-reactid="28267">Unsupported or unexpected Content Type</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28268">
            <td data-reactid="28269">10002</td>
            <td data-reactid="28270">Unexpected internal server error</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28271">
            <td data-reactid="28272">10003</td>
            <td data-reactid="28273">Missing required URL parameter</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28274">
            <td data-reactid="28275">10004</td>
            <td data-reactid="28276">Malformed URL parameter</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28277">
            <td data-reactid="28278">10007</td>
            <td data-reactid="28279">Resource not found (similar to HTTP 404)</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28280">
            <td data-reactid="28281">10014</td>
            <td data-reactid="28282">Internal error while attempting authorization checks</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28283">
            <td data-reactid="28284">10015</td>
            <td data-reactid="28285">The current account is not authorized to use workers</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28286">
            <td data-reactid="28287">10020</td>
            <td data-reactid="28288">Attempted to create a route for a pattern that already exists</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28289">
            <td data-reactid="28290">10022</td>
            <td data-reactid="28291">Route pattern was invalid</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28292">
            <td data-reactid="28293">10023</td>
            <td data-reactid="28294">Unauthorized access attempt</td>
           </tr>
           <tr data-reactid="28295">
            <td data-reactid="28296">10026</td>
            <td data-reactid="28297">Route pattern was unparseable</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table>
        </section>
       </article>
       <article class="section api-section" data-reactid="28298">
        <header data-reactid="28299">
         <div style="position:absolute;margin:-5em;" id="workers-kv-namespace" data-reactid="28300"></div>
         <h2 data-reactid="28301">Workers KV Namespace</h2>
         <h4 class="subheadline" data-reactid="28302">A Namespace is a collection of key-value pairs stored in Workers KV.</h4>
        </header>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="28303">
         <a class="anchor" id="workers-kv-namespace-properties" data-reactid="28304">workers-kv-namespace</a>
         <header class="mod-header" data-reactid="28305">
          <h4 data-reactid="28306"><!-- react-text: 28307 -->Object definition<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <p data-reactid="28308">View properties and constraints defined on the object</p>
          <p data-reactid="28309"><a class="object-definition-toggle btn" data-reactid="28310"><span class="verb" data-reactid="28311">Show</span><!-- react-text: 28312 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28313 -->definition<!-- /react-text --></a></p>
         </header>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="28314">
         <a class="anchor2" id="workers-kv-namespace-list-namespaces" data-reactid="28315">workers-kv-namespace-list-namespaces</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="28316">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="28317"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="28318">GET</span><!-- react-text: 28319 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28320 -->List Namespaces<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28321 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28322"><!-- react-text: 28323 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28324 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28325 -->com.cloudflare.edge.storage.kv.namespace.list<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="28326">
           <p>Returns the namespaces owned by an account</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="28327"><!-- react-text: 28328 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28329 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28330 -->accounts/:account_identifier/storage/kv/namespaces<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="28331">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28332"><em data-reactid="28333">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 28334 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="28335">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="28336">
            <thead data-reactid="28337">
             <tr data-reactid="28338">
              <td data-reactid="28339"><!-- react-text: 28340 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28341">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28342"><!-- react-text: 28343 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28344">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28345">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="28346">
             <tr data-reactid="28347">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28348"><strong data-reactid="28349">page</strong><br data-reactid="28350"><small data-reactid="28351"><em data-reactid="28352"><!-- react-text: 28353 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28354">
               <div data-reactid="28355">
                <p>Page number of paginated results</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28356">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28357"><code data-reactid="28358">1</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28359">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28360">
                <li data-reactid="28361">default value: 1</li>
                <li data-reactid="28362"><!-- react-text: 28363 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28364 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28365 -->1<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="28366">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28367"><strong data-reactid="28368">per_page</strong><br data-reactid="28369"><small data-reactid="28370"><em data-reactid="28371"><!-- react-text: 28372 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28373">
               <div data-reactid="28374">
                <p>Maximum number of results per page</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28375">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28376"><code data-reactid="28377">20</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28378">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28379">
                <li data-reactid="28380">default value: 20</li>
                <li data-reactid="28381"><!-- react-text: 28382 -->min value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28383 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28384 -->5<!-- /react-text --></li>
                <li data-reactid="28385"><!-- react-text: 28386 -->max value<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28387 -->:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28388 -->100<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="28389">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28390"><strong data-reactid="28391">order</strong><br data-reactid="28392"><small data-reactid="28393"><em data-reactid="28394"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28395">
               <div data-reactid="28396">
                <p>Field to order results by</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28397">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28398"><code data-reactid="28399">"id"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28400">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28401">
                <li data-reactid="28402"><!-- react-text: 28403 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28404 -->id, title<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
             <tr data-reactid="28405">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28406"><strong data-reactid="28407">direction</strong><br data-reactid="28408"><small data-reactid="28409"><em data-reactid="28410"></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28411">
               <div data-reactid="28412">
                <p>Direction to order namespaces</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28413">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28414"><code data-reactid="28415">"asc"</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28416">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28417">
                <li data-reactid="28418"><!-- react-text: 28419 -->valid values: <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28420 -->asc, desc<!-- /react-text --></li>
               </ul></td>
             </tr>
            </tbody>
           </table>
          </div>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28421"><!-- react-text: 28422 -->cURL <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="28423">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="28424">
          <pre data-reactid="28425">curl -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/storage/kv/namespaces?page=1&amp;per_page=20&amp;order=id&amp;direction=asc" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41"</pre>
         </div>
         <h5 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28426"><!-- react-text: 28427 -->Response <!-- /react-text --><small class="text-warning" data-reactid="28428">(example)</small></h5>
         <div class="CodeMirror cm-s-default" data-reactid="28429">
          <pre data-reactid="28430">{
  "success": true,
  "errors": [],
  "messages": [],
  "result": [
    {
      "id": "0f2ac74b498b48028cb68387c421e279",
      "title": "My Own Namespace",
      "supports_url_encoding": true
    }
  ]
}</pre>
         </div>
        </section>
        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="28431">
         <a class="anchor2" id="workers-kv-namespace-create-a-namespace" data-reactid="28432">workers-kv-namespace-create-a-namespace</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="28433">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="28434"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="28435">POST</span><!-- react-text: 28436 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28437 -->Create a Namespace<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28438 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28439"><!-- react-text: 28440 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28441 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28442 -->com.cloudflare.edge.storage.kv.namespace.create<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="28443">
           <p>Creates a namespace under the given title. A 400 is returned if the account already owns a namespace with this title. A namespace must be explicitly deleted to be replaced.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="28444"><!-- react-text: 28445 -->POST<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28446 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28447 -->accounts/:account_identifier/storage/kv/namespaces<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="28448">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28449"><em data-reactid="28450">Required</em><!-- react-text: 28451 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="28452">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="28453">
            <thead data-reactid="28454">
             <tr data-reactid="28455">
              <td data-reactid="28456"><!-- react-text: 28457 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28458">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28459"><!-- react-text: 28460 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28461">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28462">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="28463">
             <tr data-reactid="28464">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28465"><strong data-reactid="28466">title</strong><br data-reactid="28467"><small data-reactid="28468"><em data-reactid="28469"><!-- react-text: 28470 -->string<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28471">
               <div data-reactid="28472">
                <p>A human-readable string name for a Namespace.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28473">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28474"><code data-reactid="28475">"My Own Namespace"</code></small>
               </div></td>

          <pre data-reactid="28482">curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/storage/kv/namespaces" \

        <section class="modunit" data-reactid="28572">
         <a class="anchor2" id="workers-kv-namespace-list-a-namespace-s-keys" data-reactid="28573">workers-kv-namespace-list-a-namespace-s-keys</a>
         <div class="mod-header" data-reactid="28574">
          <h3 class="mod-title" data-reactid="28575"><span class="label label-info" data-reactid="28576">GET</span><!-- react-text: 28577 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28578 -->List a Namespace's Keys<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28579 --> <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28580"><!-- react-text: 28581 -->permission needed:<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28582 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28583 -->com.cloudflare.edge.storage.kv.key.list<!-- /react-text --></small></h3>
          <div data-reactid="28584">
           <p>Lists a namespace's keys.</p> 
          </div>
          <pre class="language-http" style="margin:0.5em 0 0;" data-reactid="28585"><!-- react-text: 28586 -->GET<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28587 --> <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 28588 -->accounts/:account_identifier/storage/kv/namespaces/:namespace_identifier/keys<!-- /react-text --></pre>
         </div>
         <div data-reactid="28589">
          <h4 class="mod-content" data-reactid="28590"><em data-reactid="28591">Optional</em><!-- react-text: 28592 --> parameters<!-- /react-text --></h4>
          <div class="overflow-scroll object-definition-table" data-reactid="28593">
           <table class="table table-striped" data-reactid="28594">
            <thead data-reactid="28595">
             <tr data-reactid="28596">
              <td data-reactid="28597"><!-- react-text: 28598 -->Name <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28599">/type</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28600"><!-- react-text: 28601 -->Description <!-- /react-text --><small data-reactid="28602">/example</small></td>
              <td data-reactid="28603">Constraints</td>
             </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody data-reactid="28604">
             <tr data-reactid="28605">
              <td class="param-name" data-reactid="28606"><strong data-reactid="28607">limit</strong><br data-reactid="28608"><small data-reactid="28609"><em data-reactid="28610"><!-- react-text: 28611 -->number<!-- /react-text --></em></small></td>
              <td class="param-description object-definition-param-description" data-reactid="28612">
               <div data-reactid="28613">
                <p>The number of keys to return. The cursor attribute may be used to iterate over the next batch of keys if there are more than the limit.</p> 
               </div>
               <div data-reactid="28614">
                <small class="example-code" data-reactid="28615"><code data-reactid="28616">1000</code></small>
               </div></td>
              <td class="param-constraints" data-reactid="28617">
               <ul class="constraints unstyled" data-reactid="28618">
                <li data-reactid="28619">default v
